choices: Work With Mazee in the field
Work with of the other field Reporters
Help out with a new intern
1.content:
The day begins in the office of your employer, the sphinx Lexi. The editor of the Daily Tombstone paces on all fours and lets out a stressed out meow. “Another day,” she moans. “Another disaster waiting to happen. When is that Tim going to get in here? I can’t take the anticipation. I know he’s gonna make something bad happen. I just know it.” The sphinx groans and lowers her head.

It was a wonder that you managed to score a job in a monster city like Fearfield. However, you had little to no choice. You were a jinx. You managed to mess up every job in your hometown in the human world so badly you were exiled to the monster world so you wouldn’t be a danger to anyone else. You found yourself in Fearfield, a city said to me the most dangerous monster city for any human to live in. Once in Fearfield, you saw a poster on the Daily Tombstone building that said they were looking for a photographer and you decided that since you were quite skilled with a camera, you’d apply. The only problem, you had no idea that the editor in charge was an 850ft tall man eating sphinx. Lexi’s secretary let you in to see the sphinx, the only day she was glad to see you.

Upon meeting you, Lexi didn’t see you as a potential employee so much as a meal and was circling you with a sinister grin. “So?” asked the sphinx. “A human applying for a job meant for monsters? That’s a laugh.” “No ma’am, I’m completely serious. I’ve lost so many jobs and I saw the offer in your window so...” Lexi licked you before you could finish that sentence. “I haven’t had a raw human in years. What to do? What do I have to lose? Seeing as I’m a sphinx, I’ll cut a deal with you. If you can answer my riddle, I’ll give you a job, heck, if by some miracle you get it right, I’ll give you the best job security you could hope, n matter how badly you might screw up. Answer incorrectly and...” Lexi snapped her jaws to show you how dangerous she was.

“I’ll do anything you say ma’am,” you said. “I’ll take your challenge.” Lexi circled you before getting ready to announce her riddle. “Okay my little snack, here’s my riddle...” By some miracle your bad luck worked to your advantage that day because a clock tower rang loudly. “What time is it?” asked Lexi. “I’d say it’s quarter to one.” You replied. Lexi looked at her watch. “You’re right. Wait... I mean... that.. D’oh!” “Too late, I answered your riddle correction.” Lexi banged her head on the ground. “Damn it all! Welcome to the Daily Tombstone.” “Yes!” you yelled in victory

In the present day, Lexi lets out a groan. “Me and my big mouth. Who would’ve thought that one little human could cause so much damage and destruction. Suddenly, Lexi hears Kiki calling her. “Lexi,” she says. “Tim is here.” “Send him in.” It was at this moment, you walk in under Lexi’s door and wave at your employer. “Stay away from me,” warns Lexi. “You’re a jinx. Don’t come another step closer.” As Lexi backs up, her glasses fall off and she lets out a grunt. Lexi tries to walk up to her glasses, but you get there first. “Don’t worry Lexi,” you say as you walk forward. “I’ve got this.” “NO!” yells Lexi.

But you pick up Lexi’s glasses and shake your hand. “Looks like they haven’t been cleaned in weeks. I’ll take care of it boss. You grab a piece of cloth hanging from a nearby table and by tugging on it to clean Lexis glasses only to knock over a hot container full of coffee all over Lexi as the sphinx screams in pain. “HOT!” “Sorry!” you yell. “Lexi, your glasses.” You walk forward and try to hand Lexi her glasses as she’s recovering from the coffee but then you accidentally trip and fall forward shattering the glasses as Lexi lets out a groan. “That was my last pair of glasses.” She moans.

This had happened a lot since you started working at the Daily Tombstone. You were so much of a jinx that even the monsters weren’t immune. You spilled the ink you were supposed to load into one of the printing presses and caused it to break down one time. Put several monsters in the hospital due to chain reaction disasters and they even had to replace thirty security cameras because you managed to damage them unintentionally while cleaning them. The fact is, you were bad luck.

“Wow, sorry Lexi, I was just trying to...” Lexi gives an angry look but cracks a forced smile. “Accidents will happen,” she says in a restrained tone. “Don’t worry about it.” You let out a sigh. “So what’s my job today boss? Oh, I could empty out the ashtrays.” “Oh no,” growls Lexi. “I remember what happened last time you cleaned the ashtrays. Why do you think I banned smoking from the building.” “Cheer up Lexi, your fur grew back after three weeks.” Lexi just growls at you and you step back. She was forbidden from eating you due to the contract, but she could still get mad. “Let me just give you today’s assignment,” she says with a sigh. “And then we won’t have to see each other until the end of the day.”

“Yes ma’am.” You say in enthusiasm as you salute your sphinx employer. So what are you going to do today?
1.title: Disaster Imminent

11.content:
Lexi lets out a sigh and then smiles. “You know something Tim, I think I’ll be generous today. You’ll be working with Mazee for today’s mission.” “Alright,” you say. “Thanks Lexi.” Lexi lets out a purr and tries to look happy for you despite her dislike of you.

Once you’re done speaking with your sphinx boss, you go to find Mazee, your girlfriend. Sure she was a skyscraper sized rat who would be as big as a sumo wrestler had she been human sized, but the wererat was the most loyal monster to you in the entire building. A lot of people wondered what you saw in the rodent giantess, but many monsters asked Mazee what she saw in you so it evened out.

You remember how you met Mazee. You were on her desk cleaning it under Lexi’s orders when you slipped and fell on a piece of cheese pizza and got stuck. Mazee took the slice and you seriously thought she was going to eat you, but instead she picked you off and sure enough you two were steady. You considered yourself lucky to have such a caring girlfriend even if she was a rat. It was just as well one of the monsters was your girlfriend, that gave you some protection from predators like Aurelia and Grace and unwanted suitors like Beth and Blake.

As you’re thinking about your mission with Mazee, you suddenly remember how much bigger the hallway was to you than it was to the monsters. The only reason you got far enough to Lexi’s office today was because Willa gave you a lift. You figured Lexi was too busy managing the repairs to the building to put in human sized walkways. You let out a sigh but then you feel tremors. A monster was coming. Before you could find out which one, you feel something tapping on your head, it looked like a giant worm but you knew it was in fact, Mazee’s tail.

“Need a ride pipsqueak?” asks a voice behind you in a friendly tone. You look behind you to see a pair of giant black furred clawed feet with jean covered legs bigger than skyscrapers. You look up closer to see the sky obscured by a huge furry belly and you realize that Mazee had come to you. The giantess wererat bends over and smiles to you as she swings her tail. You still cannot believe how beautiful the rat giantess was. From her shiny midnight black hair that reached down to her mountain sized butt cheeks to her generously sized chest and belly big enough for you to live on, this rodent was a bombshell.

“I heard Lexi screaming and I thought you’d be here,” your girlfriend says as she lowers her clawed finger for you to climb on. “Why do you torture her so?” “Well,” you say nervously. “I just want to help.” Mazee rubs your head as if you’re a pet and smiles, showing her buck teeth normal for a rat. “I’d be careful if I were you Tim. I think that sphinx is out to get you.” “No way Mazee, she can’t eat me, besides, why would my boss want to kill me? She did say I was the best photographer she has.” Mazee rolls her eyes. “Yeah, hard to find a photographer you can just hide in your pocket. Speaking of which, where should I keep you for today’s mission?” 
Mazee rubs her chin before she decides to place you...
11.title: World's Most Beautiful Rodent

112.content:
Mazee flips her midnight colored hair and smiles down to you as she lets the tender locks reach down to you. "Mazee," you say. "Mazee. Let down your hair." Mazee laughs at your joke as you start to climb up into the black jungle that is your girlfriend's head. You hold on tight and grab hold of a tree trunk sized lock as Mazee begins walking.

You can't help but sniff the aroma of her hair. It sort of smelt like blueberries. You take it Mazee's been using a new shampoo. "I don't know why people are always calling rats dirty. I've never smelled better." Mazee blushes slightly as she gets in her red muscle car and starts to drive away. "Don't forget Tim," your girlfriend says. "Mom and Dad are visiting tonight." You gulp and hold on tight to Mazee's hair.

"Are they still not thrilled about their daughter dating a human. After all your sisters still see me as a snack." Mazee lets out a sigh. "Don't remind me, I regret letting Brianna borrow my cookbook." You shiver on your girlfriend's head. "I can never eat sushi again. So Mazee, what's our mission for today my goddess among vermin?"

"Ooh," says Mazee as her tail twitches in her seat. "You're extra sexy today. We definitely don't need protection tonight. Okay. Our mission for today is covering..."
112.title: Rat Hair

1123.content: What else could they be covering today?
1123.title: Something Else

11231.content:
"Well, dear, today we'll be going to an interview. I don't have the exact details, but I do know that they have been called 'one-in-a-million'. So this could be a once in a lifetime chance. And I am not letting Ari get to them first." Mazee said.

You agreed. Ari was a liar, always making false statements in her reports. You hated working with her, since she saw humans as slaves.

"Alright, so where is the interview?" You ask.

"Their home, at..." She pulls out a piece of paper. "1313 Levin Street."

"Alright, can't wait." You say as Mazee starts for the door.
-----------------
A couple of hours later, Mazee, with you still in her hair, is walking up the path to 1313 Levin St. It was a modest house, but you noticed there was a wheelchair ramp in front. The owner must either need a wheelchair, or lives with someone who does. Mazee walks up to the front door and knocks.

"Ms. Denverson? It's Mazee Robinson. I'm from the Daily Tombstone. I'm here for the interview." Mazee calls.

A few seconds later, you hear the squaking of wheels. After another few seconds, the door opens and you see...
11231.title: Time for an Interview

112311.content:
Your eyes went wide when you saw the person on the other side. It was a female satyr. You couldn't tell her height, since she was in a wheelchair. She had red skin, long black hair, and green eyes. She had the horns, ears, and from what you could see, legs of a goat. But that was not what caught your attention. What caught your attention were her breasts. They were gargantuan. They had to be at least twice the size of yoga balls. Those must have been too heavy for her to move on her own power.

"Cali Denverson?" Mazee asks.

"Yes, that's me. Come on in." Cali replies as she wheels away from the door.

Mazee thanked her and walked in. As she did, you noticed that Cali had an elevator in her home.

"Who is your friend?" Cali asks, looking at you through Mazee's hair.

"Oh, this is Tim. He'll be working with me. Shall we go to the living room?" Mazee asks.

Cali nods and the three of you head into the living room. Mazee sits down on the couch and, taking you out of her hair, sets you on the coffee table.

Mazee pulls out a tape recorder. "Why don't we start the interview by having you introduce yourself?"

Cali nods. "My name is Cali Denverson. I am... was a doctor and Fearfield General Hospital. I was studying LOS, hoping to find ways to improve the strength of werewolves with it, when something happened. I can't remember what, but somehow, it gave me LOS."

You were surprised. LOS, short for Lactose Overload Syndrome, was a condition that caused women's breasts to become extremely large and fill with milk that they can't lactate. But it only affected werewolves, succubi, and gargoyles. How did Cali, a satyr, get it?

"I become unable to properly do my duties, but I was given the opprotunity to work from home. I now give medical advice on Fearfield General's website." Cali continues.

"I'm so sorry." You say. You felt bad for her.

"It gets worse. These things?" She says, referring to her breasts. "They're still growing. I've run tests. They will never stop getting bigger. But it's not all bad. I'm a spokeswoman for the condition now. And being a satyr with a condition that only werewolves, succubi, and gargoyles get has made me a minor celebrity."

Mazee smiles. "I'm glad you've turned you're condition into something good." She says.

For the next two hours, Mazee continues the interview. As she did, you learned more about Cali. She was a nice woman, and she did want to help people, though she missed her job as a proper doctor.

Near the end, you got up to use the bathroom. When you came back, you saw that Mazee...
112311.title: Quite a Rarity

1123111.content:
Mazee was already waiting for you and holds down her black furry hand and you climb into it before she places you on her shoulder. "Thanks for everything, Dr. Denverson," says your rodent girlfriend. This should be a top page." Cali smiles and waves. "Come back anytime Ms. Robinson. Mr. Mertins." Mazee takes you and gets into her car before driving away. “Well that is a rarity,” said Mazee. “Who would’ve thought it would be possible for a monster other than a werewolf, gargoyle or succubus to get LOS.” “That poor woman,” you say. “At least succubi have magical powers and gargoyles are strong enough to carry the weight. Werewolves can barely carry themselves without assistance when they’re inflicted but a satyr?” Mazee shivers. “I wouldn’t want to have LOS. I’d kill my back.” You hold your nose as you imagine Mazee with LOS.

Then you cough because you’re desperate to change the subject. "Oh. I'm looking forward to getting back to the Daily Tombstone with this story." "I'm not looking forward to you getting back," says Mazee. "Not with those vicious man-eaters working there." "Mazee, aren't you overreacting." "Tim," says Mazee. "Aurelia got a new cookbook for her birthday a few weeks ago and I think she's itching to try some recipes with human in them. I also saw Grace eating a breakfast burrito that was screaming." "Come on, Mazee. You're worrying too much. Those two are the only two predators." "One predator is enough. One day, either that fat-bottomed werecheetah or that sneaky werejackal is going to chomp you and spit out your bones."

You bite your lip nervously. "Well, when you put it that way, Mazee." At that moment, you and Mazee come to a red light. However, that was when there's a sudden "THUD!" sound and Mazee yells as the car is jerked forward. You fall off Mazee's shoulder and land in between her toes. You immediately plug your nostrils from the stench of Mazee's feet. Given that Mazee's a rat, you don't want to know what those toes have been touching.

Mazee pulls you out of her toes and places you back on her shoulder before she looks in her mirror and sees that she was rear-ended by a black car. Mazee bites her lip and puts her car in park before she goes out to confront the driver. She angrily pounds on the black car and chatters her rat teeth. "Hey you moron!" she yells. "What's the big idea speeding at a red light!?" Out of the car comes a young (you'd say teenaged) male orc in a blue shirt and gray pants. Surprisingly, this orc is shorter than Mazee. He sees Mazee and is beyond scared at the angry wererat.

"Come on. It's only a little scratch. No need to lose your temper." However, Mazee points to her car hatch and shows that the door is bent, the rear lights are shattered and the mirror is cracked. "That is more than a little scratch! You owe restitution!" The orc boy just twitches his fingers. "I'm broke. But there is something I can give you." The orc holds up a bottle that appears to be shaped like a pair of butt cheeks. It was as big as a barrel to a human like you. "I just bought this potion from a werehippo sorceress. I was planning to use it to get revenge on a cheerleader who turned me down on a date. Just one drop will make a monster's butt expand to 8 times its owners' size. You can use it on enemies." Mazee takes the potion and gives a look at it.

"What use would I have for such a...." That was when Mazee got an idea. "This could be just what you need, Tim?" "Huh?" you ask. Mazee then glares at the orc. "You got yourself a deal. But this had better work." Mazee gets back into her car and soon arrives back at the Daily Tombstone. "Mazee," you say. "That's a terrible deal. It will cost hundreds of skulls to fix your car." "Tim," says your wererat girlfriend. "Think. This could be just the thing. There's only enough for one predator but if you use this on Grace or Aurelia, it will make them too heavy to chase after you."

Mazee hands you the vial and you grunt as you try to hold it. When you finally get a grip, you realize something.This could actually work out in your favor. But who to use the potion on?
1123111.title: Notion of the Potion

11231111.content:
"OK, Tim," Mazee said once you got to an elevator. "I'm going to take Aurelia away for a bit to distract her, then you find a way to get her that potion while she isn't looking, got it?"

"Yep." You say, hoping this will work.

You and Mazee make it up to the 6th floor of the building, where the break room is. Once you both get in, you see Aurelia sitting at a table with a cup of coffee. Mazee puts you and the bottle behind her back and walks up to Aurelia.

"Hey, Aurelia!" Mazee said. "I need your help. One of the printers in the hall broke down."

"AGAIN?" Aurelia said. "I told Anna-Maria that squid ink does not work in our printers!"

With that, Aurelia got up and walked out. Mazee put you and the bottle on the table and followed her. Now was your chance. You climb up the 8 foot coffee cup and hoist the bottle up. Then you remove the bottle's stopper and pour the contents into Aurelia's cup. You then jump off the table and walk to the door. Before you leave, you hide the bottle behind a trash can.

As you exit the break room, Aurelia and Mazee come back. Mazee sees you and quickly scoops you up. Aurelia walks back to the table, grumbling, and grabs the cup. She quickly drinks the entire contents of the cup and leaves again.

"Well, we got lucky." Mazee says once Aurelia is out of earshot. "Turns out one of the printers really was broken. Did you do it?"

"Yup." You say. "Dumped the whole thing in."

"Good. Hopefully, that's one less predator." Mazee says.

You both turn and walk down the hall. You see Aurelia fixing the printer.

Does the potion work right away?
11231111.title: A Cup Of Revenge

choices: Butt First, on Top of Ari and Tara
Front First, Trapped Under Her Own Mass
112311111.content:
At that moment, Aurelia has bent over as she works to fix the printer. "Anna-Maria really did a number on this machine," she says as she growls. "As if I didn't have enough to fix with Tim running afoul of everything. Makes me wonder what I'm going to do when I finally eat him. Oh well." Suddenly, Aurelia grumbles and her good eye twitches. "Ra Almighty!" she yells. "I think I've got a wedgie. Cree must've shrunk my panties in the wash! That's I what I get for trusting somebody who doesn't wear clothes at all to do my laund... urgh!"

The potion works instantly and Aurelia's butt in seconds is as wide as she is tall. The jackal giantess looks back and sees her ginormous booty and drops her jaw as she wiggles her minuscule tail. “What the... whoa!” Aurelia has to grab onto the printer in order to hold her balance as her butt is shaking and threatening to knock her to the ground. “Holy cow!” you yell in surprise. “That stuff really works!” Into the room walks Beth who drops her jaw. “What have you been eating, Aurelia?” she asks. “Your butt is bigger than mine and Fate’s put together.”

Aurelia gives a growl. “Can it, Beth! I didn’t eat anything different today than I usually do. Alright, so maybe I did eat a drug addict human yesterday but all he did was leave me holed up in the bathroom for half an hour.” Aurelia then holds her stomach again and then her butt expands again to the point where it’s three times as big as her. Since Aurelia’s body is very skinny, she was having trouble holding her balance and slipped slightly, crushing the printer and splattering black, cyan, yellow and magenta ink all over her butt, leaving a huge stain that looked like a monstrous face with evil eyes and sharp teeth.

“I don’t know how it happened,” growls Aurelia. “But I’m sure it’s Tim’s fault. Oh well, looks like it’s time to break for lunch.” Aurelia gives an evil smirk and shows her sharp teeth before licking her chops. You gulp as you see the amazingly pear-shaped jackal moving towards you. But as Aurelia steps forward, her butt keeps getting bigger, to the point where it looked like it belonged to a MUCH larger monster girl. It looked three times too big for a werehippo’s behind, to say nothing of a werejackal like Aurelia. The big fleshy pair of spheres was even dragging across the ground. Aurelia gives an evil laugh as she's about to close in on you but then grunts.

Her butt had gotten so large, it was stuck in the hallway. You let out a laugh as the predator crosses her arms and growls. Mazee gives a smirk. "Serves you right for always trying to eat my boyfriend." Aurelia grit her teeth. "Quit gawking and get me out of here, Mazee. Ouch!" On the other side, Tara is literally kicking Aurelia's butt. "Aurelia! Get your big butt out of the way!" "What do you think I'm trying to do, carrion-face!" Tara angrily kicks Aurelia again and Aurelia grabs her stomach in pain, right before she lets out a massive fart into Tara's face and makes her scream. "I've been poisoned!" "Well excuse me!" yells Aurelia angrily. "If I knew this would happen, I would never have eaten that burrito for lunch."

Aurelia then heard a creaking noise. "What the?!" You and Mazee gasp and Mazee grabs you before running off as the floor begins to sink. At that moment, the hallway explodes as Aurelia's butt swells to 10 times its owner's size. Aurelia screams and falls back as the floor breaks and she falls through several floors. Lexi hears the commotion and runs to check it out. "What the film flam!? Oh my gosh!"

Aurelia was at the bottom floor and had landed...
112311111.title: Jackal Booty

choices: Cree arrives, and she is PISSED
1123111112.content:
You and Mazee look down the hole Aurelia made, but you couldn't see her. All you could see was a mountain of teal jackal booty. Both of you laughed, and headed for the stairs to go see her better.

It took you two a few minutes to do so, since Aurelia had fallen all the way to the basement floor. When you got there, the sight was unbelievable. You had to squeeze in because Aurelia's butt filled up half of the room, and actually was poking out of the hole in the ceiling. Poking out from under the mountain of ass was Aurelia's hands and head. And she was very angry.

"This is unbelievable. You've really done it this time, Tim." Aurelia said, furious. "My butt's so gigantic and heavy that I'm pinned under it. I'd need 12 cranes to move this much ass."

Mazee laughed. "Hey, at least Cree might get some fun out of it." She said.

Aurelia growled, but before she could say anything, Lexi walked into the basement.

"WHAT THE HELL DID YOU THIS TIME, TIM? I SWEAR-" Lexi started to yell, but it died in her throat when she saw Aurelia's ass.

"Hi boss." Aurelia said. "Tim here turned my ass into a mountain."

Lexi was still silent. For once, she was so stunned she was speechless. She then turned to you.

"How- what- why-" She stammered. "HOW DID YOU DO THIS?!"

You didn't have time to answer, because...
1123111112.title: Buried under Ass

112311112.content:
You and Mazee watch as Aurelia fixes the printer. After five whole minutes, the printer is repaired and Aurelia goes on her merry way. However, Not once does Aurelia's behind get any bigger, making you and Mazee very confused. "I don't understand," you say. "Her butt is supposed to enlarge to the size of a monster truck." Mazee grits her teeth. "I know what happened," she says. "That orc kid ripped us off so he wouldn't have to pay for damaging my car!" You let out a sigh. "Oh well," you say. "I'm really sorry, Mazee." Mazee lets out a groan.

However, what neither you nor Mazee knew was was the potion was a delayed effect potion and you had left it out near Aurelia’s cup of coffee. At that moment, Fate comes walking by and sees the potion, not knowing what it was. “What’s this?” asks Fate as she picks up the vial. “Hmmm. It looks like a sweetener of some kind. I remember seeing Aurelia here earlier. This must be hers.” Fate then sniffs the potion and then rubs her double chin. “It sure smells good. I don’t think Aurelia would mind if I used some of it.” Fate brews a pitcher of coffee and pours in some of the potion, believing it to be sweetener. The purple gargoyle pours herself a cup and walks away drinking the brew right before Harley comes in and rubs her head. “Aye, aye, aye,” says the wereboar woman. “I got overzealous and drove all the way to Dreadberry before I realized what happened. I need a drink. Rapido.” The Latina wereboar spots the cup of coffee that Fate had just brewed and then poured herself a glass. “Gracias, Fate.” says the goddess-sized porcine.

After Harley leaves, Emma is walking by. However, she doesn’t notice the coffee pot, mostly because of her frankly terrible eyesight. The polar bear giantess notices the potion and squints before she licks her lips. “I thought we were out of honey.” Said the bear giantess. Emma dripped some of the potion into her mouth and lapped it up as Pan-Li walked by the pick up a donut from the box. As Pan-Li takes one bite into the donut, Emma taps her on the back. “Pan-Li,” says Emma. “You have got to try this honey. It tastes like ambrosia of the gods.” Emma pours the potion on Pan-Li’s donut and Pan-Li takes a bite before she moans in delight and then devours the rest of her donut. As Emma licks up a few more drops of “honey”, she pours it on five more donuts before she and her fellow bear titaness walk away.

Once the bears were out of the way, Tara the vampiress and Bea the succubus came in. Tara was scratching the scarred half of her face and groaned. Beatrice rolls her eyes before she takes a potioned donut and Tara pours herself an extra large cup of the tainted coffee. “You know, Tara,” says Beatrice. “You seem stressed out. I know a good spa in Dreadberry that we can go to after we punch out this afternoon. Perhaps Prima and Atlanta can do something about that face.” Tara gives a growl before downing her coffee. “My,” says Bea as she bites into her donut. “Aren’t we nasty today. Well, the offer still stands. I just hope that Lee isn’t there. That woman is a tramp with no control over her libido.” Tara gives a scoff. “This coming from a succubus? Ugh. This coffee tastes a little off.” Lee swallows before speaking and walking away. “So does this donut.”

After the succubus and vampiress leave, Yulong and Blake come in. Blake took a donut and bit into it as Yulong poured herself a cup of coffee and then put some herbs in it. She sniffed it and noticed it was a little cool and then blew flames from her mouth to heat it up. “Yulong,” says Blake to the elderly Chinese dragoness. “You’re old and wise. What am I doing wrong?” “You are referring to Tim, right?” asks Yulong to the weretiger. “My advice is to find somebody else. He’s already dating Mazee. Trying to steal another’s lover will only end in tragedy.” Yulong drinks her coffee as Blake finishes her donut. “Easy for you to say,” says Blake. “You and your husband have been happily married for 200 years.” Yulong shakes her head and she and Blake both leave, leaving Cleotiti and Hecate to walk in. Both were dressed in leg warmers.

Cleotiti was panting to herself before she poured herself some coffee. “Come on, Hecate,” she says weakly. “I agreed to join you for your new exercise regime, but don’t you think you’re overdoing it? We jogged 27 blocks before we got to work.” Hecate eats one of the same tainted donuts that Blake and Bea ate before speaking. “I’m sorry, Cleo,” she says. “But I’ve been getting pudgy lately and I don’t want to be as big as my mom any time soon.” “And how big is Diana Howler, anyway?” asks Cleo. “Ugh. Bad coffee.” Hecate lets out a sigh. “Let me put it this way; if she was human-sized, she’d weigh half a ton. I don’t want that to happen to me. Most of the girls in my family are blimps.” “Says the wolf who just ate a glazed donut.”

After the wolf and mummy leave, Ari comes forward and looks at the coffee pot. The weresheep looks around before she grabs the entire coffee pot and slurps down the entire contents before quickly leaving.” As Ari leaves, Willa comes forward and growls. “Root!” yells your bunyip landlady in her Australian accent. “That selfish sheep yobbo drank all the coffee. I guess I’ll just have some milk.” Willa picks up some milk and pours herself a glass and then grabs one of the donuts that was covered in the potion, leaving only one left. She dips the donut into her milk and then bites into it before drinking the milk. As Willa leaves, Lexi shows up and your boss gives a growl to herself. “Last donut again,” says Lexi. “Better grab it fast before Grace sees it.” Lexi has no idea about the potion on the donut and then bites into it before gagging. “Yuck!” yells the sphinx editor. “Garbage!”

Lexi growls as she walks away. She then tosses the donut in the trash in disgust before stomping away. Mazee comes around the corner with you on her shoulder. "Well," says Mazee with a sigh. "I'll just call my auto club and... hello!" Your rodent girlfriend picks Lexi's donut out of the trash and shakes her head. "Somebody threw out a perfectly good donut." Mazee bites into the donut and you look in shock. "Mazee!" you yell. "That's trash!" Mazee gives a scoff. "Tim," she says. "I'm a rat. What do you expect?" What neither you nor Mazee could possibly know is that Aurelia was indeed under the potions power and it would be an hour until the potion took effect. However, Aurelia was only one of 15 girls to be affected by the potion.
112311112.title: Unwitting Instigator of Doom

1123111122.content:
For this path, the readers will get the choice to choose two monster girls to follow at once, alternating between one of the two girls they select that were affected by the strange potion.

Here are the pairings

"Mazee and Willa"
"Blake and Yulong"
"Tara and Beatrice"
"Fate and Harley"
"Cleo and Hecate"
"Emma and Pan-Li"
"Ari and Lexi"

Who will you follow?
1123111122.title: Follow the Other Girls

11231111222.content: How about following two monsters that are opposites? Do Blake and Yulong sound like good choices?
11231111222.title: A Different Matchup

112311112222.content: How about two lovely ladies associated with darkness on their way to the spa as their behind are about to expand?
112311112222.title: Creatures of the Night?

1123111122221.content:
Bea and Tara got out early from work that day and as such, Bea was taking Tara to the spa she mentioned that was in Dreadberry. The succubus was driving her car all the way to Dreadberry while Tara rode in the backseat inside of a coffin to protect herself from the sun. “This is the last time I carpool with you, Tara,” says Beatrice as she wags her devil-like tail. “I feel like an undertaker.” “I already had half my face burned up in the sun because of that moron, Tim,” says Tara with venom in her voice. “I don’t intend to let the rest of my body burn as well. This salon better be worth it, Beatrice. After all, it’s in Dreadberry. I’m a city girl, born and raised. These hicks better know what they’re doing.” Bea just lets out a sigh and then grunts and scratches her large throbbing purple backside with her sharp red fingernails. “Gee,” says Bea. “I must’ve shrunk my underwear in the wash. I’ve got one killer wedgie.” Tara is feeling similarly uncomfortable. “Oh,” groans the vampire giantess. “This coffin is feeling tight. I knew they ripped me off. I’m going to complain to Mattress Titan!”

It isn’t long until both nocturnal monster girls reached Dreadberry. Dreadberry was a small town in the countryside. The town was so small that they had a sheriff rather than a large police force. Fortunately for Tara, the sky was rather cloudy and she could leave her coffin, albeit with a lot of effort. Her upper body had no trouble, but her lower body wasn’t budging. Bea had to grab Tara by wrists and pull her out, causing both of them to fall down in front of the door to a spa that read “Primordial Earth”. “Outgrowing your coffin are you?” asks Bea. Tara gives a hiss. “Are you saying that I’m fat?!” Beatrice lets out a sigh and then rolls her eyes. “Never mind,” she says. “Never mind.” Both the succubus and the vampiress try to go through the door at once but fail to notice that their butts have gotten rounder and they both struggle as they try to squeeze through. “Out of my way!” yells Tara. “YOU get out of my way!” yells Bea. Both of them wind up bending the door as they both squeeze in.

 There were two stylists in the salon. First was a large pink-skinned and purple red haired leviathan, a type of aquatic dragon with thin glasses and an hourglass figure. The other stylist, to Tara’s surprise was a titanic and obese woolly mammoth with long with hair dressed in an outfit that made her look like a pachyderm version of Storm. Tara looked at the mammoth woman who was getting a chair ready and then looked back at Bea. “Must be a loxodon subspecies.” Beatrice and Tara walked forward, not noticing that both of their rears were much bigger than they remembered. Beatrice’s behind was too big for her skirt to hide and exposed her screaming soul print underwear, whereas Tara’s purple jeans were coming apart at the seams.

“Hello,” says the mammoth in an African American accent. “Welcome to... oh my gosh!? What happened to your face!?” Tara gives a growl. “None of your business. Can you fix it.” The leviathan bites her mouth. “Baby,” she says. “We’re beauticians, not plastic surgeons. From the look of your face, I’d say it’s beyond help.” Tara gives a hiss and then Bea has to run in to calm her down, unintentionally knocking the leviathan woman down with her butt that was now as wide as she was tall and was touching her upper back. “Calm down. We’ll just take the works. My friend is very stressed out.” The mammoth gives a scoff. “That was obvious. We’ll start you up with a massage.” Both Bea and Tara lay down with their large behinds up in the air. The stylist chairs must’ve been reinforced with solid steel given it could still hold them. Tara’s pants had just about been murdered, showing Batgirl-print underwear while Bea’s behind was so big that her tail looked undersized.

“Neil!” yells the leviathan giantess. “Get out here!” “I heard you!” Both Beatrice and Tara look in surprise as the leviathan comes back with a human man who looked like he was in his forties, albeit his hair had already turned gray. The human man looked up in surprise at Tara and Bea’s massive rears that now dwarfed the rest of their bodies. “Uh,” said Neil. “You two young ladies wouldn’t happen to be related to a Mngwa named Michelle would you?” Both Tara and Bea (who obviously hadn’t noticed the transformation) both blink. “Excuse me?” asks Bea in confusion. “Uh,” says Neil. “Never mind.” Tara gives a growl. “Don’t think you can literally walk all over me, human,” she says. “If you hurt me during the massage, it’s down the hatch.” Tara points to the inside of her mouth as Bea looks on in embarrassment. The leviathan just gives a smug smile. “Her,” she says. “I like.”

 Who does Neil get started on first?
1123111122221.title: A Big Vampire and Succubus at the Spa

1123111122222.content: How about we try the duo with two other types of classical monsters?
1123111122222.title: Two Different Night Creatures

11231112.content:
Mazee gave a smirk. "You know, Tim," she says. "We could use this on the stupid mutt, but as a rat, I think it would be more fitting if we got the feline predator out of the way." "Grace?" you ask. "But how are we...?" Mazee gives a scoff. "Tim," she says. "Grace will eat anything. It shouldn't be a problem getting her to drink this potion." You nod your head. That made sense. Grace was the food critic at the Daily Tombstone for a reason. She had a voracious appetite and you didn't know any kind of food that she'd outright refuse to eat. That's why you were afraid of her. You knew that there were some restaurants in the monster world with humans on the menu, which meant that being a human devouring monster was technically Grace's job. To make matters worse was that she acted so friendly. You didn't like the idea of being sent to assist a giantess who could decide to eat you at any moment's notice.

Sure enough, when you and Mazee return to the Daily Tombstone, you hear a scream and then you witness from the shadows on the wall, Grace dropping an unfortunate human victim into her awaiting mouth. You gasp and turn pale white as Grace walks from the corner, having swallowed her prey as she was now licking her lips and tapping her stomach as she shook her already quite large behind from side to side. "Hey, Tim," says the cheetah giantess as she walks away. "Mazee." You shiver as she walks by and then you notice her pear-shaped figure. "Are you sure we should be doing this, Mazee?" you ask your giant rodent girlfriend. "Grace already has a very big butt. I'd say only Fate and Beth outmatch her in that department." Mazee gives a scoff. "And yet she's still able to move as fast as your standard werecheetah. We need to put some extra weight on her to keep her from catching you. She's taking a break for lunch before she reviews another restaurant. Now's a good a time as ever to feed her this potion.

- - -

At that moment, Grace was in the cafeteria chowing down. She had quite a spread in front of her, including 9 hamburgers, 5 hotdogs, a large basket of nachos, and three Polter Colas. She wasted no time starting her lunch. "Good grief," says Mazee. "That werecheetah must've ate a black hole. How could anyone eat so much?" "Says the same girl who ate 5 whole cheese pizzas in a single sitting?" you ask. "Ha-ha," says Mazee sarcastically. What we need is to slip this potion into Grace's binge before that cheetah can be the wiser." Mazee gives a smirk as she crouches down on all fours just as Grace bit into a hotdog covered with ketchup and mustard. Once Mazee was close enough, she slipped the potion into Grace's...
11231112.title: Grace's Better Half

114.content: "I've got the perfect place for you" maze says as she lifts you up to her waistline. you look up at your girlfriends face and notice a sly smirk as she drops you into her panties and lets them snap back in place, forcing you against her warm crevice. "we have a bit of a drive ahead of us so I figured we could have a little fun along the way" she says as she begins to walk towards the buildings garage. wasting no time you begin to rub into her snatch eliciting several moans from your girlfriend. Mazee barely makes it to the garage before she collapses onto the front seat of her car legs twitching in pleasure. "if you keep this up we may not. . . moan. . . make it at all" but you aren't paying attention you are fully focused on your task at hand and begin to work yourself deeper and deeper into your girlfriends quivering hole.
114.title: Business and Pleasure

12.content:
You wait for Lexi’s response but Lexi looks down on you. “You’ve been working with Mazee a lot lately Tim. I understand you two are dating, but it wouldn’t hurt to work with another field reporter. She definitely deserves a break from you. Everyone does. What she could possibly see in a boyfriend the size of a breath mint I’ll never know.” You nod your head. “Sounds fair. So, who am I working with today instead?”

You begin to shake. There were five other field reporters beside Mazee. But most of them made you nervous. The exception being Willa Bong. Willa is Mazee’s best friend and also your roommate, or rather house. The bunyip was a marsupial type monster and you lived in her pouch. Sure, she made you pay rent, but she was reasonable about it. You don’t bother her and she doesn’t bother you. But she was confused as to why a big monster like Mazee would have a tiny human boyfriend.

The next of the field reporters was Anna-Maria the kraken. She wasn’t malicious, but you didn’t like the idea of working with a skyscraper sized woman with the legs of a squid who keeps insisting she has psychic powers. Given all the spelling mistakes you have to correct for her, you don’t see how she could be psychic with her brain power. And she was a total slob. Her work area was completely disorganized and she had a bad habit of spraying squid ink that you found totally foul.

Then there was Pan Li, a pandaren. This monster took the term giant panda to a whole new level. But she only spoke Chinese, a language you couldn’t understand and you had no idea if she was friendly or vicious towards humans. For all you knew, Pan Li could love filling her fat belly with tiny people, but she hasn’t shown any malice to you... yet. But there was a rumor she served time in jail and you have no idea why.

One of the most dangerous coworkers was that vampiress Tara. She has it in for you since you broke that window and exposed half her face to sunlight. You were lucky she wasn’t killed, but Tara most likely wants revenge on you for that scar on her face. You couldn’t even say anything nice about her because she’d take it the wrong way and blow a fuse. You once saw her bite the head off a human who told her he never seen such a giant vampire because she thought he made fun of her weight.

Lastly was your least favorite field reporter and coworker in general, that weresheep Ari. You considered her a snake in sheep’s clothing because she published information in her reports that wasn’t true and managed to hide it from Lexi. You wanted to report the sheep giantess and get her fired for fraud but Ari warned you that she would swallow you whole if you snitched on her and she was serious because you saw her eat humans before. You were terrified that a sheep would actually eat people. That sheep also treated you like you were her slave and pushed you around whenever she got the chance.

Lexi opens her mouth to tell you today you’re working with...
12.title: Fieldwork

choices: Checking out the new exhibit at the Museum
121.content:
"I think maybe you should work with Willa today Tim. She's not quite Mazee but that should be good enough for you." "Got it boss," you say as you salute Lexi. "I'll go find Willa." "Just get out of my office before something breaks." Groans Lexi. You immediately run out of the office and Lexi's eyes pop out. "I can't believe it," she says with a smile. "Tim was just in here and nothing broke. This must be..."

"CRASH!" Upon hearing that noise, Lexi's smile turns into her usual frown. "Kiki, whatever you do, don't tell me what that was." Once you reach the cubicle area, you look around for any sign of Willa. Willa was Mazee's best friend and also the reason you get to work on time everyday. You gotta admit people would call you weird for living in her pouch, but Willa was a marsupial monster, didn't have any kids and she was obviously okay with it seeing as you paid her rent. You're just glad she was reasonable about it.

But where was she, you'd think it would be easy to spot a 500ft hairless green kangaroo with the face of a fanged frog. As you're looking for Willa, you see a giant dragonfly buzzing overhead. The dragonfly lands on the table above you only for you to see something big, long and pink snatch it up. You knew where Willa was, in the direction the tongue was coming from.

By the time you reach her desk, Willa is chewing on that dragonfly like bubblegum before she swallows it. The bunyip giantess puts her laptop away just as she looks down and sees you waving at her from between her clawed toes. "Should've known I'd see you again soon mate. Guess I lost that lotto." You laugh at Willa's comment, thinking it's a joke and then the bunyip girl picks you up and stretches open the pouch in her chest.

As Willa drops you, you land with a thump and a grunt in your recliner in the center of her pouch. "Good thing I moved my easy chair." You say. Outside Willa rolls her eyes and then she hears a clicking noise. You had just turned on the TV and it was a kaiju movie. Willa lets out a sigh and starts to walk off with you in her pouch. "What?" you ask. "I might as well do something until we reach our job." Willa lets out a grumble before she goes to the parking lot to get to her moped."

As Willa drives off, you start to lay down in your chair and yawn. "Say Willa," you say. "What's our mission for today?"
121.title: Willa the Bunyip

1213.content: What else is there for them to report on?
1213.title: Reader's Choice

12131.content:
"Today, we are going to interview a visiting sports start." Willa tells you.

"Cool. Who is it going to be?" You ask.
12131.title: Interview a sports star

choices: Joy. She loves working with humans
Confusion. She didn't know a human was coming
121311.content:
"We've got a visiting star today. Have you ever heard of Satana "The GoatSucker" DelCano?" Willa asks.

"I have." You reply. Satana was a luchadora (female luchador) and was considered one of the best. She was known for being incredibily arrogant, so you were unsure of how this interview would go.

"We're meeting her at a nearby arena where she is doing a signing. She has agreed to let us interview her" Willa tells you.
An hour later, the two of you arrive at the arena. Willa pulls you out of her pouch and puts you on her shoulder. Now, you could see the crowd Satana had drawn. There were hundreds of people outside, all waiting for her autograph. And in the center of that crowd, was Satana herself.

The woman was a chupacabra, standing at 850 feet tall. Her yellow eyes were blazing behind her red mask. She has a short tall and spines on her back. She was pretty athletic looking, slim but muscular. She was decked out in her usual uniform, a red sports bra with black flames and black tights.

Making her way through the massive throng of people, Willa managed to reach Satana.

"Satana DelCano?" Will asks, attempting to start the interview.

"Please, miss, call me the GoatSucker!" Satana replied.

"GoatSucker. I'm Willa Bong. We have schedueled an interview with you?"

"Of course. How could I forget? The public must know me better!" Satana tells Willa before turning to the crowd.

"I AM SORRY, EVERYONE, BUT I MUST GO! I HAVE AN INTERVIEW TO DO! BUT DON'T WORRY, YOU CAN SEE ME TONIGHT IN THE RING, AS I TAKE OUT THAT WIMP HELLICA!"

Satana turns back to you admist the roaring crowd. Before she can talk to Willa, she sees you on her shoulder. What's her reaction?
121311.title: The GoatSucker

12133.content: Who else is there to interview?
12133.title: Readers Choice

121332.content: So, which candidate will you interview?
121332.title: A political candidate

1213321.content:
"Here's the deal. Marsha Red is in town for a televised debate, and we have been given the chance to interview her." Will told you, before handing you a picture of Marsha leaving a luxary hotel.

Marsha was a 900 foot tall living scarecrow, her body being made of straw in an hourglass shaped burlap sack. Her head was also a burlap sack, with cut out eyes, a cut out mouth, and a short, red wig on top of her head.

Marsha was a politician, starting out as a lawyer in Texas. She moved up the ranks and is currently running for state governor. She was not the typical politician: for one, she actually cared about the issues in the state and wanted to help. She was also know to be a nice woman. Maybe the interview would go well.

"Are you sure we get to interview Marsha and not Elisha?" You ask.

"Oh god, I hope it's not Elisha." Willa replied.

Elisha Connors was Marsha's campaign manager, an hourglass shaped ventriloquist dummy with short brown sculpted hair and green glass eyes. What really creeped you out was how, like other dummies, Elisha's mouth never fully moved.

Elisha was one of the dirtiest people in politics you knew. She did everything to help her career, from slander to lying about goals. In fact, you heard that Marsha never used speeches Elisha made for her. You had to wonder why Marsha didn't fire her.

"So where is Marsha?" You ask.

"She's staying at the Black Moon Motel in room 302. She picked a low key place so people wouldn't find her. The Daily Tombstone is the only newspaper in town to know." Willa answered.

After about an hour of driving, you both arrived at the Black Moon Motel. It was a nice place run by an oni named August, though she preffered Sandy for unknown reasons. Willa parks the car and gets out. She took you out of her pouch and set you on her shoulder. She walked up to room 302 and knocked on the door. A few seconds later, the door opened. On the other side was...
1213321.title: A Literal Straw Woman (kinda)

choices: You help her clean her room
You and Anna-Maria conduct the interview at the K.D.P.
122.content:
“Guess who you are working with today, you are working with Anna-Maria, the kraken. I will admit one thing, you don’t want to smell that ink of hers, as it may be the worst thing you might ever smell in your entire life, and be warned, you might have a problem working with her today, as well… let’s just say you wouldn’t want your office to be like hers.” Lexi said just as you now go to the kraken’s room to see that her office space is completely disorganized, and you thought. “Mary Mother of God, I would not want to work in an office like this.”

“Sorry Tim, I am completely disorganized looking for my pen, pencil, and my notebook.” The kraken said just as she opens the door after hearing Tim and Lexi, and Tim was right. Her room was a complete nightmare. They were paper everywhere, and her room was a horrific mess, and heck, there was even ink. “I predict that you will be…” Anna-Maria said before Lexi snapped. “Furious!”

“Your room is a complete nightmare, and unless you want to be back in the ocean with no job at all and no way to support your family, I suggest you start getting more organized, now you got to interview Sylvia today at the K.D.P. today, a human suspect of a crime that she never committed, I don’t know how I got this job, but it’s got to be done, as soon as you clean up this room!” Lexi ordered before Tim gets off and leaves Lexi alone so he can be with Anna-Maria.

“Sorry about the room Tim, it’s just… it’s a long story.” Anna-Maria said, and then you started to throw up from that horrid ink you smell.

What happens now?
122.title: Can’t you be more organized?

choices: A new exhibit at the museum
123.content:
"I think I'll have you work with Pan-Li today Tim." You actually scratch your head at that. "I don't know Lexi. I don't know is she likes me that much." Lexi lowers her head and shows you her teeth. "I don't like you that much either Tim. Just get going or I'll hit the ceiling." "Y-Yes boss." You say nervously before you run out the door. You then realize that the door is still slightly, so you jump up and grab the edge before shutting the door, albeit accidentally slamming it in the process.

That's when you hear a loud crash. You slamming the door had managed to knock loose a chandelier that landed on top of Lexi. You walk under the door and see Lexi clobbered by the chandelier and shaking off broken glass from her fur. "Hey Lexi," you say with a slight laugh. "Looks like the ceiling hit you first." Lexi roars in anger and glares at you. "Get out of my face before I freaking kill you!" You run off in pure fear looking for Pan-Li as Lexi gets so angry she begins to scratch at her own rug. "I HATE that human!"

You look all around for Pan-Li when you reach the cubicle area, nearly getting stepped on by that new succubus intern Bea Zebub in the process. You come to a table leg and start to pant. It wasn't easy moving around with your coworkers being as big as buildings. That's when you notice a familiar pair of black furred feet covered in sandals and run forward to look up at a big white beer belly covered in a Chinese dress. "Found her." You say to yourself.

You run up to Pan-Li's foot, but Pan-Li moves it and accidentally kicks you screaming up into the air. You flap your wings and brace for impact when you land with a splash. You surface and see that you're in a cup of ramen noodles the size of sea serpents. Pan-Li, the pandaren titaness is directly above you and looking down in confusion as she sucks on some of the noodles. "Uh, hi there Pan-Li." Pan-Li greets you in Chinese. You still couldn't get why she didn't speak English since it was clear she understood it.

You try to stand up but you trip on one of the noodles and splash back in the water. Pan-Li lets out a laugh at you as she brings her chopsticks down and grabs you by the leg. "Pan-Li!" you yell. "Hey! What are you...!" Pan-Li takes you up to her face and licks you slightly. She speaks in Chinese again before she places you on her shoulder. You wish you could understand what that literal giant panda says. But you were slightly afraid of her. Mazee, Yulong and Willa assured you that Pan-Li was friendly, but Emma, Kiki and Anna-Maria told you humans were her favorite food. But since you never saw Pan-Li actually eat a human you didn't know if this was true. You also remember hearing that Pan-Li was in Under Gloom but you didn't know what crimes she was charged with.

Pan-Li sucks down the rest of her ramen before telling you in Chinese that it was time to go. You take out your camera as the pandaren giantess starts to walk out of the cubicle area and out the building. So, what news story were you two going to cover?
123.title: Giant Panda

choices: she's nice...and a bit TOO friendly to you!
Back at the Daily Tombstone with Mazee...
1233.content:
Pan-Li, with you on her shoulder, hopped on the bus and paid the fair for you both, telling the driver something, to which the monster nodded before she sat down. You had to wonder where you two were going, seeing as she had spoken in chinese. As the bus drove on, you saw that it was taking you into the chinatown section of the city.

You shrug that off, a lot of monsters with chinese origins stay there, and you could be doing an interview. Nothing unusual...just so long as you didn't have to put up with snobby types like that Jiang Shi you knew before you were kicked out of Horrorville...that blue deva bitch, Vivian. Never wanted to see her again.

You partner on this got up and exited the bus after a few blocks into the heart of chinatown and walked to someone's house. Huh...looks like interview it is. You wonder who you meeting...hoped that they spoke english. It'd be a pain if they didn't.

Pan-Li seemed to know exactly where she was going, which part of you found odd. But setting up a private interview this may not have been too unusual.

She raised a paw/hand and knocked on one of the doors and it opened. Odd thing was it was as though the door hadn't been opened from the inside...more like it was stuck.

The panda-girl and you entered the cozy little apartment. It had a simple design. A desk, a table, and a bed occupied the larger room. Naruto saw a small kitchen and a bathroom at the far end.

Where was the one you were going to be doing a story on?

Suddenly, Pan-Li's hand-paw reached up and she held it out to you, palm-up. You climbed onto it, then...

"AAGH!"

She started squeezing you! While your bones and organs weren't damaged, the pain was too much and you passed out...



When you awoke, your whole body hurt, and were those...?

Your eyes widened. BARS?! Bolting to your feet, you see Pan-Li sitting in the desk chair, smiling at you with triumph.

You were caught in a chinese cricket cage!

Pan-Li smiled at you as she stood up and walked over to her answering machine and pressed a button on it. As soon as she did, you heard Lexi's voice come over it.

Hello jinx! In case Li's playing this message for you, that means our plan worked! Now you'll never again cause me any trouble at the office! I was going to kill you, but this is a lot more satisfying! I hope you know I'll be posting you in the obituaries column so nobody looks for you! In the meantime, enjoy belonging to Pan-Li as her property that she can do as she pleases to whenever she wants for...ho, you'll love this--THE REST OF YOUR LIFE!

After that, the message was your boss's laughing and it turned off. Leaving you stunned.

You couldn't believe this! You were...this was Pan-Li's...your boss literally sold you out and now you were Pan-Li's PROPERTY?! No way!

You were brought back from your shock as Pan-Li sat back down at her desk and her massive, black furred feet propped up in front of you and the toes wiggled, knocking against your prison. The Pandaren laughed as you pulled uselessly at the bars. You don't bother yelling at her to let you out...she couldn't understand you anyways. Ho man! what did she want with you?!

Pan-Li smiled.
1233.title: Foreign Detainment

choices: She Takes a Bath with You
She Takes a Shower with You
12331.content:
You expect Pan-Li to torture you and maybe even eat you given the fact that she did time in prison and you see her lick her upper lip but then she smiles at you again and it looks like a sweeter smile this time and even flickered her eyes at you as she sung a strange Chinese song. "Huh?" you ask. Pan-Li giggles and then speaks in Chinese. "I'm sorry," you say nervously. "I don't speak Chinese."

Pan-Li laughed and was shaking her big fat panda hips. She definitely didn't speak English but from the looks of it, she was really happy to see you. She even undid the bun on her hair to let it all down, leaving you even more confused. Then you look in horror as the pandaren giantess starts to unbutton her dress and then take it off. You see that she was wearing a bra underneath but no panties. Then you see her wink at you and stick out her tongue right before she tosses off her bra.

Pan-Li begins to sing again before she holds her naked butt in front of your cage and you begin to shake in place. "I should've known!" you yell. "You're just as bad as Blake and Beth." Pan-Li giggled and spoke again.

What is she going to do now that she has you in her power?
12331.title: Too Friendly

123311.content:
Pan-Li begins to sing again before she holds her naked butt in front of your cage and You did not like how she was wiggling her large panda rear in the air.

"Uh, Pan-Li?" you say nervously. Pan-Li unlocked the door to your cage as you shook in place. You try to run to the back of the cage, but the female panda grabs you and lifted you in front of her bright white face with her black masked eyes and started laughing.

She quickly set to work on something: Removing your clothes. You yelped as she tore them away easily, the size difference and her claws making short work of what you were wearing. You use you hands to cover your privates, making the ursa laugh again before she carried you, the bear giantess swinging you back and forth by the ley that's between her fingers, into the bathroom.

You didn't like this, and your feelings of foreboding was proven true when the black-&-white bear spoke to you in Chinese, then set you down in the tub.

Warning bells went off in your head, “BATH!”

Pan-Li grabbed one of the water temperature knobs, then...WUSH!
