She is now laying on her belly so it is a 90 degree climb out of her ass. Her walls are slimy and hard to grab on to. You just pray that you can make it to her anus before she gets up.

If you could just get to the beginning of Pan-Li's fur, you'd be able to climb out much easier and get away!

An hour passes and you were half way from where you started to her anal opening. If you could just get to her fur, this escape would be so much easier. After hours, you finally feel the tree trunk-like strands of fur outside of Pan-Li's fur and hastily grab it. The first breath of fresh air is truly beautiful as you manage to at least pull yourself from the waist up out of the infatuated Pandaren's butt crack. You take a deep breath and savor the air, it almost made you want to cry.

You were so delighted that you didn't even notice how quiet the room was.

Wait...quiet...?

But that means...OH CRAP!

You look up and pale at the sight of a massive hand-paw coming towards you! Shit! You took so long getting free, that Pan-Li had time to wake up and recover from the hangover! Dammit!

You squirm, but all that causes is a moan from the Ursidae, who then plucks you from between her back cheeks with pathetically laughable ease and brings you around to her face. You continue to squirm in her grip before she brings you up to her lips and begins to make out with you, despite you tasting of her rancid bowels. Pulling you away, Pan-Li smiled at you and said something in Chinese, then laughs.

She stands up and stretches, making a show of it, you guess for your "benefit", before setting you down on her nightstand and heading to her bathroom. You hear the shower running and almost long for it yourself after so long in Pan-Li's butt.

After hours of waiting, Pan-Li emerges, fully dried off and wrapped in a towel, winks at you, then heads to her closet and after a few moments, comes out dressed in a pair of workout shorts and a tank top, along with some tennis shoes.

You gulp as she picks you up and...
123311121211.title: Pan-Li Returns Home

123311121212.content: Pan-Li was walking clumsily all around left and right. She sign something you couldn’t understand and suddenly feel her swing around a street light making you a bit dizzy. If you weren’t wedged securely in here rear end do to the wedgie she gave herself earlier you most likely would have fallen out of her pandaren rear. Just as you were getting you bearings back, you her say something in Chinese and falls on to what you can only guess is bench squeezing you between her fur cover cheeks as she beg gyrate . Only hoping that Pan-Li didn’t pass out here, god knows what could happen if. You begin contemplating whether or not. If you did escape you’d have no idea where you were. Even if you could escape, you didn’t know where you are you would have no idea who you’d run into, if they would help you or make you their next meal or worse. As you were contemplating what to do, you are lifted up as you hear your captor get on a bus. “ I didn’t know the buses ran this late” What you did know is that this bus was running this late because this bus was...
123311121212.title: Something Else Happens on her Way Home

12331112122.content:
As you're wondering what to do about the situation, Pan-Li lets out a small fart that blows you out of her panties and onto the barstool. You gag and gasped from air having breathed in panda gasp but then you feel motion and see Pan-Li getting up. From the looks of it, she was leaving and didn't remember about you. "Thank goodness." You say.

But then you realize something. You were still in a nightclub for monsters. This place was downright dangerous. There were all manners of monsters dancing about and as the nue bartender was cleaning a glass, you saw a cobra based naga slithering to the bar stool and climbing it. You yell and slide down the naga's coils as she takes her seat on the barstool.

Once you're on the floor, you have to immediately run out of the way as a cockatrice and a weresheep nearly trample you beneath their feet. You then pause as a weretiger and a shishi twirl in the direction where you were going to be walking. Then you have to slide to safety and then look up to see that red ox like minotaur, the very same one that Brianna and Cameron wanted to hook Mazee up with. You grit your teeth but remember you have to get out of that nightclub and maybe you could find some way to get to the other side of Fearfield and reach Mazee and Willa.

However, you find yourself being kicked to the side by an oblivious dragon man and you bounce off the wall before landing in the glass of a flying pig woman. You spit out the tequila before you slip out of the glass and slide down it before you could be swallowed. You then bounce off the pig woman's stomach and groan because you accidentally wounded your foot and then you start to walk forward with a limp, dodging the fast moving feet of a qilin, wererabbit, kappa and phoenix.

With each step your pain gets worse but you're almost to the door and you can get out of this nightmare nightclub.
12331112122.title: At Last

choices: Brianna and Cameron calm down and decide who gets you
Pan-Li notices the arguement and investigates
123311121222.content:
Escape was almost in reach when you heard a sound that chilled your blood.

"Oh. My. God."

It came from behind you but you'd recognize Brianna's voice anywhere. You didn't bother turning around, you just tried to limp faster. It was no use as your girlfriend's sister snatched you in her paw easily and brought you up to eye-level. Cameron leaned over to see what her sister had grabbed.

"Holy crap, is that a human? In a monster club? It must be the dumbest person alive," Cameron said.

Brianna laughed. "You're not wrong! Take a closer look!"

Cameron saw your fragile form and her eyes widened in surprise. "Tim?" she asked.

You gulped. "Hi Cameron... hi Brianna," you said nervously.

"What are you doing here Tim?" Brianna asked. "You look a lot less deceased than what your obituary said."

As much as you loved Mazee, her sisters terrified you. They were monsters who'd rather have you for a snack than for a possible brother-in-law. It was no wonder you trusted them about as far as you could throw them... And since you couldn't even lift one of their pinkie toes, that wasn't saying much. You'd much rather have escaped and risked the dangers of the city streets rather than ever have to ask two of them for help. Right now though, there was no choice. You'd have to tell them what happened and pray they'd have mercy on you.

"You see the drunk panda at the bar?" you asked.

Brianna and Cameron looked over at Pan-Li. Your former captor was drinking and shaking her ass to the music, blissfully unaware that you'd escaped her foul prison.

"She works with me at the Daily Tombstone. Lexi sold me to her to get rid of me! She made up that whole obituary so she could cover up what she did!"

Brianna sighed. "I should've known we'd never be lucky enough for you to be trampled in Chinatown. Couldn't you have stayed a prisoner of that panda and let everyone think you're dead? For Mazee's sake? Then she could've gotten a real man instead of kept pretending someone at the bottom of the food chain is good enough for her."

As much as that hurt, you didn't fire back. Brianna seemed to think they were obligated to return you to Mazee and there was no way in hell you would've said anything that could've endangered that.

"I'm... sorry," you said reluctantly. "May you please take me back to Mazee?"

"Fine," Brianna grumbled. "Let's just--"

Cameron cut her off with a loud, put-upon sigh. "Really, Brianna? Take him back? You're lucky you're pretty because I obviously got all the brains. Think about it. Lexi wants him gone, Mazee thinks he's dead, no one knows we have him. This is the perfect chance to get rid of him once and for all!"

"Ooooh!" Brianna squealed in happiness at the realization. "Good thinking, sis!"

"No, please! You can't do this!" you cried.

Brianna casually put her thumb over your face muffling your pleas. She licked her lips menacingly. "I've been waiting for this day for a long time. I've been saving a recipe for just this occasion."

"Hey wait a minute!" Cameron said. "Why do you think you get to eat him? Without me, you'd just take him back to Mazee!"

"Well I'm the one who found him in the first place. It's only right I get to eat him. You'd just waste hours giving him a makeover and ruin all his natural flavor!"

"Nothing would ruin his flavor more than being eaten with that garbage you prepare!"

Brianna puffed in outrage. "How dare you?!"

While the twins argued, you furiously squirmed in Brianna's grasp, trying to break free and run. This was exactly what you feared. Instead of getting help from Mazee's sisters, they just decided to put you on the menu. You were wondering how this could get any worse when you noticed black-and-white movement from the corner of your eye. Pan-Li was on her hands and knees around the bar. She'd finally realized you escaped and was looking for you. Other people in the club were starting to notice the twins heated argument. If they kept this up, Pan-Li would notice soon. Drunk or not, when she saw two wererats arguing over who got to eat a human they found, she'd put two-and-two together.

What was worse, you wondered. Getting reclaimed by that psycho panda or ending up in the gut of one of these bloated rats?
123311121222.title: Mazee's Sisters Spot You

1233111212221.content:
"Alright, calm down!" Cameron whispered, noticing the stares they were getting from fellow monsters. She grabbed Brianna by the arm and led her away. You lamented as you were carried away from your one possible source of rescue. Pan-Li kept looking for you on the floor, oblivious to you being carted away.

"I have an idea," Cameron said. She reached into her purse and pulled out a coin. "We'll flip for him. The winner gets to eat him, the loser stays here and gets that minotaur's phone number for Mazee."

"Fine," Brianna said.

It felt like you'd been stabbed in the heart. Just when you thought you couldn't feel any lower, the two titans before you were planning both your execution and your replacement. You may have lived in a world of monsters, but these two literally were monsters. You struggled harder, not just in fear, but in actual anger now. The twins noticed and snickered.

"Awww, poor Timmy-wimmy," Brianna said in baby talk. "Does it make you sad that you're gonna be melted down into flab while Mazee gets hot and heavy with a real man?"

"You should feel grateful," Cameron said. "We're going to make sure she gets a lifetime of happiness, something she could never get from you. If you ever truly loved her you'd feel happy for her and let her get on with her life."

Your screams of anguish mixed with anger. Tears ran down your cheeks.

"You're crying?" Cameron asked. "Pathetic."

"Hurry up and flip the coin, sis!" Brianna said, licking her lips. "I want to eat him while he's still salty from his tears!"

"Don't get ahead of yourself. I'll flip the coin and you call it."

Cameron flipped the coin and as it reached the top of its arc, Brianna called out, "TAILS!"

Cameron caught the coin in one hand and flipped it into the other. What did it land on?
1233111212221.title: Flip For Him

choices: Oh, She's Definitely Gonna Eat You
1233112.content:
The panderan giggled as you struggled in her grip. She took a wine glass from a cupboard and put it on the counter. With another giggle she dropped you into it. She then pulled out a pot, filled it with water and put it on the stove to heat up. She grabbed a pack of noodles and placed it beside your glass. Pan-Li pointed at your miniscule form and said something to you. In spite of the language barrier, her meaning was obvious. "Don't move."

She walked out of the kitchen, swaying her hips as she did, and before she passed out of sight she gave you one last sultry look over her shoulder. The moment she was out of sight, you tried to escape, but the walls of the glass were too high and too smooth, and no matter how hard you tried to climb, you'd just slide down without making any progress whatsoever. "I gotta get out of here," you thought. "Who knows what she'll do next?! I could be part of those noodles she's making! No, no," you said to yourself. "I'm being silly. She obviously likes me, so she can't be planning on eating me... Right? Damn it! How is my best case scenario here that I'm going to be savaged by a lovelorn panda?!"

Minutes passed, and you could hear the sounds of Pan-Li getting ready. She began singing that damn song again as the water began to boil. Eventually she returned. She was wearing a new dress, similar in style to her old one, only this one was dark red with golden flowers on it. She had reapplied her make-up and black lipstick. Her hair was dry but still undone from her typical bun. She paused in her song to blow you a kiss before heading over to the stove and preparing her noodles. You watched her with a lump in your throat and every now and then she would look over at you to giggle.

"She's not gonna eat me," you thought, trying desperately to reassure yourself. "She's not gonna eat me, she's not gonna eat me."

You repeated that mantra for several minutes until her cooking was done. She prepared a single plate with a massive portion of noodles for herself, then grabbed your glass and a bottle of wine, and sat down at her table. She tipped you out of the glass to fill it with wine, and caught you in her giant paw. Despite the admittedly wonderful smell of the meal she'd prepared, it was only when she looked at you that she licked her lips.

Your knees nearly gave out while standing in the palm of her hand.

"She's not gonna eat me, she's not gonna eat me, she's not gonna eat--"
1233112.title: Pan-Li's kitchen

12331122.content:
"C-come on, Pan Li," you said nervously, "you didn't really go through all this trouble of getting me from Lexi just to kill me, right?!"

In response, Pan Li delicately plucked you off her palm between two fingers. She looked at you with seeming tenderness then raised you to her puckered lips. It surprised you how delicately she handled you as she kissed you, pressing you lightly against her lips. After several seconds the smallest tip of her tongue poked out and touched your face. She pulled you away as you gagged on her spit. She looked at you sultrily, with half-lidded eyes, and for just a moment you thought that the giant panda really did care about you too much too harm you.

It was then Pan Li said the only sentence you ever understood her say.

"Tim, yummy!"

Oh no.

With a wink, she tipped her paw, causing you to fall directly into her bowl of noodles. It was like falling into a bunch of sticky ropes. You struggled to get free but the more you squirmed, the more trapped you became. Not even a minute later, you had somehow completely tied yourself up in noodles.

Pan Li laughed and raised her chopsticks, clicking the tips together in a way that was both playful and menacing. To your relief, she didn't grab you right away. Instead she selected noodles near the edge of the bowl. Maybe she just wanted your fear to build up. If that was the case, it was definitely working. You watched as Pan Li brought the noodles to her mouth and greedily slurped them up. Despite how elegantly she was dressed, her table manners were atrocious. She chewed loudly, with her mouth open, and made almost obscene moans of pleasure as she devoured her meal.

You kept trying to wriggle free of your bonds, or at least crawl out of the bowl, but to no avail. You must've looked ridiculous as Pan Li kept laughing at you as she continued eating. Quickly, the amount of noodles in the bowl got smaller and smaller. Even if you did miraculously get free, you knew the edges of the bowl were too high for you to climb. With amazing skill, Pan Li managed to finish off every noodle in the bowl, except for one final cluster in the center where you were imprisoned. Pan Li licked her lips in anticipation.

"Pan Li, please!" you cried out desperately. "I thought we were friends! I have a girlfriend! Think of Mazee! She's always been nice to you! You don't have to do this!"

Pan Li paused as if considering, then lowered her head to the bowl so that her face was all you could see above you.

"UUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!"

Pan Li unleashed a disgusting belch into the bowl, washing you with a wave of stale air that reeked of noodles. Her face blocked any fresh air from entering and you coughed at the stink. Pan Li laughed as if it was the funniest thing she ever saw in her life. Wiping away a tear from her eye, she decided to get down to business.

Her chopsticks descended with a grim finality, clutching the edge of the noodles entrapping you. She raised their end to her mouth and began to slurp. You were tied up on the other end, and struggled to get free. Slowly you were dragged closer and closer to the greedy hellhole that was her mouth. As you writhed, you were amazed when one arm finally got free.

"YES!" you cried out triumphantly. Pan Li didn't seem concerned however, she kept eating at the same steady pace.

"You shouldn't underestimate me," you thought.

Next you got the other arm free, then a leg. Pan Li's obscene munching continued. She was practically on top of you! With a final burst of strength, you got your other leg free!

SUCCESS!

You got up and began running from your gluttonous doom... Only for your foot to snag at the last second on the final noodle.

Pan Li giggled cutely, and you screamed as you were dragged up into the air, and were slurped into her mouth. Once you were inside, Pan Li dropped her chopsticks and leaned back in her chair. She moaned in satisfaction, tasting her wonderful prize. Inside, her mouth smelled just as foul as the belch she unleashed on you not a minute ago. The air was hot and moist, and though you tried to run to the front of her mouth, her tongue slammed into you, squishing you between it and her cheek. Pan Li was in ecstasy as she sampled your taste, running your puny body over hill sized taste buds. Her saliva soaked through your clothes, and bits of noodle still stuck to her tongue clinged to you instead. For several minutes you suffered her savage tongue lashing, until at last she relented. Your battered and bruised form laid defeated on her tongue. You were too weak to try to escape. You knew what would come next, and so did she. Maybe Pan Li didn't want to swallow. Maybe she wanted to enjoy your taste forever. But you both knew that was impossible, and, almost reluctantly to part with your flavor, he colossal tongue arched backwards and sent you sliding to the back of her throat.

Pan Li gave a final gulp and you were gone, sliding down into the depths of the panda girl's giant stomach. You landed with a splash in the tingling juices of her stomach, and found just enough strength to swim over to a semi-solid glob of rice. You collapsed on top of it, panting. Pan Li gave off a colossal belch even bigger than before, nearly deafening you inside her stomach, then patted her tummy happily.

"Is this really the end?" you thought. "Digested inside a giant panda? Can't believe that bitch Lexi is actually going to win... I'm sorry Mazee..." you thought, blacking out.

Outside, Pan Li gave off another, smaller, belch and smacked her lips, happy to have the taste of you in her mouth again even if it was fleeting. Tim was certainly the most delicious little human that Pan Li had ever eaten in her entire life. She knew from the moment she first saw him at work that she needed to have him inside her. It was just lucky that none of those other gluttons had snagged him first. That wererat certainly didn't know what she was missing, just dating him instead of devouring him. Pan Li sighed. She was sad that her and Tim's time together was over. Her only regret was that she could only eat Tim once, because she'd certainly eat him every day if she could.

With a final gulp, Pan Li finished off her wine and went to get ready for bed. She still had work tomorrow.
12331122.title: Definitely Gonna Eat You

choices: She Sits Her Huge Butt Down On You
She Invites Some Friends from Prison to Join the Fun
12332.content:
Pan-Li's smile turns into a cruel smile that showed her teeth as her eyes narrowed. You let out a gulp as Pan-Li holds out a claw and then moves it through the bars of the cricket cage. She appears to be singing some kind of strange song in Chinese. You did not like how she was looking at you and wiggling her large panda rear in the air.

"Uh, Pan-Li?" you say nervously. Pan-Li puts some incense in the room before she continues to laugh wickedly and started to unlock the door to your cage as you shake in place. You try to run to the back of the cage, but Panda grabs you by the foot and you yell in pain as she squeezes it She lifts you in front of her bright white face with her black masked eyes and you see her laughing as her fangs and tongue move around. You're scared out of your wits. You really hope that Pan-Li doesn't plan on eating you.

Of course, reality is much crueler than fiction because Pan-Li takes out what looks like a small spiked Chinese-style collar and attaches it around your neck. You gag because the collar is tight. She was really keen on making sure you knew you were her property now. "Come on, Pan Li," you say. "This is... AAAAAAA!" You let out a scream of pain as a sudden shock runs through your body. It was a shock collar!

Pan-Li laughed as her large body jiggled and then she rubbed her chin. This was real bad. The rumor about her spending time in Under Gloom was all too true. You don't know specifically what, but from the looks of it, torture was an all too likely possibility.

Now what does that crazy pandaren do to you?
12332.title: Evil Panda

choices: Pan-Li comes up with a new torture
Pan-Li wants to practice some Chinese martial arts...YOU'RE her training dummy!
123321.content:
The crazy pandaren grabbed your right arm and tore the sleeve off before grabbing your exposed arm between her fingers. The torture-loving bear's thumb started adding pressure onto the elbow, making you scream in agony. Pan-Li just smiled at her little living property as she continued to twist your arm.

"Please! No more!" you pleaded, not caring that she couldn't understand your words, as she would clearly understand their meaning. But you started screaming again as Pan-Li smiled and shook her head 'no' and continued to twist your arm and break the bone.

Finally, with one snap, your arm was broken.

Tears were sent to your eyes and yells, shouts and cries of pain came from your mouth. As your screams died down, Pan-Li was still clutching you and was laughing; enjoying seeing the pain and suffering in her prey and started to squeeze you with both hands.

She squeezed a few more times, breaking some of your ribs before she spun on her heel and threw you like a fastball, making you feel like your flesh was going to rip from your bones from the G-force and the wind. before you slam into the back of a padded chair and bounced off it and landed with an impact that you were surprised didn't kill you onto the cushion.

Wait...the...HO SHIT!

Pan-Li waddled right towards your direction and loomed over you, laughing as she looked down on you before she turned around and your view was filled with her massive, wiggling rear.

NO!

You try to move, but when you did, pain from your recent injuries shot through you and left you helpless and incapacitated as Pan-Ll slowly lowered her butt down and you whimpered when it looks like it will hit you. Surprisingly though, the booty freezes just before it crushes you. You look up to see Pan'Li's butt moving upwards.

You wonder if she changed her mind when THUD! Pan-Li slams her booty down on you like two meteors of Armageddon and started bouncing up and down on you, as well as squirming in her seat as if trying to get a feel for you, causing you further pain as you scream as she shifts around on top of you. You HAD to get away from this or she could kill you!

Using your good arm, you reach up and clung to Pan-Li's stubby tail, which was big enough for you to live on. You couldn't get a very good grip and you're forced to have one hand support your entire body weight, but you were at least able to pull yourself free from being directly under Pan-Li.

Pan-Li stopped with her booty-play as she stopped hearing you screaming and she stood, checked the seat, then grinned as she retched back with her hands and started searching to make sure you weren't dead.

You gulp as you watch her hands trail through the fur on her butt cheeks, hunting for you. you shuttered in terror at the thought. PLEASE don't let her check her tail! Finally, finding nothing, the hands pull away and out of your sight. You let out a breath you didn't realize you hand been holding, when...

"AAAAAAA!" You let out a scream of pain as a sudden shock runs through your body from Pan-Li's shock collar!

That was all it took to make to loose your delicate grip and you fall. As everything zooms past, a massive black blur suddenly moves and you feel like you'd been struck with a freight train and you zoomed away and sent you flying where you smacked into the back of the padded chair's cushion again.

You feel hurt and disoriented, but you can hear Pan-Li's laughing over the ringing in your skull.

Pan-Li had kicked you!

When you feel the world stop spinning, you look up to see the female panda grinning at you, seemingly impressed and amused at what had happened.

Then she says something to you in Chinese that you can't understand. But you knew it wasn't good, if anything she was telling you what she was going to do to you now.
123321.title: Can't BEAR this torture

choices: Pan-Li Moves Onto the More Advanced Techniques
Pan-Li Tries a Different Form of Torture
1233212.content:
You're shaking as Pan Li looks at you and laughs wickedly. She then punches the ground where you were to send you flying and as you're in the air, the panda giantess swings her arms to beat you and bounce you off the wall.

With every bounce your ears begin to ring and you even start to bleed. As you start to become even more terrified for your life just as Pan Li used her knee to throw out your back as you yell and even spit out a tooth. Then the panda does a spinning kick to knock you with a grunt into the ceiling. As you're falling the bear giantess jumps and initiates a flying kick and knocks out a few more of your teeth.

As you're flying you recognize those attacks as kung fu moves. You were a training dummy for this sadistic panda. Panda then utilizes a jujutsu kick and you land hard on the ground before she punches the ground and pushes you into the wall. At this point, your forehead is bleeding and not only is one of your arms broken, but one of your legs is broken as well.

The panda giantess then lets out an evil laugh and chops the ground to further damage your body. You even cough a few times.

The panda laughs more viciously as she picks you up into the air and then punts you into the sky as you scream. As you're tumbling through the sky, you see your life flashing by you. All the accidents you caused in the human world, that photo shoot it Horrorville when you accidentally spilled hot tea on Vivian Wong's lap, your first day on the job at the Daily Tombstone, accidentally setting Lexi's tail on fire that one time, the day you met Mazee.... "Mazee." You think to yourself. By now your were rat girlfriend probably thinks that you're dead.

You let out a yell before Pan-Li slaps you into the wall and laughs at you. You slide down the wall slowly and groan. Well, Mazee might not be too wrong if this keeps up.
1233212.title: Kung Fu Beating

choices: Rika the Skunk Ape or Mildred the Bunyip
123322.content:
Pan-Li gives out a malicious giggle and then she walks to the phone. You let out a gulp. You really wonder what she has planned for you but you'd be terrified to know to be perfectly honest. As you're wondering what will happen, Pan-Li speaks to an unknown person in Chinese. You start to bite your nails. As Pan-Li finishes the call she laughs and speaks in Chinese before slamming you back into the cage. You're biting your nails and it isn't long before things get much much worse.

There was a knock on the front door and then Pan-Li answers it, revealing three monsters that were as big as Pan-Li. In the center there was an monster resembling a purple and frilled skinned clam with razor sharp teeth in a vertical mouth and six eyes running down her chest as well as a deep gray shell on her back. She was a shen, a shapeshifting mollusk monster. To the right of the shen was a bunyip that resembled Willa except she had lumpy teal skin instead of Willa's smooth yellow-green skin. To the left of the shen was a bright orange furred monster resembling an oragutan with clawed fingers but blonde hair and an aggressive face. She was a skunk ape judging from the yellow skunk stripes on her back.

The shen gives an evil smile and stretches out her mouth. "So this is the new meat?" she asks as you looks into your cage. Then the skunk ape girl lowers her head showing her sharp teeth and breathed at you. Her breath smelled like death. The bunyip even flicked her long tongue at you before speaking in an Australian accent. "He's too small to make a decent snack, but I'd bet he'd make a good plug." All three of these monsters laughed at you and Pan-Li spoke in Chinese.

However, the shen understood her. "Pan-Li says she wants to introduce you to us," the shen says. "My name is Nancy. I did time in Under Gloom for identity theft." Nancy then shape shifts into an evil smiling version of Mazee and then turns back to her humanoid clam form. The skunk ape girl smiles at you. "I'm Rika," she says. "They caught me running a telemarketing scam." Then the bunyip licked your body as you scream. "And I'm Mildred. I was in for GTA." That's when you realize something. Pan-Li really did do time in prison and these must've been her friends from the hoosegow.

"So, Pan-Li," says Rika with a belch. "Who gets to help you torture the bug first. I have some repugnant plans for him?" "It will be me," says Mildred as she grits her teeth. "I want to swallow him whole, regurgitate him and repeat the process again and again." Nancy even shows her teeth as Pan Li laughs. She then speaks in Chinese.

"What did she say?" asks Rika. "She says Rock, Paper, Scissors," says Nancy. "And I like it." The clam giantess, the skunk ape and the bunyip all hold up their hands. "Rock, paper, scissors, shoot!"

Who wins the chance to help Pan-Li torture you first?
123322.title: The Fiendish Four

1233222.content:
You watch in horror. No matter who won the game of rock paper scissors, you'd lose.

"Shoot!"

Nancy holds out her hand as a rock but Mildred and Rika both have scissors. "Nuts!" yelled Nancy. Pan-Li just let out a laugh as her remaining friends were going to have a go to decide who gets to help her torture you first.

"Rock, paper, scissors, shoot!" yells Mildred and Rika.

So who won?
1233222.title: The Bunyip or Skunk Ape

12333.content:
While you've unfortunately become Pan-Li's property, Mazee is at the time fixing herself a cup of coffee when she hears cackling. Out of curiosity, she turns around and sees Tara reading the paper and then rubs her chin in surprise. "That's weird," she said. "Tara is in a surprisingly good mood today. As Mazee walks away, she sees Harley, the were boar delivery girl walking out with a stack of papers. "Hey, Harley." Says Mazee. However, Harley looks at Mazee in concern and lets out a squeal before turning her head. Mazee just looks in confusion.

"That's weird," she says. "It's not like Harley to be evasive." As Mazee walks down the hall, she sees Blake the weretigress laying on her desk rather glumly. "Blake?" asks Mazee. "Oh," mutters Blake rather inaudibly. "Hey Mazee." Mazee gave a suspicious look. "What's with the whole depression deal? Is this another scheme to steal Tim from me?" Blake just lifts her head and lets out a sigh. "No need to worry about that, Mazee," she said. "You don't have to worry about that ever again." Mazee was slightly worried but didn't think much about Blake's statement.

As she walked away however, she bumped into her best friend and your roommate, Willa the bunyip. "Oof. Oh, sorry there Willa." "S'al...S'alright Mazee." Says Willa weakly. Willa had a rather uneasy look. "Willa?" asked Mazee. Willa let out a sigh. "Mazee," she says. "I don't know how to tell you this... I really hate to tell you this but... but...." Mazee gave a worried look. "Willa?" she asks. "Where is Tim?" Willa just lowered her head as Mazee looked in horror. "Mazee," said Willa. "Tim is dead." Mazee gave a look of shock and dropped her coffee pot on the ground where it shattered right before she grabbed Willa.

She had both tears of sorrow and tears of rage in her eyes. "Who was it?! Aurelia?! Grace?! Tara!? Who did..." "I don't know!" yelled Willa. "Lexi said that she sent him on a mission with Pan Li but says that when Pan Li wasn't looking, he fell off her shoulder and somebody in Chinatown trampled him to death. I'm sorry." Mazee then ran crying into Lexi's office, knocking Kiki out of her seat in the process as she slammed open Lexi's door.

"Lexi!" yelled Mazee. Lexi looked down to face the half angry, half grief stricken wererat. "I see you've heard about Tim, I am dreadfully sorry. I know how hard it must be..." "You sent my Timmy out to his death!" Lexi just let out a scoff. "You know perfectly well Tim knew the risks being a human in a monster work environment. Even if he was a monster, it wouldn't make this line of work any less dangerous. What's done is done, Mazee. The past can't be changed. Tell you what, I'll give you as long as you want to take time off to work this..." "Shut up!" yelled Mazee.

12422.content:
An hour later, you and Tara were standing outside the bar, you on Tara's shoulder. The window had been destroyed from the shots. The victims, living and desceased, had already been transported. The police were still at the scene.

"Alright," Tara told you, "I've talked to the police and gotten a report of the victims." She pulled out a notepad and read off from it.

"Victim 1: Harland de Sang, Male, Werewolf, Age 44. Harland owns a bike shop downtown. The shot missed him, but he fell at an angle that shattered his arm."

"Victim 2: Jen Stoneworth, Female, Basilisk, Age 53. Night manager at Kenmore Warehouse. Hit in the back, collapsed lung, at the hospital in critical condition."

"Victim 3: Julia Fries, Female, Succubus, Age 25. Music video dancer for Maxwell Records. Hit in the leg, condition stable. Has Lactose Overload Syndrome, but I'm not sure that will be much help."

"Victim 4: Louis Steere, Male, Minotaur, Age 33. Unemployed, former SFX artist for Black Studios. Hit in the head. Declared dead on the scene."

"Final Victim: Rebecca Graphis, Female, Age 35. Computer Programmer. Also hit in the head. Sent to hospital, declared DOA."

Tara closed the notepad and sighed. "Five victims, two of them dead, no suspects, and too many witnesses. We've got a lot of ground to cover. Try not to get crushed." She then took you off her shoulder and set you on the floor.

You begin your search for evidence. You were hoping you could find something that would identify who the attacker or attackers were. While you were searching, you pass under the bar itself and look up. From where you were, you found...

Tara walked over and looked under the picture. Sure enough, there was a bullet stuck in the wall.

"According to the police, she resembled a cross between a gargoyle and a gorgon. We won't know her exact species until the autopsy." Tara explained. Just then, an officer, a female gargoyle, walked over to her to tell her something. Tara's face dropped.

"Things just changed. The basilik, Jen. She's dead. Died in the hospital. Brings the casualties up to 3."

That made you upset. Things just got worse now. You had to catch these killers and fast.

"Have the officers take this bullet. It might have DNA. If not, ballistics will know." You say.

"When did you become a cop?" Tara asked.

"I took forensics in High School." You say.

"They teach forensics in High School?"

"Yeah."

Tara shrugs and walks over to an officer to tell them about the bullet. You started thinking. Maybe you should talk to one of the two surviving victims. But who would help you more: Harland, or Julia?

"We should head to the hospital and talk to Harland. His wolf sense may have picked up something." You tell Tara. You don't know what he can tell you, but it may help.

An hour later, you at the hospital in Harlands room. He was about 700 feet tall. For a werewolf, Harland was really lanky. He had black fur that was greying with grey hair and yellow eyes. His left arm was in a cast.

"Harland de Sang?" You ask.

"Yeah?" He replied.

"My name is Tim. I work for the Daily Tombstone newspaper. Me and my partner are helping the police with this case. We were hoping we could ask some questions." You explain.

"If it helps catch the assholes who did this, go ahead."

"What exactly happened?"

"I don't remember much. I was sitting at the bar. I had just closed the bike shop. It was me and the other 4. The minotaur and the gorgon were talking about a potential job for the minotaur, and the succubus was flirting with the basilisk. Then I heard 5 shots. I black out after that."

"Did your senses pick up anything?"

"I didn't see anyone and my ears were ringing from the shots. But I did smell something. It was a lilac scented perfume. No one in the bar was wearing it, so it had to be the shooters."

"Do you know anyone who would want to hurt you or anyone else?"

"No. I never met the gorgon or the basilisk. I saw the succubus in a few music videos. The minotaur was a regular, but we never talked. As for me, I don't go out much, so the only person I interact with is my wife, Luna."

"Anything else?"

"No, that's all I got."

"Thank you."

Tara picks you up and takes you out into the hall. You look up at her.

"So, we know one thing. Whoever was shooting, they had lilac perfume." You tell her.

"That doesn't help much. We need more. What do you want to do now?" Tara asks you.

YOU KNOW BETTER, DON’T KILL HUMANS WHILE THEY ARE VISITING!!!!” she shouted at Sara. “Well go fuck yourself bitch.” Sara muttered just as she takes you out of the room. “Sorry that happened, I am so getting onto Tara at the end of this day. choices: Tara takes you back to the Daily Tombstone
12433.content:
Tara kept shooting glares down at you as she drove.

"Can't believe you're having to come with me to my appointment!" the vampiress hissed. Whatever, Dent. Just how long did she intend to hate you?

You didn't like how she kept blaming you for what happened. You were sorry and had been trying to find a way to make amends for what you had done to her. But did she HAVE to hate you so much for an accident?

"So...what appointment is it?" you asked nervously.

"A plastic surgeon that could potentially fix the damage YOU caused to me! That's who! A Frankenstein." Tara snapped.

A Frankenstein? As OTHER PEOPLE'S plastic surgeon?! This was so ironic you had to fight down a laugh! "Ok...and if things go well, we could report it to make it so they get more business."

Tara sniffed disdainfully, but nodded stiffly as she parked. Snatching you up, Tara squeezed you and you yelped before she went into the office and up to a doctor, a BRIDE of Frankenstein Monster!

She was a good seven-hundred feet tall even, multiple skin tones, her eyes were two different colors, one was a blue eye and the other was purple. And she had a tall tower of black hair. She was dressed in a doctor's outfit and rubber gloves.

"Ah...I take it you're my 1:00 O' Clock, then? Tara Gordon?" she said. "I'm Doctor Amane Sinew." she said.

You bit your lip at her last name. Sinew? This just got more and more amusing.

Tara nodded. "Yes. And what happened is obvious. I need my face evened out again to look like it ISN'T a bacon-wrapped meatball." Tara said, pointing at her face.

Amane nodded, then noticed you in Tara's other hand. "Ho? And who is this?"

Tara growled. "The one who broke the window and CAUSED my disfigurement! He'll be covering the bill!"

SAY WHAT?! As much as you wanted to make amends for what happened to Tara, that completely blindsided you!

"Hmmm....well, my services don't come cheap, as I'm sure you can understand. But...I think I have an idea as to an alternative way to the cost of fixing you up, Ms. Gordon..." Dr. Sinew said thoughtfully, eyeing you in a way you didn't like.

"Fine, but payment upon delivery." Tara said.

The surgeon nodded and Tara followed her into her lab, setting you down on a counter, "Careful...he's a jinx like a plague." the vampire said, laying on the operating table as the stitched-up woman pulled out her instruments.

After a lot of nipping, tucking, poking, prodding, and stitching, Tara was handed a special vampire-showing mirror and she leap to her feet cheering.

"YES! YES! YES! Sayonara Two-Face! Tara Gordon is BACK! AH~HAHAHAH!" Tara laughed, delighted as not a trace of what happened to her remained, it was like you had never caused that broken window accident at all.

You whistled. Impressed."Damn Doc, you're pretty amazing with a scalpel, Gotta give you that!" you tell her.

Amane nodded. "Yes...I am. Now...for the payment!" she said, picking up a face mask that had a tube attaching it to a fuel Tank of some sort and she slammed the mask over you, trapping you under it and turned a valve on the tank, causing a hissing sound to fill the mask.

This was gas!

The scented fumes made you dizzy and you're whole body tingled like pins and needles were all over you and you blacked out...

******

When you wake up, your whole body hurt like you couldn't believe, and you felt...different somehow. You pushed yourself to your feet and held your head, dizzy.

"Wow! As much as I HATE agreeing with Tim, he was right about you with a scalpel!" Tara cackled.

Looking up, you see Dr. Amane and Tara looking at you. What were they talking about?

The Frankenstein monster held a mirror in front of you and you almost blacked out again.

Coming from your back were a pair of jet-black wings with feathers that had the color of everlasting darkness, which spanned sixteen feet from wingtip to wingtip. Fully feathered like a bird's, the wings felt like they had a very flexible skeletal structure, You tried flapping them, as a bird did, and your eyes widened when they actually flapped.

You were...you were...

"A Fallen Angel!" The surgeon and Tara both laughed as you looked like you were about to faint.

You looked up at them and the doctor held up a needle and ran it along the underside of your feathers at the bottom of your new wings, making you wince and back away from it. Undoubtedly, they were sensitive.

"He's a masterpiece. The wings have a very flexible skeletal structure, enabling him to press them to the back of his torso and legs with only the slightest bulge visible under his clothing. His wings have superhuman strength and can create enough lift to enable him to carry aloft at least 500 pounds in addition to his own weight. Furthermore his entire anatomy is naturally adapted to flying. His bones are now highly dense bone structure, but it is also hollow like a bird's, making him weigh far less. His body is virtually devoid of fat and possesses greater proportionate muscle mass than an ordinary human does.
His eyes are specially adapted to withstand high-speed winds which would hurt the average human eye. He possesses a special membrane in his respiratory system enabling him to extract oxygen from the air at high velocities or altitudes. He's able to fly by flapping his wings, as a bird does. He can reach a height of 10,000 feet with little effort. With severe strain he can reach the altitude of 29,000 feet above sea level, but he can only remain that high for several minutes. He can fly nonstop under his own power for a maximum of approximately twelve hours at the very least.
And while the normal resting heart rate for a skilled and conditioned athlete is 40 beats per minute, but his active heart rate when he's taking things easy and not trying to push himself is now 55 beats per minute...once he'll actually start to actively strain himself, it'll reached 240 beats per minute, the same as a racehorse. Furthermore, the caloric energy consumption of his body is now only 9% whereas that of normal person's would be 70%, leaving him surplus energy. Finally the results of the modification to his blood tests on him has resulted in an antibody system that is resistant to all known diseases and several poisons."

You hear what the sewn-up woman had done to you, and you gape at her. "WHAT?! WHY'D YOU DO THIS TO ME!?"

Amane smiled as she leered at you. "I wanted to prove I could. A human being completely rebuilt from the ground up with my skill as a plastic surgeon, and using MONSTER-sized surgery tools, no less? NO ONE had EVER even attempted anything like that before!"

Tara snickered "This'll make you renowned for sure, Doc! I'll PERSONALLY see to that!" She glared at you and held up her camera, "Say cheese, short-stuff!"

The flash blinded you for a few seconds before something like a contact lense slid over your eyes and everything suddenly looked like you were looking through sunglasses. WHAT THE HELL?!

"Ah...I almost forgot! I added a darker-toned inner-eyelid membrane, keeps bright light and wind out of your eyes!" Dr. Sinew said, sounding delighted.

"Why...?" you asked faintly.

Tara shrugged "Her changing you was the alternative payment. Wanted to prove she was THAT good at her job!" she smirked. "Don't expect me to like you any better since you're no longer human."

You felt you knees give out. This...this couldn't be HAPPENING!

Tara and Amane Sinew shook hands. "Marvelous, Doc! I'll be recommending you quite often now!" your coworker said. "If there's anything I can do for you, just say the word!"

"Well...I was also wondering if you could leave him with me." Amane said, eyeing you. "It'd be a shame if something ruined his new body. I'd like keeping an eye on him myself."

Tara looked at you and then back at Dr. Sinew "Well...not sure I can do THAT, They're expecting him back at the office. And Everyone there could see your works on both of us there and put it in the news so you could EASILY end up rich before the week is out."

You stare at Tara, horrified. Looks like until you learned to actually USE these new black wings of yours, what happened next was all up to the one who hated you!

124331.content:
Tara gives an evil smirk and you shake in place. "Y'know Doc," she says. "I think I WILL leave Tim here. I'll just tell Lexi that he's staying late to cover the full story." You gasp and make gestures to beg Tara to leave you alone but then she unceremoniously puts you in a jar. You tap on the jar as Amane closes it and then shakes hands with Tara. "Thank you, very much, Ms. Gordon." "No, no, no," says Tara. "Thank you, Dr. Sinew."

Tara then shows her huge, fixed, but no less horrifying and looming face right in front of you. "And as for you, Tim. Now that my face is fixed, I'm gonna be getting balled by the hottest monster men in Fearfield. With my face back to its former glory, I'll have my pick of the hotties." Tara laughs wickedly and walks away as you bite your nails. Then Dr. Sinew picks up the jar and walks into the back room. In the back room, you see all kinds of animal parts; skins, organs and bones in jars. There are even some weird face plasters in the side of the room. The doctor was right. Your new heart really is beating faster and it's beating faster and faster as you look around your new surroundings.

Your eyes shift into that inner eyelid membrane and you can see through Dr. Sinew and you wish you didn't. From the looks of it, there were wires attached to her organs in place of veins and she appeared to have two beating hearts. You knew because you could hear the beatings and you cover your ears. But that doesn't work because you could hear all kinds of sounds, from flies buzzing to the sounds in the waiting room coming from the monster patients. "I hope Dr. Sinew can do something about these cheeks," says a splinter cat woman. "Me, a splinter cat of all things getting butt implants. How embarrassing." "2000 skulls for a tummy tuck?" asks one purple haired fairy woman in a regal attire. "Heck of a way to lose weight." Then you start to hear something that a male hobgoblin isn't even saying but thinking. "What's taking the doc so long?" he asks in his mind. "The insurance company thinks I'm dead. I've got to get this face rearranged fast!"

You let out a scream as Dr. Sinew looks down on you. "It seems that the auditory system I gave you needs a little fine tuning. You must be hearing all sorts of things going on at once. You continue to hold your head and you start to hear Dr. Sinew's thoughts. "I wonder if I might have given him telepathy. I truly am a genius. If this works, I might even score a medical award. But I have to keep an eye on him. His scars are still fresh. The new skeleton I gave him needs time to settle in."

You're legitimately afraid and didn't know what to expect from the Frankenstein giantess. Then you hold your head and start to hear thoughts that appeared to be coming from Tara. "The beauty queen of the Daily Tombstone is back baby, and I've gotten rid of that little pest. I hope the doctor takes his brain apart." You shiver and then hear more thoughts that appear to be coming from the Daily Tombstone. The first one comes from Ari, that dishonest weresheep. "I need a good lie for the next headline. How about that aaaaautomobile company Faxanatos Enterprises. I could convince people that the engines are made from recycled heaaaarts." The next thought appeared to be coming from Hecate. "Jeepers," thinks the wolf girl. "Is my butt getting bigger. Mom's genes must finally be taking over." Then you grunt and hear some thoughts that appear to be coming from Kiki. "I really hope Lexi doesn't realize I forgot to call that new intern she was expecting. But it's such a drag to call every single monster that wants to work here."

You pant and pant as your ears are burning. "Oh dear," thinks Dr. Sinew. "It appears that I have to make a few adjustments." Then Dr. Sinew turns her head and calls for her assistant. "Geraldine," she says. "I need you to run a few tests on our latest patient." In walks in a 700ft tall were boar woman. She had pinkish white skin, long reddish brown hair and four bright white tusks with pure red lips. She was very obese befitting her species with a monstrous booty and massive breasts. Geraldine was wearing a skin tight eggshell-white Totally Spies-esque unitard that was tight on her porcine body along with a nurse's hat.

Geraldine then smiles at you. "Certainly, Amane," she says as she picks up the jar with you. "I'll run the tests on his body to see if his new organs are working the right way." You tap on the jar as Geraldine takes you further into the lab and Amane tends to her other patients. "P-Please let me go," you say. "My girlfriend is waiting for me!"

Geraldine lets out a squealing laugh. "I'm afraid this is for your own good. NOBODY has ever tried something like this before. We have to make sure those wings won't make like Icarus and fall off or if your heart explodes."

You turn pale white as your vision shifts to black again and you scream.

You're in absolute pain and it doesn't help that you're holding onto your ears in agony because of the sound that Geraldine's making when she unscrews the lid on the jar. You're in absolute pain and from the look on her face, Geraldine is enjoying every second of it. "I love this job." The pig giantess says. Geraldine then picks you up by the hair as you groan. "Hey! Watch the hair!" "Sorry," says the boar woman. "But we can't risk damaging your new body.

That actually made sense because your wounds were aching and felt like they could reopen any minute. You then start to hear Geraldine's thoughts. "I didn't think that she'd actually be able to do it. A fallen angel's not the choice I would've chosen. I wonder what Amane would be able to do with a girl human. I keep telling Brittany that it won't hurt a bit. I do hate lying to her though. The wereboar woman apparently had a human girl at home and was planning to subjugate her to the same horrible treatment that happened to you.

Geraldine then looks down and smiles, it's a psychotic grin that is even more terrifying with those giant tusks. "It sounds like he's reading my mind," she thinks to herself. "Good. I think I might introduce you to Brittany after this. I'm sure she'll want to meet you. Providing you survive the tests." You shiver in your jar before you look out to see a laboratory area with what looked like a maze or obstacle course meant for lab rats. A very ironic choice of words given your choice of girlfriend.

Geraldine lays you down on the main table and Amane walks forward and looks down on you. You look around and see several strange machines like a treadmill of some kind and then there was a machine that looked like a smoke chamber of some time. You didn't even want to think of what that tested. "Thanks for bringing him," says Amane. "Now remember Geraldine. We need to test Tim to make sure that his body can handle his new skeleton and organs. "New skeleton!?" you ask in horror. Amane nodded her head. "As your body structure was before, you needed some replacement parts in order for it to accept your new wings. But Geraldine and I are going to test you to see whether or not there are any problems or complications. But before we test your wings, we need to see how well your body is. Now, what to test first?

You turn and see Geraldine laughing wickedly at you. Exactly what do they do first?

124332.content:
You cross your fingers and hope that Tara really doesn't consider leaving you with this mad doctor who literally took you apart and put you back together. "I think I'll take him back with me to the Daily Tombstone. I want to see how his girlfriend reacts to the new him."

You let out a sigh of relief. "Alright," says Dr. Sinew. "Just try to be careful with him until his bones fully set in. Those scars are still fresh." Tara grabs you and then walks out as you struggle in her grip. She's sure to place you in a jar in the glove compartment so you don't cause any trouble. You couldn't believe this. How were you supposed to explain this to Mazee? You feel your wings twitching and it is driving you crazy. All your new scars are itching and it feels as though you're going to fall apart. You moan in pain and then let out a scream as your eyes kept flipping from normal to darkened iris mode. It's fitting you were turned into a fallen angel because this hurts like hell.

Tara only stops once and its to reload her car with gas. Outside, there are four male monsters including a gremlin, a phoenix and a Thetis Lake monster all ogling her and her new face as she smiles seductively. Guess she was starting to attract men again. You heard that Tara was considered the most beautiful face in the Daily Tombstone before her face was burned.

Suddenly you grab your ears because you can hear something from several monster kilometers away. They sounded like police sirens. "Hands in the air!" Then you hear several gun noises and scream before you hear something else. There were moaning noises. "Harder. Damn, it's like you're not even trying." You pant slightly before you hear a sound that sounded like the laugh of the Cryptkeeper. "Make it stop!" you yell. Your ears were being assaulted by several sounds all at once. Tara looked in amusement as you were holding your ears.

You begin to cry before you hear something else that sounds like a baby's crying. "Congratulations. Four heads. She's gonna be a healthy hydra." You bang your face on the glass You wished you were death. Who knew fallen angels had such acute hearing.

Tara then takes you out as she parks the car and you hear several wolf whistles at once from passersby. "Hubba, bubba. Look at that can." "Forget the can, look at that face." "That girl can suck my blood any day." You then hear several sounds coming from inside the tower. First sounded like it was Aurelia's voice. "I told Cree one hundred times, I want nothing to do with that damned sister of hers. I don't care if it is her parents' anniversary. I'd rather eat a bowl of spider webs than go to any town that's home to that bigoted piece of..." You cover your ears but then you hear Beth and Fate speaking.

"Fate," says Beth. "Have you lost weight lately? Girl, please tell me you're only going to maintain your weight from here. I mean, there are a lot of gargoyle guys who like big girls." "Fat, thin, I really don't care how I look, Beth. Mom would kill any man that comes after me anyway. Perhaps you should think about losing weight." "Are you kidding?" asks Beth. "I'm a behemoth. I'm supposed to be fat.

You then hear Yulong on the phone. "I don't know what you're making a big deal of, James," says Yulong. "Topaz is 16, I'd say she's ready to date." "But Mom," says Yulong's son on the phone. "Your granddaughter is dating a European dragon." "James," says Yulong. "I know that western dragons are... less than desirable in behavior... but George sounds like a nice guy. I didn't complain when you married Hay Lin." "Mom, Hay Lin is the same type of dragon as you and me." You then let out a grunt before Tara takes you out of your jar and grasps you in her hand. "Oh," she says. "Let's show them the new us."

Tara walks in and all eyes are on her and her face. Grace nearly chokes on her Chinese food at the sight and Yulong even holds down the phone. "James," she says. "I'm going to have to call you back." Emma squints to get a good look at Tara and then gasps. "Tara," says Harley. "You look spicy, chica." Harley even lets out a squeal of delight. You always knew the sow was a lesbian. "Wow," says Mazee. "Your face looks amazing, Tara." "I agree mate," says Willa. "It looks like how it did before Tim... burned it off." "I take it the mission was a success?" asks Lexi as she walks in." Tara twirls her hair and smiles. "Mission accomplished."

Mazee then smiles nervously. "Now, Tara," she says. "I hope there's no hard feelings between you and Tim now." Tara gives a laugh and then unfolds her hand to show your new look. Everyone looks at you in surprise and Lexi bursts into laughter as Mazee stares in pure shock. "Jumping dingos!" yells Willa as her jaw drops. "Is that Tim?" asks Emma as she squints her eyes. "Aye carumba," says Harley. "Look at those wings." Grace bends over and gets a good look at your wings as she licks her lips. Blake lets out a purr. "Now that's a canary I wouldn't mind eating up." Beth smiles at you as well. "I always knew he had the face of an angel." Says the behemoth as she shakes her hips. "That's a fallen angel," says Bea. "Trust me, I'm a succubus. I know."

You look nervously. "It's not so bad having wings, Tim," says Fate as she holds down her own wings. "If they get in the way, you can always fold them down into a cape." Cleotiti smiles nervously and even strokes you. Guess that now you're not completely human, she finds you less scary to her. Yulong is completely silent. It seems that even she can't give you any appropriate advice for this situation. Ari simply smiles at you smugly as Aurelia looks uneasily. "I'm going to get back to work," she says. "Angel food never agreed with me anyway." Hecate stops to draw your new form as Brandy rubs her single eye in surprise. Kiki of course couldn't care less and Anna Maria bends over to get a good look at you.

"Tim?" asks Mazee as Tara hands you to her. "Is that you." You smile at your girlfriend nervously. "So how do you like the new me, Baby?"
124332.title: The New You

1243321.content:
Mazee sighs and looks over your new form again. "I love you no matter what Tim." she says with a smile. You grin and fall back onto Tara's palm in relief. "Did you think I wouldn't like the new you?" she asks as she pets your head. "I don't know, maybe? Its kind of a big change." you tell her. "I wouldn't say that. You look like the same old Tim. You just have wings now." she says reassuringly. "I wouldn't say he's exactly the same." Tara says with a laugh. Mazee tilts her head so you explain. "I apparently have better senses now." you explain. "On the way hear my hearing was out of control and I was getting blasted from all directions." Your girlfriend gives you a sympathetic look and goes to pick you up. As she does her fingers accidentally grab a part of a wing and you wince. "Ahh!" you exclaim, causing her to pull back. "Sorry!" she cries. "Its okay, they're just sensitive because they're new. The doctor said they'll set in a couple of days." Tara says. "The doctor?" Mazee asks. The vampire shrugs. "Yeah about that...she fixed my face free of charge in exchange for experimenting on Tim. "You used him as a guinea pig?!"Mazee says. "I'd say he's more of a bird than a pig." Tara jokes.

When the commotion dies down everyone disperses leaving just you, Mazee, and Tara. Mazee picks you up, being careful of your wings this time, and places you in her paw. "Well, I guess this makes us even.' Tara says. "Maybe being an angel will cure his bad luck." She then walks away, leaving you with your girlfriend. "Are you sure you're okay with this?" you ask her. Mazee kisses your head. "Of course, I love you." she says. "Thanks, I don't know what I would do without you." you tell her. Suddenly a shadow appears over you as someone stands next to Mazee."You could always come to me Timmy." they say. You look up and see that its Blake. "Not now Blake, he's been through a lot." Mazee says annoyed. The weretiger shrugs and walks away. Its weird though, while she was there you felt strangely aroused. You don't know what to make of this but the feeling went away when she left. As Mazee walks toward her desk she passes Kiki, who is dozing off. When she approaches the tanuki you feel yourself getting drowsy. When Mazee reaches her desk she looks down and sees you dozing off. "Tim?" she asks as she prods you with a finger. You snap to attention and shake your head. "Whats wrong?" she asks concerned. Deciding that this could become a problem you explain these strange feelings.

"So the feelings just went away?" Mazee asks when you finish talking. You nod and she scratches her head. "Maybe we should ask someone for help. The first choice is Yulong, since she's the wisest monster you know. Once the two of you explain things to her she scratches her chin. "From what you're telling me it sounds like its related to the seven deadly sins." she suggests. "Particularly lust and sloth." You and Mazee listen intently. "You say it happened near certain monsters?" she asks. "Yeah, when Blake was flirting with me and when Kiki was...being Kiki." you tell her. The dragon ponders a bit more before speaking. "Well a human becoming a fallen angel has never been done before, so maybe this is a side effect. Being a fallen angel could be making you sensitive to those who exhibit the seven sins." she says. "Meaning?" Mazee says. "Meaning that if someone displays a sin it could make Tim feel it as well." the dragon finishes. "But thats just a guess."

"How did that crazy doctor even manage this?" Mazee asks. "Beats me, I was out like a light." you tell her. "Still, it is quite impressive." Yulong says. "Well thats what the doc was going for." you say. "Don't worry, we can get through this." Mazee says.

After work, Mazee takes you home with her. "I think you better stay with me tonight," says Mazee. "I already talked to Willa." You nod your head and your wings start to shiver. "Don't worry," says Mazee as she bit her lip. "Don't worry.... we'll... I'll think of something." You gulp because you really hope that Mazee is right.

That night, you and Mazee are at the door of Mazee's apartment building. At the front desk is Mazee's landlady, Cynthia. Cynthia was a giant pear-shaped lich woman who dressed in a purple outfit with a cape, shorts and knee-high high heels. Roger was Cynthia's human husband. Part of the reason the lich tolerated Mazee having a human boyfriend was her own interspecies relationship. Although, you had doubts about Roger's loyalty to Cynthia. Cynthia then turns her head the other way. "Carry on, Mazee," she says. "Oh, and don't forget, rent's due on Friday. Mazee nodded her head because she understood.

Mazee walks up the stairs to her apartment and along the way, you pass several monsters. One was a male landshark resembling a red cookie cutter shark and you read his thoughts. "That blackout was just what I needed. The security cam short-circuited, 10,000 skulls. If anyone asks, I'll say it was a bank robbery." "Tim," says Mazee. "I'm thinking about ordering pizza. What would you like?" "Oh," you say. "Nothing much. Just olives, mushrooms, chili peppers, anchovies, onions..." You stop yourself and realize that you're being greedy, no doubt from reading that greedy thought. Mazee then turns her head. "I wonder if Tim can read minds in his new condition?" "Yes," you say. "I can." Then you gasp and Mazee gives a look of surprise. "Well there goes my privacy." The were rat giantess thinks sarcastically to herself.

As Mazee reaches her apartment door, you see one of her neighbors trying to unlock the front door. This neighbor was a giant black skinned and red spotted were giraffe woman with a pear shaped figure and long reddish blonde hair. She also appeared to be naked From the looks of it she was trying to unlock her front door. "Hi Melba." Says Mazee as she unlocks her own door. You listen in to the giraffe woman's thoughts and they worry you. "Hi Melba yourself, Mazee. If she only knew what I did to that jerk at the diner this morning, she wouldn't be so friendly. I didn't even get a good price for the bones." You're beginning to wonder exactly how well you know the people in Mazee's apartment.

Once Mazee is in her apartment, she lays you down on the coffee table before she dials the phone to order her pizza. Once you're on the table, you nibble at a giant M&M from Mazee's candy dish but then you hear thoughts that further disturb you. "Harder Roger, harder. Rowr. Take it in deeper." "Oh man, Cynthia would kill me if she knew what I was doing, but how can I resist this nice piece of feline beauty." Then you grunt and hold your head. "I don't know what she's worried about. It's the perfect crime. We pay off our debts and collect on the life insurance policy only I don't have to die. It's a good thing I know the coroner pretty well." You grunt before you hear another thought that makes you even more nervous. "It ends tonight. I'll avenge you Ursula. It busts my balls that a spriggan of all creatures is running for mayor. A spriggan's just an ugly fairy and tomorrow night, he dies."

You let out a scream and Mazee looks at you nervously. "I hope some pizza calms him down," says Mazee. "Hello, Quba's Pizzeria?" You then read Mazee's mind. "The new art critic we hired told me about the man who runs this pizzeria. Apparently he was a failed artist but he still insists he's the best artist in the world. If he was, he wouldn't be selling pizza. Be careful now Mazee, Tim can read your mind, don't think about anything, especially don't think about how you've been wearing the same pair of panties for sixth months straight."

You mentally gag and so does Mazee who then looks at you in annoyance. "I hope you're happy you deeming Tim." She grumbles in her mind. "Not even." You say.

At that time, Mazee had brought you to see Dr. Sinew. "Aha," says the mad Frankenstein woman. "So you're Tim's girlfriend. I wasn't expecting him to be a rat person." Mazee rolls her eyes. "I am really sick of other monsters treating my species like vermin. Listen, could you try to adjust his telepathy? It’s driving him crazy.” “Alright, Ms. Robinson.” Dr. Sinew takes you into the next room and you give a gulp. “I really hope that this doesn’t hurt as bad as last time.” You think. Oh, what are you worried about. Williams is a very common last name, it couldn’t be anything serious. Could it?

Amane then hangs up the phone and then gives a smirk as she turns to you and gets out her tools. “Change of plans.” She says. In the waiting room, Mazee hears your screaming and is very worried. “Tim!” she yells. “What are they doing to you in there! Tim!” You continue to groan as your wings are removed and then she gets to work on your arms and legs as you scream.

- - - - - - - - - - -

An hour later, Dr. Sinew comes out and Maggie is worried sick. “What did you do with my boyfriend, you quack!?” yells your rodent girlfriend. Dr. Sinew gave a laugh. “Well, since he didn’t entirely like being a falling angel, I had something else in mind. Look.” You let out a groan and Dr. Sinew opens her hands as Mazee looks in pure fear and even screams. You had been turned into a long red-skinned weresnake, specifically a gaboon viper with arms and legs that ended in claws. You were horrified yourself knowing that Mazee had a fear of snakes due to her rodent features. “Mazee,” you say weakly. “It’s still me.”
1243321121.title: Snakes Alive

choices: She's Taking You to A Political Rally
She Wants To Break Her Friend Out Of Jail
1243321122.content:
When you and Mazee exit her apartment she's locking the door when you hear the sound of someone coming down the stairs. Her footsteps are very rapid and you see its because she has eight legs. Its a 900 foot dridder with the lower body of a mouse spider, while her upper body is that of a woman with red skin and huge breasts. She's got orange hair that reaches down to her back and is wearing a low cut shirt with a leather jacket. "Hey Mazee." the dridder says, giving your girlfriend a slap on the back. "Oh, hey Jane." Mazee says. "What are you up to?" Jane gives her a smile. "Oh nothing, just heading out to take care of some business." The dridder seems innocent but then you hear her inner thoughts. Oh I'll take care of it all right. That no good spriggan is going down! Suddenly you realize that you've heard her thoughts before. She was one of the neighbors you heard through the walls yesterday! If that lousy fairy freak thinks she'll become governor I'll just have to teach her otherwise! Its what Ursula would want. You keep your mouth shut to avoid causing any trouble. With those wrathful thoughts coming out of her you might say something you regret.

Jane sees you peeking at her from Mazee's shoulder and leans in for a better look. "Is this your boyfriend? I though he was a human." she says. "He's been through some things. He's a fallen angel now." she explains and holds you out. Jane offers a finger and you shake it with a smile. Huh, guess I won't be having him for a snack. Still, its better than her having a fairy for a lover. They'd have to disappear. You stare at her as these thoughts run through her head. She notices and tilts her head. Whats with that look? The little guy's acting like he can read my mind. When you turn your head away at this her eyes widen. "Well I'll get going now. See you two later!" the spider woman says. She heads off down the stairs and leaves the two of you alone. You want to tell Mazee about her plans but want to wait. That girl seems dangerous and you don't want her over hearing you. Mazee starts down the stairs to leave for work while you worry about her neighbors.

When she reaches the bottom of the stairs a hand appears from behind her and forces a cloth into Mazee's face. After one breath she goes unconscious and falls forward. She lands on the ground with a resounding crash and you go flying off of her shoulder. Instead of hitting the floor though you land on your back on some soft sticky surface. Looking up you see Jane hanging from the ceiling by a string of web. You also notice that you're stuck on a spiderweb. Jane comes down and plucks you from the web. "Alright little guy, I know you know whats going on." she says. "I don't know what you're talking about! What did you do to Mazee?" you exclaim, feigning ignorance. "Don't worry, she's just out for a little while because of my venom." the dridder says, giving you a smile that flashes her fangs. "If I don't want to leave bite marks I can extract it from my fangs and use it later." She holds up the venom covered cloth. "Now I can't have you blowing my cover, so I'll be taking you with me." she says. She stuffs you inside her cleavage and exits the building after propping Mazee against the wall. "If you behave I might just return you to your girlfriend." she tells you. "Your little ability could come in handy, so you're going to help me." What does she have in mind?
1243321122.title: A New Web Of Problems

12433211222.content:
Jane walks down the street and eventually starts taking a lot of twists and turns in her path. After a while she pulls you out of her cleavage. "Okay, you're going to help me bust my friend out of jail." she says bluntly. "What?!" you blurt out. What the hell is she thinking? "My friend Ursula is locked up in Under Gloom. With you I'm going to find a way to get her out." This is bad! Ursula is bad news. You know because the paper did a story on her. She's a werebear that hates all fairies and monsters like them. She was thrown into Under Gloom for inciting a riot against the now governor fairy. Jane must be one of her supporters. She no doubt took part in the riot. "How the hell am I supposed to do that?!" you ask frantically. "Look, I don't know the details, but I know you're some kind of telepath. With that power and your size you can sneak around that place without getting caught." Before you can offer a rebuttal she stuffs you back into her boobs and takes off walking again.

Eventually you are taken out and are once again face to face with Jane. "Okay, here we are." she says, pointing to a building in the distance. "Why are we so far away?" you ask. "You're one thing, but if I get too close to that place someone will notice, so you're going it alone from here." she explains. "You can't expect me to actually pull this off!" you cry. Suddenly she frowns and you find yourself being wrapped up in a cocoon of web. "Listen here, if you don't at least try you'll never see you're girlfriend again!" she spits out, baring her fangs. The anger in her voice suddenly hits you and you respond before you can think. "Maybe she shouldn't have gotten caught in the first place! Why should I break her furry ass out of a jail she belongs in?!" you shout, then you immediately clamp your mouth shut. Jane's eye twitches and she bares her fangs once again. This time however you can see poison dripping from them. "Wait! I didn't mean that!" you cry out. The dridder narrows her eyes as you desperately explain. "I don't know why, but I pick up on people's sins! Your wrath made me angry too!" Jane's expression suddenly changes and she laughs. "Thats quite a problem you have! It must be making things hard for Mazee!" she says. You sigh, as the mood calms down and decide you have no choice but to go along with this.

"Alright, you fly into the prison and make your way to Urusula'a cell." Jane says, holding you in her palm. "She's probably where they keep the worst prisoners, so look around a little." You look up at her like she's crazy but she just puts a finger to your lips. "You're practically a bug to them. They won't even pay you any mind if you're buzzing around." she says, trying to reassure you. Suddenly you realize there's a way out of this. You can just find the warden and she'll help you! You've heard the warden of Under Gloom is a bit on the angry side, but she's a good person. As if reading your mind Jane presses a finger to your face. "And if you get any funny ideas, remember this. The warden may help you, but the guards of Under Gloom aren't so helpful. If you run into one of them there's no telling what they'll do. You should just get Ursula out of her cell. She should know what to do after that, and we'll even let you get home to Mazee." she says with a smirk. With that she tosses you through the air towards the prison. You flap your wings as best as you can to get some height, but you're still new at it so your flying is pretty wobbly. Eventually you steady yourself a bit and get closer to the massive building. Part of you is forgetting this awful situation and is amazed that you're actually flying. Upon entering a window however you start to get tired and begin losing altitude. You hit the floor and roll a little before coming to a stop. Now that you're here you need to figure out what to do. Jane may have been lying about the guards but should you take that risk? Maybe your wings will make them see you as a monster instead of a human and they'll be more willing to help. You could even luck out and find the warden! As you ponder for a moment the ground starts shaking and a shadow falls upon you. You hear a woman's thoughts enter your head as you stare up at....
12433211222.title: She Probably Hasn't Thought This Through

124332112221.content:
A massive paw comes down and lands right on top of you. Somehow you manage to get caught between the toes of this giantess and not get completely crushed. As you struggle to get free you notice that the fur of this paw is yellow. Your situation really makes you feel like a bug thats been stepped on. The giantess takes a step forward and you feel yourself rising with her paw. Her thoughts suddenly fill your head. "Patrolling sucks! I should be the one in charge instead of that big blue jerk!" You don't know what kind of monster this woman is but you can see that her fur is yellow. You're also starting to feel the effects of her emotions. "Why am I even here?" you say to yourself as you get carried by the moving paw. "I'm supposed to find some criminal bear. Why doesn't anyone try to rescue me?" You start feeling envy coming from the giantess and are pouting as you think about what you don't have. "She gets a friend trying to break her out of jail and I get kidnapped just because I'm small!" you rant. The next step the monster takes snaps you out it and you try harder to escape. Miraculously you barely squeeze free and roll onto the floor as she walks away. Looking up you see her from behind as she exits. She seems to be a lion, but there's a stinger on her tail swinging around. She must be a manticore.

You don't know if you should try and get her attention. She seemed kinda bitter from what her thoughts were saying. It seems like she wants a promotion though, so maybe she would help you! Deciding to risk it, you slowly start to flap your wings. This is the first time you've tried taking off by yourself, so its a bit challenging. Once you're sufficiently up in the air you take off toward the manticore. You see her big yellow behind round a corner, her tail almost waving goodbye. You prepare to turn when suddenly someone else comes around the corner. You fly headfirst into a soft wall and bounce backward in the air. You begin falling and have to flap extra hard to stay airborne. When you steady yourself you see what you ran into. She's a massive onryo, and from her uniform you can tell she works at the prison.
