The thing that draws your attention is her breasts, which is also the wall you flew into. They're huge, even by monster standards! Its amazing that her uniform can actually hide them. It must be custom fit. You figure she probably has LOS or something.

With some effort you fly forward, intent on making to someone who can help. Veering off to side you manage to avoid the onryo, barely skirting by her breasts. When you round the corner you can see the manticore off in the distance. You don't know if you should keep following her deeper into the prison. That seems like it could be more dangerous than helpful. You could run into some guard who might give you trouble or even end up in one of the cells. After briefly considering going back and trying to get the onryo's attention you hear a booming noise from behind you. You realize its getting closer and turn to see the onryo walking toward you!. Her insanely huge boobs are bouncing as she walks, looming ever closer with each step. At this point those wrecking balls could knock you out of the sky again. You consider trying to reach her face, but are afraid those mammaries will block any attempts with their bouncing. After a moment of contemplation you start flying away from her. If you can at least out some distance between you and her you can rethink your options. Unfortunately the infinitely larger woman is closing in fast thanks to her size. Do you get away or do her boobs reach you first?
124332112221.title: Dangerous Skies

1243321122211.content:
You flap your wings for all your worth, desperate to escape the massive orbs behind you. As you begin to get tired a final flap grants you a burst of speed, propelling you forward. The onryo following you happens to turn a corner, her boobs narrowly missing you as she does so. When you look back to see the planet sized destroyers are no longer a threat you sigh in relief. Unfortunately all that flying has worn you out and your wings are feeling like they're going to fall off. Carefully you slow your flapping and descend to the ground, hoping for a soft landing. They give out too soon though, and you end up falling about ten feet, rolling onto your stomach. At least it didn't hurt.

Getting up you dust yourself off and look at your surroundings. There are gigantic cells all around you. Not surprising, seeing as this is a prison. You begin to walk along the empty hall peering into the cells when the ground begins rumbling, signaling the coming of another guard. You scramble to find somewhere to hide, cursing your luck. As the monster approaches you feel some wrath flowing into you and curse even more under your breath. "Why the fuck can't I just get a break today!?" you whisper to yourself, running to one of the cells. You slip between the bars just as a huge paw lands outside the cell. Looking up you see an 800 foot werehyena, hands on her hips and wearing a mean smile. She's also completely nude, but her fur pretty much covers her. "How we doing Ariel?" she asks mockingly. Yet another rumble sounds right behind you as someone walks up to the cell. Two of the standard issue prison shoes land on either side of you and you look up to see that they're being worn by a yellow-green skinned gremlin girl. "Just peachy Cree." the gremlin answers sarcastically. "Don't you have anything better to do than torment us?" Cree just laughs, her tongue sticking out. "Like you criminals deserve better! I'm just doing my job and checking up on you." She looks down on the smaller woman condescendingly and reaches into the cell. She flicks Ariel's nose with her claw and walks away, laughing to herself.

Ariel rubs her nose and turns to go back to her bunk. You can hear her grumbling, feeding more wrath into you with her anger at Cree. "I hope I don't run into that lousy mutt, she seems like a real bitch." you mutter angrily. After Ariel plops herself down on the bed you decide to exit the cell and try to find your target. Ursula has to be around here somewhere, but where? She's a pretty serious criminal, so you'd think she would be where they keep the worst ones. The area you're in now looks like a pretty normal row of cells. You could just check the rest of these, but you could also head down another hall and try to find some more prisoners. You'd better decide fast. You don't want to stay standing still for too long with these guards appearing at random.
1243321122211.title: You Get Away

12433211222112.content:
Deciding that Ursula is probably somewhere else, you start walking along the prison hall. You look up at each cell and see the various criminals locked up. One holds a white skinned orc who is pacing back and forth with her arms crossed like she's thinking. You get a flash of pride as you hear her thoughts. "This next one should work if I can get the ingredients. I'm a great sorceress, I can get out of here!" Further down you see a muscular chesire cat doing sit ups. She seems to have some kind of collar on. "Oh I can't wait until i see my Wade again!" she thinks, throwing of some lust at you. You have to rush past this one, or you might end up trying to go to her filled with lust. One cell that grabs your attention is one that has no bars. Rather, it seems more like glass. You walk closer to it and see a woman floating around inside made of some kind of green gas. Guess the cell was made to keep her in specifically. You don't actually hear anything from her, but a small feeling of sloth is hanging around her. There's also a kitsune who has massive breasts in one cell. They're not as big as the planet destroyers on that onryo though. This girl seems to be having pleasant thoughts, but you can feel a little greed in each one. Yes, it seems this prison has quite a colorful set of inmates.

Eventually in your trek you reach a cross section and have to decide where to go. One path leads to a set of stairs, while the other leads to a darker hallway. For once your new powers come in handy and you sense much more powerful sins coming from the darker path. You figure thats where Ursula is and head that way. As you walk you lament the fact that you're in a situation where finding a convict is useful. The further you go down the hall the darker it gets. Every now and then one of the guards will walk by, but you're so small they don't pay you any mind. You just need to avoid getting squished. When you finally reach the cells you can feel the sins around you. The air is thick with it. This place doesn't have normal lighting like the rest of the prison either. There are lamps hanging from the ceiling, making it seem much darker.

This new area is unlike the others. Just standing here is making your head swirl with different thoughts and emotions. "Man what I wouldn't give to just get laid." one voice says. "When I get this damn muzzle off, someone's becoming my lunch." another sounds. You walk further into the hall, wary of getting too close to the cells. If these prisoners are as bad as the auras they're giving off, they might just snatch you up. "Why the fuck do I even have to do this?!" you think, catching some of the abundant wrath going around. "I just wish I could go home to Mazee. I'd love to have some of that rat booty right now." Lust takes over for a second. As the sins around you mess your head you decide to get looking, but how will you find Ursula?
12433211222112.title: Search Another Hallway

12433212.content:
You and Mazee soon are in the cafeteria eating a lunch prepared by Korina the black European dragoness. You're waiting nervously as Mazee returns with a plate of tacos and nachos smothered in cheese. You pick at one of the nacho chips and bite into it as you're still worried. "Tim," says Mazee. "Don't get yourself worked up. We'll get through this." "I hope so," you say. "I feed off of sins now. Today I felt the sins of sloth and lust. The latter worries me." Mazee just bites into a taco herself. As you and your rodent girlfriend are eating, something comes over you.

Grace walks by carrying a plate that had at least seventeen cheeseburgers on it. You have no idea where that pear-shaped cheetah kept it all, but she was definitely qualified for her job as a food critic. As Grace plops down on the table across from you and Mazee, you feel your stomach in pain and start to ravenously pull the meat out of the taco in Mazee's hand and shovel in into your mouth. You were suddenly very hungry and eat the taco so fast you accidentally bite Mazee. "Ouch!" You gasp. "I'm sorry, Mazee," you say. "But I'm starving! I need more tacos. Please?" Mazee notices Grace eating like Garfield and realizes something. You were feeling another sin; gluttony.

"Wait right here," says Mazee. "I'll be right back." "Hurry!" you yell as you bite into a nacho even bigger than yourself. You groan as you get so out of control with hunger that you even bite into Mazee's napkin and begin to cry. As you're chewing the napkin, you hear Grace's thoughts. "I wonder how Tim would taste in one of these cheeseburgers. A fallen angel, I'll bet he tastes spicy. Looking at those succulent wings. I'm definitely going to eat him one of these days. I'll just wait for him to lower his guard and when Mazee's not there to protect him... chomp."

You really hope those wings set in just in case those burgers don't fully satisfy the cheetah's monstrous hunger. As you're wondering what to do, something else comes over you, it was Bea Zebub, the succubus intern. You gag and find yourself staring at her heart shaped butt and her devil's tail as she bends over and adjusts her fishnet stockings. You're actually drooling and you have to cover your mouth as you begin to cry. You can even hear Bea's thoughts as well.

"Aye carumba," says Bea. "I can't believe he's still trapped in there. I gotta start looking for bigger men. I can still feel him walking around in my tunnel trying to get out. That's gotta be the third human this year that's gotten stuck in there." You shiver and fold your wings.

Then suddenly you grunt and grit your teeth. "What is taking that rat bitch so long?!" Then you gasp. "Oh no! Did I just call Mazee a bitch!? This is all that stupid doctor's fault! And that damn Tara. Next time I'm going to mess her face up on...?!" Where was all that rage coming from? Lexi passes by and you can hear her thoughts as well. "That surgery is bound to come apart," she thinks to herself. "And I'll be glad when his scars open up and he falls right apart. I hope that little parasite suffers every second of it." Lexi was no doubt speaking about you.

Against your better judgement, you're forced to retaliate. "Oh yeah!?" you yell. "I don't need to take that kind of guff from somebody who uses a sandbox as a toilet!" Then you cover your mouth as Lexi turns her head. Horrifyingly, she isn't angry but smiling malicious. "Screw you." You say in both fear and anger. "Oh no," says Lexi with a grin. "Screw you." The sphinx laughs wickedly and then leaves. You're still chewing on the napkin when Mazee returns.

"What took you so long!" you yell. "I'm starving you bloated...!" "Tim!" yells Mazee. "That's just Grace's gluttony and Lexi's wrath talking." You let out a moan and then you grunt. "Lexi's always on my case but never on yours," you say. "It's not fair. Kiki, Ari and Anna-Maria area all worse employees than me but she always picks on me." Why were you saying it, where was that jealousy coming from. Then you hear thoughts and you turn to see Beth hiding in the corner. "Look at her with her newly transformed boyfriend. Fallen angel. He should be with me, I'm one of the demon beasts. He's a chubby chaser and I have the biggest ass of any monster girl in here. That rat."

As Beth is ranting and giving you her jealousy, Mazee looks in horror because you can't help but stare at Grace's huge butt as she gets up and takes her empty tray away. "Meow." You say. Mazee looks in shock at what you said and you're in just as much shock and even begin to cry. "I'm sorry," you say. "I can't help it if.... Blake has some HUGE gazongas." You cover your mouth and then look forward to see that Blake was at the next table and she was smiling seductively as she licked a banana. "Go ahead little man," thinks the tigress to herself. "I'm all yours." You scram and then grab your head as Mazee looks on in worry.

Blake and Beth see you like this and then both of them get a fiendish idea. As Mazee takes you and rushes away, Beth walks up and sits next to Blake, albeit requiring three chairs to hold her large ass. "He is going absolutely out of control with sin," says Beth. "Especially lust. I wonder if he heard our thoughts." "He definitely did," says Blake. "If this keeps up, Mazee might even break up with him." "Then let's milk this for all it's worth," says Beth as she shows her hippo-like fangs. "We'll aggravate his lust so bad he'll have no choice but to choose one of us." The tigress purrs as she shakes hands with Beth and both monsters form a diabolical plan.

Soon, Mazee has you back at her cubicle and you're shivering. Beth and Blake see this and smile at each other. "Commence Operation Fetish Fuel," says Blake. "Get your sexy on, Beth. We're going to have some fun."

But which one of them strikes first?
12433212.title: A Sinful Lunch

choices: Interview a Candidate for Mayor of Fearfield
Investigate Construction going on at a School
125.content:
"I think today I'll have you work with Ari. That's not a problem is it?" "Um." You muttered. You didn't like Ari at all. She's one of the few people you can say that you hate. Ari fabricated news stories and spread lies regarding the subjects she was dispatched to deal with. You're afraid one of these days it would case somebody to sue the Daily Tombstone.You're about to speak to Lexi but then you stop yourself. Ari warned you if you told Lexi about what she was doing she'd eat you. "Uh nothing boss. No problem." You gulp and take out your camera to rub it. Sometimes you dreaded being a photographer at this newspaper.

You begin to walk away as Lexi gives a confused look. She then shrugs her shoulders. "As long as that human isn't in my office, I don't care." You reach the cubicle area and gulp as you approach Ari. At that moment, that fat red wooled weresheep was working at her laptop before she notices you and glares at you. "So," she says. "You're working with me todaaaaay slaaaave." She rolled her As, very common for a sheep based monster. "Staaaaart rubbing." Ari puts both of her hooves in front of you and gives you a glare. You see her biting into what appears to be a human shape covered in chocolate and then shiver as you start rubbing the soles of her hooves. You hated working for that slavedriver of a sheep, but you had no choice but to do what she said lest you wind up in her belly.

After ten minutes, you stop the massage and Ari looks down at her feet. "Not baaaad," she bleats. "But I expect better in the future you little baaaastard." Ari then lifts you up and then holds you by the leg in front of her face. "Ari." You moan. Ari squeezes your leg and makes you yell before she gets up and places you in her chair and sits on you. It's not enough to squish you but you're still in pain from being sat on in the first place. To really make it painful, Ari wiggles her large woolly butt to grin you. "That's Goddess Ari worm. Don't ever forget that. The only thing humaaaaans are good for is slaaaave laaaabor. If only the others like Maaaazee and Willaaaaa understood that. Come on bug, we're going on a report." Ari gets up with you plastered between her cheeks. You really didn't like how condescending she was towards you, but what could you do? She was more than one hundred times bigger than you.

Ari is walking out the front door when you speak to her. "A... er Goddess Ari, you're not gonna fabricate this story like when you told everyone that movie theater was built on a Grootslang graveyard are you?" Ari lets out a scoff. "If I'm gonna staaaaay top reporter, I've got to make things interesting. Faaaaacts will only get in the waaaaay." "But if Lexi finds out, you'll be fired." "She isn't gonna find out and if you taaaattle on me, you'll be in my belly." You gulp before Ari squeezes you out of her cheeks and into her hand before placing you in her ear. "While you're up there,' she says. 'Clean out my earwaaaaaax." You stick out a tongue and reluctantly start picking the weresheep's ear cavity and cleaning out a sea of yellow wax. "So Goddess Ari. What's our mission today?"
125.title: Ari the Weresheep

choices: Investigate a virus at a hospital
1253.content: What other stories are there to report (and for Ari to possibly lie about)?
1253.title: Reader's Choice

12531.content:
"Well, a doctor at Feaaaaarfield General said he's found a new disease, and he waaaaaants a reporter there to see it." Ari says as you finish cleaning her ears. You feel like your going to vomit.

"Really?" You say. "What virus?"

Ari shurgs. "He didn't saaaaaay. He just waaaaants us down there soon. So we aaaaaare heading out now." She then smiles and plucks you out of her ears, heads to a nearby sink, and washes the earwax off of you.

"Uh, thanks." You say, surprised.

"Well, while I drive, you'll be cleaning the lint out of my belly button, and I don't want waaaaaaax there." Ari says, grinning before suffing you in her belly button. You sigh and start pulling at a big lint ball while Ari leaves the building.

------------------------
It was only an hour to Fearfield General Hospital, but for you, it felt like an eternity. After you were done pulling out her belly button lint, Ari made you floss her teeth. You swore you saw bones in there. By the time you finished, Ari had parked and gotten out.

"We're here, slaaaaave." She says. You sigh. Hopefully, she wouldn't work you like a dog while on the field.

The two of you entered the hospital lobby. There, you saw a male werewolf walk up to you. This must be the doctor who found the disease. He smiles.

"Welcome to Fearfield General. I'm Dr. Harry Kaufmann. You must be the reporters?" He said.

"Yup. I'm AAAAAAri Wooller." Ari says.

"I'm Tim-" You begin to say.

"So, Dr. Kaaaaaufmann," Ari interrupts. "You said you found a new diseaaaase?"

Dr. Kaufmann nods. "Follow me."

He leads you and Ari up to a room on the second floor. Once inside, he shows you a patient. The patient was an overweight female werecat. She looks upset, but otherwise healthy.

Ari was confused. "Whaaaaats wrong with her? She looks like aaaaaany other werecaaaaat."

"That's just it." Dr. Kaufmann replies. "Yesterday, she wasn't a werecat. She was human."

You and Ari both gasp. "What?"

"Yes." Dr. Kaufmann replies. "Poor Carla here was just a normal, skinny human. Then, out of the blue, she suddenly turned into a fat werecat. She came here and we ran some tests. We've managed to isolate some symptoms."

"And those are?" You ask.

Dr. Kaufmann grabs a clipboard and flips through it. "The major symptom seem to be a total species conversion, but other symptoms are high weight gain, temporary blindness in the right eye, moderate deafness, moderate coughing, mild sneezing, and mild vomiting."

"Wow, that sounds baaaaad." Ari says.

"We haven't been able to isolate a cure yet, but we have discovered something in the hour before you got here. She sneezed on two other patients, a ghost and a vampire, and they instantly turned into a rose monster and a human, respectivly. Not just that, but the ghost patient was male, but is now female. That means there is a slight chance of switching genders." Dr. Kaufmann explains.

Before anyone could say anything, Carla, the human-turned-werecat, suddenly turned and sneezed right on...
12531.title: Going Viral

13.content:
“On second thought,” says Lexi. “Perhaps you should help out the other reporters around the building.” There were five special reporters that did more than just field work for the newspaper and you had worked with them before several times in the past.

First was Yulong, the Chinese dragoness who wrote the advice column. You liked her. Yulong never showed any hostile attitude towards you other than mild annoyance when compared to western dragons. Yulong was the wisest monster you’ve ever met and she didn’t hold you responsible for the accidents you caused, even when one of them put her in the hospital. You don’t know how old she is but you think that she’s probably older than Lexi.

Another was the nicest monster in the building, Cleotiti the mummy. She was hired to write a fashion column for girl monsters and also had several tips for home improvement and style. She couldn’t even be compared to her twin sister who you heard was the meanest mummy in the world. But Cleotiti had a bad experience with a mean human who left her so traumatized that seeing a human would send her into a blind panic no matter how nice she was and she even tried to stomp on you at one point.

One other monster that was unintentionally harmful to you was Emma the polar werebear. On the plus side, the ursine giantess got you front row seats to the monster sports like football and hockey, but she was not careful when it came to you and sometimes you fell too close to the action. Also because she forgets how tiny you are and how big she is and doesn’t wear glasses like she should, Emma unintentionally endangers you. Last time you worked with her, she mistook you for a piece of chewing gum and you were stuck in her mouth trying to avoid getting crushed by her titanic teeth before you were tangled in the gum already in her mouth and stuck to the underside of a table. You were lucky given how she usually swallows her gum.

And there was a monster malicious and friendly at the same time oddly enough. That nudist weretiger entertainment critic Blake. She didn’t accept you had a girlfriend and was always asking you when you and Mazee were going to break up so she could have you herself. That flirting feline was ought to get you by hook or by crook. One time she even put you in a cage and you had to stay at her apartment for three days. You were afraid to work with her because Mazee would kill you if you cheated on her.

Then there was the monster you feared the most, that pear shaped werecheetah food critic Grace. Grace was perhaps the greatest culinary critic in the monster world and a review from her could be a blessing or a curse to any restaurant. She could remember everything she’s ever tasted and unfortunately for you, she’s tasted over one hundred recipes for humans and you’re convinced they’re her favorite food. She acts like your friend and is polite to you but you know she’s planning to eat you the second you drop your guard. Grace might even have you cooked.

But which one will Lexi send you to help today? You were almost too afraid to find out.
13.title: Special Addition

131.content:
Lexi then let out a sigh and a smile. "Maybe I"ll be nice to him for once. Maybe he'll surprise me." Lexi turned to you before giving you your assignment. "Tim," she says. "Today you're going to be assisting Yulong with the advice column." "Yes, Lexi." You say. You run out of Lexi's office and for once the sphinx is smiling.

Yulong was one of the easiest monsters in the building to work with. She was a giant green skinned Chinese dragoness. While western dragons were often cruel, barbaric, greedy and harmful to humans, Chinese dragons were patient, kind-hearted and wise. In fact, whenever Yulong got injured by your bad luck, she never held it against you. As you reached Yulong's desk, you saw that she was already at work and that she had her arm in a small cast. Yulong was in charge of the advice column. Because of her wisdom and patience, Lexi thought it would be best to leave the dragon lady in charge of helping people with personal problems.

Yulong hears you coming and the elderly dragon turned her head to face you. "Hello, Tim," she says to you. "How are you today." "I'm fine. Lexi asked me to help you with the advice column." Yulong lets out a cheerful laugh and lowers her long tail to lift you up. As you're on the dragon woman's desk, you see several letters that Yulong had yet to open, obviously from people seeking her wisdom and help.

Then you turned around and see a photograph of a teenage dragoness who looked taller than Yulong and with golden yellow scales and long black hair with green highlights. "That's my granddaughter, Topaz," says Yulong. "She lives out in Dreadberry." "She looks so beautiful," you say. "And tall. She actually looks bigger than you. I thought dragons were supposed to keep getting bigger with age." Yulong shrugged her shoulders. "Elderly dragons can sometimes shrivel and shrink like elderly humans. But I'm sure that Topaz is still growing. Although, half the advice letters I receive come from my son, James. He's been acting up ever since Topaz started dating." "Why is that? Is she dating a real jerk."

"Not exactly," says Yulong. "Her boyfriend, George, well, he's a... western dragon. I usually try to avoid them myself but I don't have any prejudice against them. You see, Tim, western and Chinese dragons are very different. Not only in appearance but in attitude. James is afraid that George is like other western dragons and will lead Topaz astray." You let out a scoff. "All fathers of teenage girls act that way, Yulong."

Yulong just lets out a laugh at that. "Well, better get to work. Just pick one of the letters and we'll see who will be the first to get our advice in today's column." You nod your head and walk up to pick out one of Yulong's letters.
131.title: Wisest Dragon

choices: A few new advices just shown up
Lexi comes in to check on you two
1311.content:
“Okay… I think this one from this monster shall do.” You said, just as you picked one of the letters at random. Yulong is right, Chinese dragons are wiser than western dragon, but of course each of the dragon sides has their own strengths and weaknesses. After you picked your letter that you wanted to do, you let Yulong know and then she proceeds to open the mail right up and notices the letter is from a teenage girl. Typical girls, but what this letter has a case that is quite interesting. Maybe this could be one of the jobs that won’t give you any bad luck today.

“Dear Yulong. I am writing this to you because I am having such a problem with my twin sister as I wanted to spend more time with her; however we are like polar opposites of each other. I am smart in academics, and while my sister is decent in her grades, she is more like an athletic and really takes her skills for granted. I just want to help her getting a better future as the finals are coming up, and we are both seniors, and I really feel like she should get into a good college and stuff. Is there any advice that you can give me, as I want to help my twin sister.” The letter said (from an unknown monster), and you were asked to read it out, and both you and Yulong were interested in what advice that you two could give to her.

“Well, this is a good one. Polar opposites! I would say that it’s here decision, but perhaps at the same time, perhaps try to encourage her, and also spend some time with her doing things that she likes, and perhaps she might start to see things her way as well.” Yulong said, as it is the wisest opinion. While you can encourage her, it is her own path that she chooses, and you should respect the path that she chosen for her life. You agreed with her stance with a head shake up and down. It is perhaps the wisest advice to give her. After all, everyone has a path that they chose in life, and unless it’s a bad one, everyone should respect the life that they have chosen. “That is a good way of putting it Yulong. You are wise.”

“That is true. Why not pick another letter while I write this once right now?” Yulong smiled just as she replied to your statement. “Like I said, I have nothing against the western dragons.” You then went out and picked another letter and opened it, and right after Yulong finished writing that one letter, she proceeded to read the next letter. “Got that one done, let’s see what this one holds.”

“Hello Yulong, this is Kari, and I am a drider. Both me and Sonia live in the human world, and we both want to help out the humans somehow, and both me and Sonia don’t know what to do, is there anything that you can suggest?” the letter said.

“That is an interesting question.” Yulong thought, and then proceeded to turn to you. “Is there any advice you can give them?” “Well I honestly don’t know. I really don’t know them myself. I really didn’t had a lot of experiences in my own world. My life was incredibly jinx with bad luck, and I caused so many problems that my town exiled me to Fearfield, so I honestly don’t know on that one.” You told her with completely honesty. “Well sometimes it’s view life that can make an impact. From the sense that what you had, it must seems that you have some negativity in you.” Yulong told you, and you listen to her advice. “That is true and I need to start looking more up. Besides, what I am doing right now doesn’t have bad luck. I could say that perhaps they could do some good deeds like playing with the kids, helping out in construction, and those stuff like that.” you told her.

“That could be some good advice. I will also add that perhaps if anyone ask them for help, perhaps accept the offer.” Yulong then replied to you. “I will grab one more letter than I am taking a break.” You replied to her just as you started to get exhausted. “I agree, some of these letters are quite challenging and could give your brain a hard time processing, also good to reduce the stress level.” Yulong replied just as she agrees with your idea. You then went and pick up the last letter you are doing with her for right now. This one is a bit of a juicy one.

“Yulong, this is your friend Argetha. Funny enough I am not one of those aggressive western dragons, and in fact I am kinda like you. I won the lottery and I am just a bit nervous about all the money that we have right now, and that I might end up going crazy with it. Is there any advice that you can give me?” the letter said.

“Well both you and I never won the lottery, but with money comes a big thing, good management.” You said to Yulong. “If I won the lottery, I would pay off the house, pay off the taxes, and invest in a business.” “That is easily the best advice I can give anyone. Don’t blow the money off so quickly. I had a few friends who I told them not to blow their money, yet they did, and… let’s just say that things went downhill for them.” Yulong told you just as she writes the advice for her. “Good idea.” You replied.

After you got the last letter done, both you and Yulong begin to take a good break from all the advice giving, and you prepare to later give more out. That is when…?
1311.title: For the First Time, I Have No Bad Luck

choices: No... and she tries to crush you!!!!
132.content:
"AH!!!!!!!" someome screamed just as she came in and saw it. It was a Mummy girl, but more specifically... Cleotiti! She was hiding behind a desk just so she cannot see you. You were like what the fuck was that? You heard that she had an incident with a human, and thank to this, she is freaking scared to death on even meeting a human. You tried to move forward... but she screamed "AH.... stay away, don't burn me...!"

"Relax... I ain't going to do anything bad to you. I am Tim... and I am going to be your partner today..." you explained to her, and then she begins coming out and shyly comes out to you. "Are you really not going to burn me?" "No... I ain't, and I think you and I can be excellent partners." you also added, and Cleotiti seems to trust you for a moment, but is it enough?
132.title: Cleotiti the Mummy

choices: She wants your advice on something.
She needs you for a personal project...
Cleotiti panics the moment you climb onto her hand!
1321.content:
Cleotiti is still visibly shaking behind her desk. She's staring at you like she wants to trust you, but something's keeping her back. "Y-You sure y-you won't burn me?"

You hold up your arms. "I don't see anything flammable on me, do you?"

Cleo examined you carefully. "N-No... I-I guess you don't..." she slowly, but surely emerged from behind her desk. "Y-You're my p-partner for today? Why?"

You didn't actually have the answer for that. "I'm not sure... maybe Lexi was hoping you'd crush me or something."

Cleotiti finally gathered up the courage to bend down to get a look at you. "Y-you seem like a n-nice human... I... guess you could work with me." She lowered a bandaged and shaking hand down toward you. You weren't sure if you should climb on or not... after a moment, you finally climbed onto the mummy's hand. "So, what's the first order of business?"
1321.title: The Start of Something New

choices: A story on a start up fashion company
13212.content: What kind of project is it?
13212.title: She needs you for a personal project...

132122.content: Alright, now who will they be interviewing.
132122.title: An interview witha fashion model

1321221.content:
"A-Actually, I n-need help with a p-personal project." Cleotiti says, voice still shaking.

"Sure, what's up?" You ask.

"I-I finally managed to g-get an interview with H-Henriette de Hellta, but I n-need help with it." Cleotiti explains before showing you a picture.

You look at the picture. It was of Henriette on a Paris catwalk. She was a blue skinned succubus with red hair reaching her lower back and orange eyes. She had medium sized wings and a devil tail. But that wasn't her most notable thing. She was gargantuanlly fat. She even made Mazee look like a twig. You were amazed that she could even move.

You were not happy to here Cleotiti's project. Henrietta was a BBW model, the first succubus one, and considered one of the best. But she was also, for lack of a better term, a complete bitch. She was extremely selfish and arrogant, only caring about herself. She also had a reputation for being extremely hard to work with. She was also absolutely obsessed with getting even fatter. She wanted to be the first BBW model to be completely immobile. And you had a feeling she wouldn't stop then.

"Why do want to interview her? She's one of the biggest diva's ever. Every other person she's worked with says she's ungodly self-centered." You ask Cleotiti.

"B-Because interviews with her are really rare. I-If I get one, m-maybe the Daily T-Tombstone will be even more p-popular." She explains.

"I guess that makes sense. Where is the interview going to be?" You ask.
1321221.title: The Biggest (literally) Diva Ever

13212211.content:
"W-We are g-going to her p-penthouse downtown." Cleotiti says. "She s-said she didn't want to c-come to a "dump" l-like this."

You felt a little insulted. The Daily Tombstone was a great place. How could she call it a dump?

Cleotiti took you in her shaking hand and left the building, heading for her car. Once in her car, she placed you in a cup-holder and drove off.

About 40 minutes later, you arrive at the apartment building the penthouse was at. It was a much more expensive building than Monster Arms and much nicer. Henrietta's penthouse was the entirity of the top 3 floors.

Putting you on her shoulder, Cleotiti walks up to the intercom. She pushes a button. "Ms. de Hellta? I am Cleotiti. We have an interview with you schedueled." She was trying to sound professional inspite of her fear. A few seconds pass, and then a German-accented voice came through the speaker.

"You may enter."

You and Cleotiti enter the building and head for the elevator. Cleotiti pushes the button for floor 68, the bottom of Henrietta's penthouse.

A few seconds later, the elevator reaches the floor and the doors open. You look at the penthouse in awe. It was really high class. Marble floors, various paintings and sculptures, rare plants everywhere. As much of a bitch as she was, Henrietta knew how to live.

And sitting at a mahogeny table in the center, eating a massive meal, was Henrietta herself. She was only clad in black underwear that you guessed was made of some expensive material. And from the looks of it, she was even fatter now than she was in the picture. Her gargantuan rear and giant breasts were straining the underwear, and her titanic belly filled up her lap.
She turned her head and looked at you. Slowly, she got up out of the chair and waddle towards you. Even on Cleotiti's shoulder, you felt the tremors.

"Greetings, Ms. Cleotiti." Henrietta said, in the same German accent as on the intercom. You had thought a servent called down. "You have the honor of being in the presence of the greatest and fattest BBW model in history, Henrietta de Hellta!"

Great, we just met and already she's being an egotist.

"Do you have any servents? We've never heard you speak before, so we didn't know that was you." Cleotiti says, still trying to sound professional.

"I do, but I refuse to let them use the intercom. I don't want to deny the public the chance to hear my lovely voice." Henrietta told her. She was really being an egotist.

Before she continued, she saw you on Cleotiti's shoulder. How does she react?
13212211.title: An Ego to Match Her Weight

132122111.content:
"Oh my, it looks like one of my fans has come as well." Henrietta said, beaming with joy. "Not that I blame them. All my fans want to bask in my presence."

"Actually, Ms. de Hellta, I work with Cleotiti at the Daily Tombstone. My name is Tim." You explain.

"Ah, so you work there too? All the better. I'll give you a autographed picture of me when we finish. I'm sure you're friends will be jealous that you got meet me." Henrietta said.

"Um, thanks. Anyway, we should-" You begin to say. But before you could finish, Henrietta suddenly grabbed you and, for no reason, dropped you into her cleavage. "WAH! What the- why did you do that?"

"This is you're first interview with a model as amazing as me, so I am giving you something my fans, male and female alike, would KILL to have: a chance to ride in my magnificent bosom." Henrietta said proudly. All you could hope was that Mazee wouldn't hate you for this.

"Uh, anyway, should we get started with the interview?" Cleotiti said, much calmer now that you weren't on her shoulder.

"Of course. But I must let you know, there is one more reporter here. I mean, I'm such an amazing person that I couldn't possibly limit myself to ONE reporter." Henrietta explained. On that note, she walked towards her living room, with you bouncing around in her cleavage. When she got there, you were surprised to see that the other reporter was...
132122111.title: A Gift for a Fan

1321221113.content:
You look in shock because the reporter that came in was none other than Mazee herself, much to Cleotiti's own surprise. "What are you doing with my Tim?" asks Mazee accusingly towards Henrietta. "Mazee!" you yell. "It isn't what...?" Before you can explain, Mazee plucks you away and Henrietta looks at Mazee in confusion. "Your Tim?" Mazee nodded her head and scowled. "He's my boyfriend." Henrietta gives a look of pure surprise. "Boyfriend? Oh my. I... I didn't know." For somebody who had a reputation for being very mean and selfish, Henrietta actually looked embarrassed at what she had done. You even give a deep breath as Mazee shows her teeth and looks down at you.

You're afraid that Mazee is going to be angry with you since another girl had her hands on you but then Mazee turns to Henrietta. "Just make sure that it doesn't happen again." Henrietta gives a nervous laugh. "Look," she says. "I'll admit I'm not the nicest person, but I'd never steal another girl's man. That's not the kind of creature I am." You give a sigh of relief and then Mazee kisses you. "Well," says Mazee. "I think I'll let it slide this time. Now, let's continue on with the interview." Mazee then places you in her pocket before the interview with Henrietta continues on for another hour. You learn about how she got her start in the modeling world and learn a few things about her romance life. As you and Mazee continue the interview, you see Cleotiti seems to be opening up and getting over her fear of humans.

- - -

After the interview is over, the three of you exit Henrietta's place and Cleotiti gives a smile. "That interview went much better than I thought," says Cleotiti. "There wasn't a single jinx attack." You then smile. "Does this mean that you're not afraid of humans anymore." Cleotiti gives a nervous smile. "Actually," she says. "I don't know if I'll ever get over my fear of humans. But I'm coming to a very good start. I'll take our notes back to the office and leave you and Mazee alone." "See you later, Cleo." Says Mazee.

As Cleotiti walks away, you and Mazee look towards each other and laugh. "Mazee," you say. "I thought you were going to kill me when you saw what Henrietta nearly did to me." Mazee gives a scoff. "Give me some credit, Tim, I'm not that thin skinned. This actually works well for me. There's a new cafe that opened up and I was thinking maybe we should pay it a visit." You give a smile. "That's a good idea, Babe. We just have to wait for Willa."

Mazee looks in confusion. "Willa?" she asks. "Why Willa?" You give a giggle. "It's a surprise, silly. Hey, where did Willa go." Mazee bit her lip. "Willa had the unenviable task of interviewing an acquaintance of Henrietta. Julia Henrik." You gag both literally and mentally. "That woman child? No thanks." You hear a scream and then sure enough, you see Willa walking forward with her hand to her face and growling. "Willa?" you ask. "Are you alright?" Willa let out a sigh. "That blasted gator nearly drove me to tear my hair out. Lexi had better give me a raise for this." Then Willa notices Mazee and looks in surprise. "Mazee? I thought Tim was assigned to Cleo." Mazee nodded her head. "He was. But Henrietta wanted more than one reporter at the scene." Willa nods her head. "Too right."

You then gesture to Willa and Willa blinks. "Oh. You're ready now. Alrighty then." Willa reaches into her pouch and Mazee looks in confusion. "I have something to give you, Mazee," you say. "And I asked Willa to hold it for me.... because it's too heavy for me to carry." Mazee looks in confusion and then gasps as Willa holds out a small box and then opens it. Inside there is a bright pink diamond ring.
1321221113.title: Ring Ring

choices: You hit someone looking to see what the matter is...
13213.content:
You suddenly feel the ground below you start violently shaking. Cleo's hand is shaking nervously, and she starts hyperventaliting. Odd... you didn't think she'd need to breathe... "Um... Cleo?" Suddenly, Cleo jerks her hand up and she starts screaming. "My hand! My hand! It's on fire! Aieeee!" She threw you up into the air and you hit the fan on the roof. The poor mummy is flailing her arm as if it were on fire. She was running around her office, knocking over furniture and decorations alike. You start to wonder what kind of person would do something to make her like this...

Before you could think too much, her panic flipped the switch for the fan. You start spinning around faster and faster around the fan. Something must've broke it because it's going much faster than it's supposed to! The force was too strong for you and you couldn't hold on much longer. You start flying off the fan and start sailing like a rocket toward something you couldn't see...
13213.title: Jinx + Panic = Not good...

choices: Turn You Into a Miniature Monster
1322.content:
You walk forward and Cleotiti shakes in place as she even starts playing with her own gauze. But you figure that she's not a bad monster. Cleotiti was friendly with everyone else in the building and it was said that she used to be extremely kind towards humans before Wade traumatized her. So you smile and hold out your hand.

Cleotiti nervously steps forward but then her eyes pop, she thinks back to the day where that one bad human set a loose bandage on her ankle on fire. The flammable gauze and Cleotiti's own dry body were a devastating combination that resulted in a giant burning, screaming mummy blindly rampaging through town. No humans were killed and Cleotiti herself survived only because she was already dead. But the damage was done and just thinking about Wade burning her like that frightened Cleo.

The mummy giantess screams and jumps up on her desk to your surprise. "Calm down Cleo," you say. "I'm not going to..." "Stay back!" screams Cleotiti. "Don't come another step closer." You walk towards Cleo's chair as she shakes in place and then she holds down her hands. "Not one step," she says. "Please. I don't want any trouble." "Cleo," you say. "Just calm down."

But instead, Cleo looks down and instead of seeing you, she sees an illusion of Wade carrying a cigarette lighter and a gallon of gasoline. "Stay out of my town monster bitch," says the illusion of Wade. "Take this."

That's the last straw and Cleo screams before she holds down her hands and unconsciously shoots out a stream of magical energy. You grunt as the magic hits you and begin to twitch. Being a mummy Cleotiti could use ancient Egyptian magic. However, she normally chose not to cast spells. But fear makes people do crazy things and Cleotiti was afraid of humans most of all. Whether she knew it or not, she was casting a spell on you

The question is, what does the spell do?
1322.title: Panic Attack

13221.content:
You get on your knees and suddenly Cleotiti's magic begins to transform you. "Get back! Get back! Get back!" yells Cleo as she continues to unconsciously cast the spell. You see your hands throbbing and you realize that you're being turned into a human sized monster.

But what do you turn into?

(Note: Please leave room for people to give their own choices of transformation)
13221.title: Mini Monster You

choices: Cleotiti! She came back for work.
13222.content:
Her already gigantic body started to grow bigger as her magic shrinks you smaller than you were before. Her voice booms stronger and stronger as she screams for you to go away, causing you to cover your ears. Her crying face goes farther and farther away as you come closer to the ground.

The spell stopped and your minicular form is so small that her pinky toe itself is at the size of a mountain. You tried to call out to her, but to no avail, as your voice can no longer reach her ears. She jumped off the desk and runs off. You tried to go after her, but the difference was simply too big. Each step she makes brings her miles away from you.

The mummy giantess is no longer in sight as she left you panting from the impossible chase. You have to find her fast, you don't know what might happen. Then, suddenly, you heard a footstep coming to you and it belongs to...
13222.title: Shrink You Even Smaller

choices: Try and get her attention... somehow.
Hide and wait the magic out.
132221.content:
Of course, to your dismay it's just Cleotiti returning. She was shaking her head. "Y-you need to cool it, Cleo. C-can't have Lexi getting mad at me again." You watch as she walks over to the desk and just stops, looking around the room. She seems like she's surveying the damage of her little "attack". Did she forget you were here? You watch her settle down in her desk chair, sigh, and look straight down...at you! But her eyes, as giant and all seeing as they were, didn't seem to be registering you. Just how small were you?

Suddenly, a stack of papers falls down next to you, causing you to screech. They filled up your entire view, and then some, raising into the sky farther then you assumed possible. Each piece of paper seemed as thick as a 2 story building. Each piece of paper! You didn't know exactly how small you were, but this was a problem...you'd need to get her attention somehow if you ever hoped to get back to normal. You watch as she takes a single piece of paper off the stack, and sets it down uncomfortably close to you. You watch as she raises her hand into the sky, holding something in her palm, and suddenly BAM, it crashes into the paper. She sets it aside, pulls down another, and another horribly loud BAM fills your eardrums. She's stamping papers? That kind of work doesn't suit her...but that doesn't matter! You need to get her attention! Or do something!

You weigh your options. You need to get her attention more than anything else right now, and you're not sure what your options are, given your height. But of course, you could always hide it out and hope the magic wears off. Can Mummies set permanent magic like that? Maybe hiding would give you a better chance...you could find her when you're a more "reasonable" height. But then again, it might not wear off at all, and you know how that'll turn out...
132221.title: Cleotiti! She came back for work.

133.content:
"Maybe you should work with Emma today. The sports section has been getting a lot of action lately and I think she could use an extra hand. You haven't worked with her since... well, since she almost ate you." You begin to shake but a job was a job. "Okay boss. I've got my camera all ready." You take out your camera and then you fumble it slightly before your hand slips and you accidentally press the button, snapping a flash directly in Lexi's eye. Your sphinx boss screams and bumps into her desk backside first and then knocks her laptop on her head. Lexi growls as she rubs her head and then glares at you as you nervously walk back. "Oops. Looks like I need to put a better hold on this thing." Lexi shows you her fangs and inches closer to you to give you a front row seat to her monstrous teeth. "Mertins," she says. "I suggest you get out of my office as soon as possible, or I might just have to go carnivore."

Not wanting to enrage your boss any further, you run right out the door and have to go find Emma, that polar werebear. You make your way to the cubicle area and spot Emma working at her laptop. She was slouching in her chair to get a closer look given her terrible eyesight and her long jacket as white as her fur was hanging from the side of her cubicle. You see the bottom of the jacket hanging a few feet off the ground and jump up to grab hold of it before you climb up and jump on Emma's desk.

"Emma!" you call out to the werebear giantess. "Emma! Emma!" Emma turns her head and has to try and focus her eyes to try and spot you. "Tim?" she asks. "Is that you?" The gigantic bear woman leans forward and you have to run out of the way before her enormous blubbery breasts crush you and you let out a scream. Emma turns her head and reaches out her claws to pick you up, rather roughly though as you scream as Emma lifts you up and the bear woman places you on her nose. "Oh, there you are Tim." You let out a groan. "Emma, when are you going to get your eyes checked? It wouldn't kill you to wear glasses."

Emma lets out a scoff. "No thanks, I prefer not to look like a librarian." You shake your head. Vain bear. Lexi and Grace don't seem to mind wearing glasses. "So," says Emma as the polar bear goddess puts on her jacket. "Ready to roll. The game will start soon and I've got an article to write. Besides, you could use a little excitement. Two front row tickets here." You laugh nervously as Emma's arctic blue eyes look down at you. Looking at her blonde hair and her all white outfit, you can't help but notice the werebear's resemblance to Emma Frost. That must be where she got her name. But you couldn't think about that. Mazee would get mad.

"So Emma, what kind of game are we going to?"
133.title: Emma the Werebear

choices: Emma's Cleavage Where You are Unnoticed For the Rest of the Game
1332.content:
"Hockey," replied Emma. "Today the Fearfield Fireworms vs the Chillingham Springheels." You were suddenly very afraid. Of all the sports, it had to be one of the most violent ones. This was hockey for crying out loud and monster hockey at that." Emma then walks into her car and places you in the cup holder. "Uh, Emma," you say. "Should you really be driving."

But instead of answering, Emma just takes off. Emma drives like a maniac and no sooner does she leave the tower does she run over a mailbox. Then she proceeds to hit a streetlight and manage to bend it, all while continuing her drive. One argus has to jump out of the way before being run down. You have to hold onto the sides of the cup holder for dear life. You then turn to see a dusty glasses case in the other cup holder. The fact was plain and simple. Emma's eyesight was terrible. Her driver's license required her to wear glasses but she refused to look like a "geek". That polar ursine is going to be the death of you.

With a thump, Emma arrives at the stadium and you fall out of the cup holder onto her fat stomach and get tangled in her fur as she parks the car. While you're still shaking off the landing, Emma plucks you out. "We're here." The werebear says. You then look to see that Emma had managed to knock over the block that marks the parking space. "One of these days," you say. "They're gonna pull your license. Wear your glasses." Emma just lets out a scoff. "And ruin my face? Forget it." You let out a moan. If she doesn't like glasses, she could at least buy a pair of contacts.

Emma then reaches into her purse and takes out a human sized snow parka. "Here, Tim," you say. "You're going to need this." You put on the parka as the skyscraper sized polar bear walks into the stadium with you. It isn't long until the two of you are in your seats. You're both in the front row so Emma could take notes about the game for the newspaper. Not to mention see the game.

Emma munches some popcorn as she stand on the guardrail with your camera out. You're shivering even with your snow parka on. After all, this was a dangerous sport. You heard in one hockey game, a Frankenstein actually got his head knocked off and in another game, an Argus lost a few eyes. The fact was that hockey was already a pretty violent sport even without giant monsters.

"Here they come!" yelled Emma. "Flame on Fireworms!" Emma's yelling forces you to grab your ears in pain as the home team comes forward. The home team was lead by a phoenix and consisted of a dragon, a hydra, a European dragon, a Japanese dragon, a hellhound, a minotaur, a manticore, a golem and an ifrit. The Chillingham team came in next and was led by a Unicorn. It consisted of a gryphon, a hippogriff, a Nemean lion, a white weretiger, a gargoyle, a wereboar, a yeti, a werecrab and a woolly mammoth. All players looked pretty muscular and pretty aggressive looking and were even growling at each other.

"Kill them!" yelled Emma. "They came all the way from the other side of Mons Terra just to dig their own graves! Burn them to the ground, Albus!" Emma is hardly the only fan booing the Chillingham Springheel. She's just yelling louder than the rest of them. Then you look forward to see the goblin referee walking forward. From the looks of it, he is wearing a suit of armor and has bandages underneath as well as a hook for a hand. If that was how they treated the ref, you're terrified of the carnage that goes on on the field.

The ref drop the first puck and the game begins. You snap photographs and you're horrified at what you see. Immediately the game goes into what can best be described as hell on Earth and the fight to get the puck turns nasty. The Chinese dragon has the puck and the werecrab is trying to get it from him, all while trying to strangle him. In response the dragon blew flames in the crab's face right before the Nemean lion tackles him. You look forward and scream because both of them are coming right at you.

You snap a picture right before they both hit the guardrail and you scream and fall, not that Emma notices since her eyes are glued to the game. But the impact was so strong that you were knocked into...
1332.title: Hockey is Homicide

choices: To a new play in town
It's a trap! She's taking you to dinner!
134.content:
"I think I'll have you work with Blake today."

"Oh come on, Lexi! That bloated jungle cat is always trying to steal me from Mazee, ans she'd kill me if she thought I was cheating on her."

"Don't worry about that. Mazee isn't here today, and one day with Blake won't kill you. (Unfortunately.) Now get out of my office before I end up in the hospital again." You make your way through the halls to the cubicle area, narrowly avoiding Auriela as she was repairing a hole in the ceiling (which was there in the first place because of you), up to Blake's "office", so to speak.

Blake was just getting ready to leave as you entered her cubicle. She looks down at you and grins as she gets down on her hands and knees to see you better, her huge, naked breasts and belly hanging. "Well, if it isn't my favorite little coworker! Still with that overgrown rodent?"

"Yes, Blake, me and Mazee are still together, and it's going to stay that way, no matter how much you try to steal me from her, so you may as well give up."

"Aww, but where would the fun in that be? Besides, sooner or later you'll come to your senses and wanth a real woman like me, instead of a super sized sewer dweller like her."

"Keep dreaming. Anyway, Lexi wants me to work with you today."

Blake is overjoyed to hear this as she picks you up and places you on her shoulder. "If you want, I can put you somewhere more comfortable." She says in a lustful tone, pointing to her cleavage. "No thank you." Blake's ears droop as she heads out to the garage.

So where are you going?
134.title: Unwanted Affection

1342.content:
Blake steps into her car that resembles a Porsche with tiger-like eyes for headlights before placing you in the cup holder. You see her looking lustfully down on you before she starts the car and drives off. You see that Blake is driving down the street to what looks to be like a cinema. "Oh," you say. "That's right. Three new movies just came out today." "That's right, handsome," says Blake full of lust. "And Lexi wants me to give them the once over."

You decide to look at the three synopsis in the pamphlets to get a good idea of what you were looking at. After all, you needed to know what to expect. As much as you hated working with Blake and were afraid of her trying to steal you away from Mazee, you were still assigned to help her and from the looks of it, there were three interesting looking movies to review.

The first movie was one called Royal Caper. From the looks of it, it was a murder mystery movie involving 12 monsters of different species who each related to one of the royal suits in a deck of playing cards in some way. But there is a killer among them who has a reason to want at least a handful of the others dead. You are initially interested until you read exactly who wrote that movie. "Jin Orobutcher?" you ask. "Oh no. I hope we don't have to review this movie. You heard of Orobutcher. You heard he was a tsuchinoko infamous for writing movies about death and destruction.

You hope that the second movie is much better, but then you see that the second movie is entitled Hundred Woods, it was a horror movie in which four mental patients have escaped into a cursed forest and while trying to survive the dangers of the woods, they were out to kill each other. Damn, why did the first two movies have to be horror movies.

The last one was hardly any better. It was a movie called Scarlet Moon. It took place during the 1712 werewolf vampire war and from the looks of it, it was a romance movie between a werewolf and a vampire. Leave it to Blake to use a romance movie as an excuse to get close to you. There was also a sub plot in that movie about a vampire scientist using a strange potion to convert other monster species into vampire versions of themselves.

Blake soon reaches the theater and pays for her ticket and yours as you ride on the horny weretiger's shoulder. "So, what movie are we reviewing, Blake?" you ask nervously.
1342.title: The Cinema

choices: Another Wererat - One of Mazee's sisters!
1343.content:
Blake gets into her car and before she turns the key, she opens the glove compartment to take out a roll of lipstick. As the weretigress is applying her makeup, you look on the passenger's seat to see a little black dress that was obviously too small for Blake's massive weight. As Blake puts her seatbelt on and starts the car to drive off. "So you're wearing clothes for a change?" you ask. "This movie "The Escapist" must be good if you're getting dressed up."

That's when Blake flicks you with her claws and you start to tumble down her chest screaming before you land between that fat cat's naked breasts. Blake purrs and shakes her tail in her seat. "Oh, I already reviewed the movie yesterday. I just 'forgot' to tell Lexi." You were confused as you try to stand up between the two mountains of tiger flesh. "Wait, but if the job is finished, what do you need me fo.... oh crap." Blake purrs again and pets you on the head like you're a pet. "My cousin Kath told me about a restaurant on the Terrordale-Fearfield border and Grace gave it five stars already. Don't worry. I'll pay for everything."

You finally realize what's going on and gasp. "Blake!" you yell. "No! This isn't a date is it?!" Blake lets out a purr. "But if Mazee finds out about this, she'll grind my bones into dust. You have no idea how scary she can be when she's mad." Blake sticks out her tongue as she parks the car. "Oh please, we both know you can do better than that overgrown cheese muncher. Have you even noticed what she smells like? It's disgusting." "She's a rat. She can't help it. Please don't."

But then you gag as Blake puts on her little black dress, sealing you between her breasts. The dress was so tight on Blake it could be considered a tattoo. You look up to see the sign outside the restaurant read, "Harvest Moon". You had a bad feeling about this. "Oh crap." Blake is humming to herself as she walks into the restaurant. You bite your nails because if Mazee found out about this, she'd kill you, or worse, dump you.

Blake walks up to the maitre'd, a titanic werebat. "Good evening Ms. William. Table for one I trust." "Table for two actually." Says Blake pointing to you wedged in her cleavage. The werebat is caught by surprised but shrugs his shoulders. "Right this way."

When you reach the table, Black squeezes you out of her breasts and you tumble into a saltshaker. "A waitress will be with you right away." Says the maitre'd before he walks off. You let out a groan but Blake just smiles seductively down at you. "I can't believe you tricked me you fat orange cat! I never agreed to this!" Blake just lets out a laugh. "Believe me, after tonight. You'll forget about Mazee." You shake your head. "Fat chance fat cat." You think to yourself.

Then you feel tremors and look to see a waitress was coming forward, but who is it?
1343.title: The Tender Trap

choices: Kimberley Doesn't Call Mazee, But Blackmails You
13432.content:
"Well, fancy seeing you here Tim-Tim." Says a familiar voice. You gulp because you look up and see an all too familiar face. The waitress was a giant wererat, similar in body shape to Mazee but with yellow-brown fur and blonde hair and she was smiling slyly down at you. "Oh no." You mutter. Even Blake looks slightly worried and bites her claws.

This wererat girl was Kimberley, one of Mazee's six younger sisters. Being a rodent, Mazee came from a big family, but you weren't fond of any of her sisters. Unlike Mazee, those rats were predatory towards humans. In fact, the first time Mazee introduced you, Kimberley asked your girlfriend if she was going to eat you. But now, you were unwillingly on a date with Blake and knowing Kimberley, she'd see this as a way to get you into trouble.

"Well, well," says Kimberley as she wiggles her tail and grins at you. "That doesn't look like my sis. Have a thing for tigers now Tim-Tim?" You start to sweat and turn to Blake who just turns her head the other way. "Don't give me that," you say in annoyance. "This wasn't my idea you gender bent Garfield."

But things are quickly going from bad to worse because Kimberley is taking out her cell phone. You're more afraid than ever. She was going to rat you out to Mazee. If Mazee thinks you're cheating on her with Blake, you're dead. "Wait!" you yell. "Kimberley! This isn't what it looks like! Blake tricked me!" "Excuse me?" asks Blake in shock. "Kimberley," you say. "You know I'd never cheat on Mazee. This isn't what you think. Please don't tell her."

The younger wererat actually seems to be considering whether or not she should tell her sister. She probably knows this isn't what it looks like, but you wouldn't be surprised if she would make it look that way just to get you in hot water with Mazee.
13432.title: From Bad to Worse

135.content:
"I want you to go help Grace today. She could always use another person's opinion, now get out of my office!" Lexi said.
"Understood!" you happily reply. You begin to walk towards the the exit, and you tap the bottom of the door for good luck, but as you passed it the hinges fell off. The door fell to the ground and fell again flat on Lexi's floor. You heard the loud bang and turned around to see what happened.
"Uh...boss...want me to help?"
"JUST GO ALREADY!" she screamed, which scared you enough to sprint away.

You ran all the way to the Misc. reporters area from Lexi's office and you can't help but suck in as much oxygen as you can. It was a long run, plus you managed to injure several monsters along the way and almost burned down the entire top floor. As soon as your hear rate went down, you look up to the giant cubicles where the reporters worked and you walked over to Grace's. You were scared to work with the giantess, but you were also more scared to lose your job. You confidently make your way to the werecheetah's cubicle and you see her doing what she was good at, eating. She was enjoying what looked like deep fried balls of some kind, and Grace was wolfing them down by the handfuls. You take a deep breath and move over to her feet.
"Hey Grace!" you called up to her. She stopped eating for a moment and looked around for a moment before realizing your presence. She looked down and smiled when she saw you.
"Oh, Tim! How nice to see you! Come here real quick..." she said as she reached down for you. You allowed her to pick you up, and she set you down on her desk and brought her face too close to you.
"Hi Grace...Lexi told me that I should you work today."
"Oh great, I was just trying these tiny dumplings. Do you want one?"
"Sure, I'll try one" you say, and walk towards the plate of food, while keeping one eye on Grace. Each one of the dumplings were around your size, so you pick out a fairly small one and pull it to the edge for you to eat.
"I personally like them with just a drop of hot sauce" she says "here, try it." She reached into a drawer of her desk and pulled out a bottle of red sauce and pushed it to you. You tried to grab it, but you tripped over a dumpling and fell over. The cap fell off and doused the fried food in red, spicy sauce, and you were also covered in the sauce, which burned at your eyes.
"Sorry Grace..." you say
"Oh its alright Tim, I'll...
135.title: Grace the Werecheetah

1351.content:
"I'll still eat them. A little hot sauce won't make them inedible." You let out a sigh of relief as you wipe the sauce from your eyes. But then you see werecheetah's clawed fingertips reaching down for you and gasp. Grace picks you up and takes you to her face where she opens her mouth and reveals her sharp teeth and long tongue. You scream slightly because you're sure she's finally going to eat you.

But surprisingly, Grace only sticks out her tongue and licks all around you. You're in utter pain because her tongue is as rough as sandpaper, which made sense since Grace was a cat based monster. But that's not what disturbs you so much as the fact that the cheetah giantess is purring as she laps the hot sauce off your tiny body. She's obviously enjoying your taste. As soon as the hot sauce has been licked off, Grace breaks you off a piece of the dumplings before she starts scarfing again. You bite into the dumpling and it has an odd taste, but you like it.

Then you realize these dumplings were made by monsters. Who knows what they're made of? You decided not to question Grace on answers you might not want to know. "They're good Grace. Are these from a new restaurant." Grace shakes her head and eats three more dumplings before she answers you. "Nah, Korina was just trying out a new recipe and wanted an expert's opinion. Could stand to use a little more salt, but otherwise they're okay. But that does remind me. I'm assigned to inspect a new restaurant that opened up in town. After all, they'll need my okay if they commence with setting up shop."

You let out a nervous laugh as Grace smiles down at you and shows you her teeth as she waves her tail. You weren't going to drop your guard. Grace had a big appetite, so much that you wonder how all of it could go to her hips and ass alone. But you knew for a fact that Grace would gobble you up the second you got careless. Some of the restaurants she judged had people on the menu served in various ways and Grace ate so many humans she developed a taste for them and you're certain they're her favorite food. Grace's predatory nature was made even scarier since she acted so polite and friendly towards you, just like a serial killer, you could see it in the gleam of her glasses.

But Grace wasn't trying to eat you now so you gulp and ask her a question. "So, you need me to help inspect the place." Grace nods her head. "That's right. And please bring your camera so I can highlight what I like the most. Hope you have a stomach for monster cuisine." Grace takes you in her palm before she places you in her back pocket. "Uh Grace," you say. "One last question." "Relax, this is work Tim. Not a date. Mazee will understand." You didn't see it, but as Grace was saying this, she licked her lips. Going to a monster restaurant with a 675ft tall cat you knew for a fact wanted to eat you. Sometimes you wonder if you should ask for a raise.

But what kind of restaurant is this new place you're helping Grace inspect?
1351.title: Cheetah Tongue

choices: You get your food and eat it
13513.content:
“We are going to inspect a fast-food burger joint known as the Undead Burgershot. Home to some of the very best in the undead burger business, I been hearing people were getting sick and unhealthy from the places recently new released Blood-Drain Zombie burger with Mermaid fish and some other stuff I don’t know what the heck is. Don’t worry Tim, I won’t eat you, the other humans I ate in the past were all those who tried to offend me and others, but they do taste good, so stay on my good side, okay?” Grace asked and explained to you. At least there is some relief as she offers not to eat you as long as you stay on her good side, but you couldn’t help but feel questionable on her part as letting your guard down can lead to an untimely death.

“Okay, thanks for the notice.” You replied to her, but you and Grace then walked to the place. It was a long walk as it was pretty far, but eventually you got to the greasily burger joint. You notice the place was completely wrecked and well… busy, and it looked like any ordinary burger joint. “The good news is, humans aren’t an part of the food here.” Grace explained to him.

“That’s nice to know.” You replied back, and when you walk in, Grace came in and since the line is clear, she begins to order something. “One Blood-Drain Zombie burger with Mermaid fish and ah…?” you asked the monstrous waitress… “Blood sauce?” she replied nicely. “That.” you said.

What happens now?
13513.title: A burger joint, and something about me

135131.content:
After a few minutes of cooking, and of course you paying with your money. You eventually receive the human size meal that you ordered, which was the “One Blood-Drain Zombie burger with Mermaid fish and Blood Sauce.” You then were taken by Grace (who has ordered the same meal as you did) to your table, to where you begin to eat your meal. Just as you eat, you suddenly get this feeling like you been hooked. Heck, the burger is good and delicious. “Wow… this place is good, I like their burger.” You said.

“Well I am glad you enjoy it. I do too.” Grace replied with a smile just as she eats her meal. “It’s cooked well-done, a nice standard for the kids. It has enough nutritional value to value for the monsters. I think this place is a good past, but we got still some ways to go.” Grace added just as you and her finish their meals. “Heck, this makes me forget eating humans.”

How, in sudden luck, Grace just enjoys a meal so much, that not only she passes the place easily, but actually refuses for one day to eat any human at all. I hope it’s true, as you are going to another place to eat, and you never know what it might have.

What’s the next place to go to?
135131.title: Delicious!

1352.content: "Just eat you instead" Grace responds and in a blur of motion she snatches you up before you have time to move. "why are you doing this grace I thought we were friends" you say "oh please" she says "you had to have known this was inevitable, I mean how long did you expect to last in a Building full of monsters?" you try desperately to free yourself from her grasp as she raises you above her head and opens her mouth wide giving you a terrifying look down the maw of the giantess. "although you know I could spend a little bit of time and have you prepared properly I am a food critic after all"
1352.title: just eat you instead"

13521.content: "however raw humans always have a unique taste to them and the struggles as they go down is simply divine" and with that she releases you into her mouth. all you manage is a short scream before your cut off by graces massive jaws snapping shut you're granted only a moments reprieve before grace's tongue begins its assault licking you all over, coating you in a layer of saliva and forcing you into her cheek. "you're delicious Tim, probably the best human I've had in a while" Grace says "you have a very unique flavor, I'm sure glad I decided to eat you raw". "please Grace" you beg "not like this "unfortunately for you its not your decision to make tim" grace says "I'm in charge here and I think its time we moved on with the rest of the show, Down the hatch" and with that her tongue begins to push you back towards her throat and certain doom
13521.title: Drops you into her maw

1352122.content:
You try to climb Graces' tongue but to no avail, you're still slipping and it looks like she'd finally eat you. "Mazee!" you yell. "Willa! I'd even settle for Blake!" But you doubt anyone can hear you screaming as the walls of the werecheetah's mouth would no doubt muffle the sound. You're certain this is it but then you hear a grunt and you're suddenly pushed to the front of Grace's mouth.

The next thing you knew the teeth opened up and you fell out into a giant furry hand. You didn't know who it was, but since the fur wasn't bright yellow, it obviously wasn't Grace. Speak of the devil, you look up and see that Grace was holding her stomach in pain. Somebody punched her. That's why she spat you out. You stand up and let out a sigh of relief as you shake off cheetah drool and hold onto one of the hairs.

Then suddenly you see that the fur in this hand was a familiar teal color and gulp before you look up at a familiar pair of mismatched eyes belonging to a certain werejackal. "Aurelia!" you yell. Aurelia looks down at you with a large toothy smile. You weren't rescued. The predator just changed. Grace recovers from that punch and gets up before growling at Aurelia. "What's the big deal Aurelia?" she asks. "I almost had him." Aurelia shook her head. "He was in my mouth first Grace, that makes him mine." This was true, the last time you worked with Aurelia, she had you half-way down her throat and almost swallowed you. If she hadn't sneezed, you'd be jackal chow.

Grace wasn't amused to have her prey stolen however and held out her hands to show Aurelia her claws. "Listen here you bastard child of Anubis, you had your chance with the morsel. He's mine." Aurelia pinches Grace on one of her hips and Grace grunts in pain. "I don't think so Spots," says Aurelia with a sneer. "Your ass is much too fat already." "Like you'd know," says Grace angrily. "You're married to that repugnant werehyena blob." "You leave Cree out of this!" Aurelia puts you down on the table and puts pencil cup over you so you won't escape.

"Let's settle this like cats and dogs." Says Grace. Grace hold out her claws and Aurelia lets out a growl before the two of them tackle each other and wrestle to the ground. You cover your eyes as yellow and teal strands of fur fly in the air and you hear the noises of frantic barking and meowing. You don't know who to root for though given that no matter who wins the fight, you'd get eaten. Then you wonder why nobody is stopping the fight. You'd think somebody would get bothered by the noises of a literal cat and dog fight going on. At one point you see Grace's glasses fly up and land in front of you as you scream. This wouldn't end well.

Soon the noises and the beatings stop and one of the giantesses rises triumphant. The question is, who won the fight?
1352122.title: One Predator or the Other

choices: You're keeping Beth company during her shift
You're Helping Fate with the Nightshift
14.content:
As you’re waiting for Lexi’s response, Lexi actually stops to think about the situation to herself. “This human has caused so much grief that sending him out in the field would be a disaster. Maybe for today, I should give him a job at the building, one that hopefully he won’t survive. Let’s see, there’s the delivery girl, Harley the wereboar. That supersized swine is the most reckless driver I’ve ever seen. Sometimes I wonder why her license hasn’t been suspended. If Tim accompanies her, the bumpy ride might toss him far away or even throw him into traffic to turn him into roadkill. But wait Lexi, there’s still Kiki, that lazy tanuki bum. As far as secretaries go, she leaves much to be desired. She’s lucky I’m not mean enough to fire her. But her apathy makes her dangerous to Tim. Last time I paired those two, the big tanuki had the runt plastered to her skirt all day. And then there’s the fact she doesn’t bother to pick off humans that get stuck to her food.” Lexi laughs to herself as you look in confusion, before she continues thinking to herself.

“Or maybe I’ll be nice and stick her with Fate. Maybe it wouldn’t kill me to give him a chance and it’s doubtful Fate would kill him. She’s a gargoyle for crying out loud and she’s too much of a stone face to care whether or not Tim’s bad luck. Wait, that’s a mistake. If the little jinx gets her seriously hurt, we’ll be defenseless when the night comes. Not to mention, Destiny will make a fur coat out of me. Maybe I should assign him to Beth the guard we mainly have in during the day. That behemoth is a lot harder on humans than Fate and she’ll have Tim under her toes, or her ass, in no time. But Beth has that crush on Tim. Maybe she’ll finally manage to seduce him. Oh yeah, then Mazee would murder him. I can just imagine her blowing her top and squishing him like a bug. But then there’s the perfect human killing worker I have. Aurelia. I had to hire the werejackal because the bonehead keeps destroying the building and the equipment. She’s the best carpenter and technician around, but she and that hyperactive werehyena wife of hers are total gluttons when it comes to humans. Aurelia almost had me rid of the little pest.
