Makes you wonder why she’d want to eat Tim if he’s the reason we need her so much. At this point, I don’t care as long as someone gets rid of that stupid human.”

“Uh Lexi!” you yell up to your gargantuan boss. “Hello.” Lexi looks down and smiles at you. “Good news. I know exactly what you’re going to do today little guy.”
14.title: Work Order

141.content:
"I think some fresh air will do you some good Tim." Says Lexi. You hold out your camera and polish the lens. "You're sending me out for fieldwork?" you ask. "Thanks Lexi." Lexi lets out a sarcastic laugh. "No," she says. "Today, you're helping Harley deliver newspapers." You gasp in fear. Harley the wereboar? That sow giantess was the worst driver you've ever seen.

"Harley?!" you yell with fear in your voice. "That pig! I'm not getting on a motorcycle with that daredevil! Last time, I had to hold onto the back of her underwear just to avoid getting tossed into the street. Who taught her how to drive anyway?" Lexi gives an annoyed look and lowers her head to you as she waves her tail in the air. "Would you rather help Aurelia out? I hear that one of her teeth has been sore lately and she needs someone to check it out?" You let out a gulp. You're rather risk Harley's reckless driving then walk in Aurelia's mouth.

"Harley in to see you Ms. Luxor." Says Kiki over the intercom. "Send her in. I have her partner right here." Harley enters the room and you look up to see nothing but tight black leather shorts and thunderous thighs of yellow-orange fur. Harley bends over on her knees and you look up at the wereboar giantess's face. The porcine giantess lets out a snort and blows you on your feet. "Buenos Dias Tim," she says in her Brazilian accent. "Ready to go mucho rapido." Before you can say another word Harley lifts you up and brings you in front of her face. Those large tusks of hers were intimidating, but Harley assured you she doesn't eat humans. "I'm ready whenever you are Harley." You say. Harley snorts and then walks away.

Harley was a mystery to you. After all, her job was basically being a paper girl even though she was a grown adult. You also had no idea why she was Brazilian. Could monsters even have nationalities. Harley takes you down to the parking and brings you to her motorcycle. It was bright green, heavily built with a sidecar and had a warthog's head decoration in the front. There were even gold flames painted on the sides. Harley places a stack of newspapers in the sidecar as she boards the vehicle and then places you on the back of her neck as you grab hold of the pig woman's back hair.

"Hang on tight," Harley says sweetly. "I'm breaking my record today." You let out a gulp as Harley revs the motorcycle up and starts to leave the driveway. She's already taken off at the monster equivalent of 20 MPH and you let out a scream and start to slip as you continue holding her hog hair. What direction is that crazy wereboar taking you on the delivery route?
141.title: Rev Up Your Harley

1412.content:
You suddenly felt your body jerk as Harley turned left. You had to really grasp on for dear life so you don't go flying and turn into a human pizza.

"Having fun back there?" Harley calls back to you.

"Not really, no!" You yell back.

"That's too bad. Maybe I need to go faster!" She replies as she speeds up. You are just barely holding on as it is, and this madwoman wants to go faster? There are days where you think she's actually trying to kill you.

As she continues to rocket through the town, you started to wonder where it is you're going. There were only three places on this route you could think of that got this paper today. One was the Monster Arms apartment building. Another was a market that you went every Tuesday. And the last place was a local arcade. You were trying to remember where Harley goes to first on this route.

Eventually, Harley comes to a screeching halt, causing you to slam into the back of her neck.

"We've made it to out first destination." She says to you.

Dizzy, you look to see where you stopped. It was...
1412.title: TOO FAST! TOO FAST! TOO FAST!

Then you see a gorgon woman with seasnakes for hair and from the looks of it, her ass was three times as wide as the bench she was sitting on. There was also a nearby park and you see a morbidly obese albino manticore who was allowing her son to bounce on her 1500ft wide stomach. You’d say that at this point, every single woman in Fearfield has been infected with nebutori. And it was all your fault.

Mazee and Willa enter the subway and you see dozens of SSBBW monster women walking around. You had never seen so many big asses in all your life. The only male was a male weretiger at the ticket booth. He looked tired. You guess that ever since the outbreak, women have been taking the train so as to not tire themselves out. Mazee walks up to the ticket booth and you watch as part of her obese stomach hangs over the turnstile. “Three tickets for Horrorville please.” The tiger man lets out a growl and nods his head. “I hate nebutori season.” “Why?” asks Willa. “Don’t be a seppo. Men can’t get nebutori.” The tiger grunts as he gives Mazee the tickets. “Yeah, but my wife can. The last time she caught nebutori, I had to carry her up 100 stairs. She gets real mean and bossy when she gets too fat.” You begin to thank your lucky stars that there was no way Mazee could expect you to carry her even if she wasn’t infected.

Mazee and Willi then walk to wait for the next train to Horrorville. Both giantesses had to stand. You see that there were exactly four monster giantesses that were waiting for the train as well and you take in your surroundings. There was a blue and black striped nue woman dressed like a businesswoman. She had the limbs of a tiger and a snake for a tail but unlike other nues, she had the head and torso of a lemur instead of a baboon. The nue woman was primarily bottom heavy and her cyan colored behind was visible underneath the skirt of her business suit that looked like it was coming apart. The buttons looked just about ready to pop. She was impatiently looking at her watch as she held a briefcase.

There was also a very morbidly obese gargoyle woman with bright red-violet skin and spikey black hair. She had two large horns on her forehead that looked like those of a dinosaur and a beak for a mouth. She had to have a 2000ft wide belly and from the looks of it, she was wearing a black cocktail dress that looked painted on and was carrying what you hoped was a violin case. It probably was given her attire, but you did associate violin cases with guns. But then again, most gargoyles are law-abiding citizens if not law enforcers, so you were probably just paranoid.

Between the nue and the gargoyle was a morbidly obese and huge harpy woman who resembled an anthropomorphic swan with a human’s face and long blonde hair. She had huge E-cup breasts and an ass that was so big that it was touching the ground even when she was standing up. The swan harpy from the looks of her attire was a policewoman but what horrified you was that the swan harpy was eating a kebob that had what looked like roasted humans on it. You really hope she doesn’t see you.

Finally among the giant women was a titanic goth girl. This goth girl was a huge capricorn girl who had the upper body of a bright furred goat with red highlights in her silver hair and a red eyepatch and the scales of a butterfly on her legs and hooves. She was so morbidly obese that her udder looked bigger than her head and she need crutches in order to walk. She was too busy reading a book to notice anyone else. You felt that maybe it would be best as to not give these four strangers anything to do with you.

 However the train comes and Willa gives a scoff. “About time.” She said. Unfortunately after everyone else has squeezed their obese frames into the train, Mazee and Willa try to squeeze it at once. “Willa!” yelled Mazee. “I was going to go first!” Willa and Mazee grunted and in the process you were squeezed between both your girlfriend and your landlady’s massive bellies. You try to scream but their fat buffets you in the face and you’re squeezed out. You land on one of the seats just as a monster giantess’s morbidly titanic fat ass is about to sit on you. One of those four new monsters was going to trap you under her butt for the rest of the trip unless Mazee or Willa stopped her, but which of the four was about to sit on you?

You were either going to be flattened into the rear of a gargoyle violinist, a nue businesswoman, a capricorn goth or a swan harpy policewoman.
141212121211.title: By Subway Train

142.content:
"You're going to be helping Kiki today." Lexi says with a smirk. "As you know, she sometimes has a bit of trouble with her work, so I'm sending you to pick up some of the slack." This doesn't sit too well with you. Kiki was not one of the most attentive monsters in the building. In the time you've been here you've ended up in her food, under her butt, between her toes, and a number of other places. Frankly, you don't even know how she still has a job. Its like she doesn't notice anything around her.

"But the only reason she has trouble with her work is because she's so lazy!" you shout up to Lexi. "Are you refusing to do your job?" she asks with a hint of frustration."If not, then get going!" Not wanting to anger her, you quickly turn and make your way out of the office. On the way you trip, and the second you hit the floor a picture falls off the wall. You turn and look at Lexi but before you can open your mouth she opens hers. "OUT!!"

You make your way to Kiki's desk and stand next to her massive grey foot. "Kiki!" you shout up to her. She doesn't respond at all . She's either not paying attention or just ignoring you, not that you expected any different. You sigh and begin the task of climbing up. You grab onto the fur of her foot and start your journey. Unfortunately this must have caused an itch because Kiki begins to scratch hers toes together. The huge furred toes toss you about until you're stuck between them.You struggle to get free but do you?
142.title: You're assisting Kiki

1421.content:
After quite a bit of effort you manage to break free of Kiki's toes. You would relax but you still have to make it up to the desk. You resume climbing and as you reach her thigh you feel your mountain of a coworker move. She's reaching under her desk to scratch an itch. The itch being you! You dive out of the way, narrowly avoiding her hand. You need to be careful or she might crush you or knock you back down to the floor.

After resting on her lap you begin the next stage of the climb. Her torso. You crane your head and see her gigantic belly. Beyond that are her two massive breasts. Geez, it was like climbing a mountain made of other mountains. You begin scaling her dress, not running into any problems. After reaching the point below her breasts you perch yourself on a button and catch your breath. Once you're ready you begin the last stretch.

When you're about halfway up her breast you look outward and see that Kiki is slacking off. This doesn't surprise you at all. She's got one arm on the desk and is propping her head up with the other. It seems she's just staring off into space. Coming back to the task at hand, you keep climbing until you finally reach the top of her breasts. Your plan was to make your way to her shoulder, but Kiki suddenly repositions her arm causing you to tumble...
1421.title: Yes

14212.content:
As Kiki moves you find yourself tumbling down onto her desk. You're a little annoyed, but at least you ended up where you wanted. You sit there for a minute and get your head straight. After that you stand and look up at Kiki. She's just staring off with a bored look on her face. "Kiki!" you call up. Of course she'd ignore you though.

You sigh and walk over to a gigantic glass of water. Thinking about what you're going to do, you lean against it. Of course with your bad luck the glass topples over. This doesn't even get a response from the giant tanuki above you though. Kiki is never really bothered by your bad luck because she just ignores it.

You decide to walk back over to Kiki and try to get her attention again. However when you get there something splashes onto your head. It runs onto your face and you wipe it off to find that its kind of thick. You look up to see drool leaking from the side of Kiki's mouth. She's sleeping now!? This just gets better and better. As you become more frustrated you feel another shift in the environment. Kiki's folding her arms on the desk and laying her head down on them. Unfortunately, you get caught up in the movement and are now trapped between her cheek and her arm. You try to get free but can't. All you can do now is wait for someone to come along and help or for Kiki to wake up. What happens?
14212.title: Lazy Days

choices: Kiki remembers that its almost time for her break.
142121.content:
You're trapped against Kiki's cheek as she continues to sleep. Its just one thing after another. First you get a glob a monster drool on your face, and now you're unable to move. You wait for something to happen and your patience is rewarded. You hear someone coming and sigh in relief. "Kiki! Wake up!" a voice says sharply. You recognize it as Lexi.

Kiki slowly lifts her head and yawns. "Sorry boss." You find that you're stuck to her cheek by the saliva. You look at Lexi who gives a sigh. "Just get back to work." she says. Seems like she's used to this by now. You worry that she won't notice you, but then her eyes lock onto you. An amused look appears on her face. "Kiki, you've got a little something on your face." she says and leaves after giving a small chuckle.

Kiki feels her cheek and peels you off. She looks down at you as you lay in her palm. "Oh. Hey Tim." she sounds really bored. "Hi Kiki." you say in a tired tone. "Lexi sent me to help." The giant tanuki gives another yawn. "Really? Well thats good I guess." You stare at her for a while before you finally ask. "So...what should I do?" Kiki thinks for a second. "Well...I've been feeling kind of stressed, so you can rub my feet while I finish my work." she answers.

You don't believe this. Well, actually you kind of do. "How will that help?" you say. "And how are you stressed? If I rub your feet you'll probably just fall asleep again!" Kiki leans in close and gives you a stare. Its not very threatening what with the apathetic look on her face. "Lexi told you to help me, so I'm technically in charge, and I'm telling you to rub my feet." This sucks! You just escaped from those feet not too long ago, but if you refuse to do it then Lexi might fire you! What do you do?
142121.title: Wake Up Call

1421212.content:
Before you can make a decision on what to do, Kiki looks at her watch."Oh its time for my break." A break? All she did was sleep! This has got to be the most frustrating day you've had in a while. Kiki reaches over and grabs a bag that contains her lunch. When she sits it on the desk she almost squishes you. Unsurprisingly she forgot about you when she went on break. She reaches into the bag and pulls out a container. She opens the lid and grabs a fork. As she picks up the fork however it catches your shirt and lifts you to her food. You struggle and get yourself loose, but in turn you fall into her lunch.

When you plop down into the container you find that its pasta. You lick a little bit off of yourself and think that it tastes pretty good. However this is no time to have a snack as Kiki's fork is looming above you. It descends into the pasta and grabs a bunch. When it leaves the container you can hear Kiki eating. While she's never really been a scary monster, these situations make you nervous. Yes, you've been in this exact situation before. This tanuki has almost eaten you a number of times now.

Suddenly the fork returns and you try to avoid it. You fail and it manages to once again catch your shirt. As you're lifted into the air you start to shout. "Kiki! Stop! You're going to eat me!" You get no response. Is she really this inattentive or is she just rude?! The fork reaches her mouth and it opens to reveal a huge cavern. Does she go through with it?
1421212.title: Because She Really Needs One

choices: You work on trying to squeez between her teeth and lips
She swallows you in her sleep
14212121.content:
Kiki shovels you along with the pasta into her mouth, she then slides the fork out of her mouth but keeps her lips sealed around its prongs. Unfortunately for you, this seals you inside of her mouth. Your legs and upper back brush up against her teeth which is enough to free you from the fork. You are gently deposited onto the front of her tongue with a resounding 'squish'. You don't get a lot of time to breathe as Kiki starts to move her food around with her tongue, she moves the pasta toward her molars before chewing once or twice and swallowing. You watch the scene from the front of her mouth almost at the tip of her tongue.

You can't help but notice how minimal her actions are. Yes, this is dimpling eating food so not much effort goes into it, but Kiki Ida barely even bothering to chew, and when her tongue barely even moves from its normal position, there's even some strands of pasta that go untouched as they are swallowed.

"I guess she just as lazy about eating as she is about working" you note. Suddenly a ray of light shines in as Kiki opens her mouth to dump another mouthful of pasta off of her fork. At first you start to head towards the opening, but then you get tangled in the pasta that's hanging haphazardly from the fork, you are carried back into the mouth and get yourself loose but end up back where you started. You quickly rise to try and catch a ride on the retreating fork but it's already passing between her lips. "I'd better just find a safe spot for now..." You think. You slide under the tanuki's tongue with a little effort and remain there through the course of her lunch.

Eventually, the fork stops coming and you figure it's safe to try and get out now. As you climb back onto the tongue, a large thud knocks off your feet and onto your back. "What the heck was that?!" You wonder. A dull yet thin forums noise comes as your response. "Snoring? She's sleeping again?!" You ask in disbelief. "Looks like I'll have to get out on my own..."
14212121.title: Yes

choices: Mazee! Buckle up, it may be a while until she comes to your rescue!
Kiki! Because you make terrible decisions!
142121212.content:
Kiki's snores nearly deafen you as you make the trek across her long tongue. The smell of pasta hung strongly in the air. You made a silent prayer of thanks to whatever benevolent diety saved you from joining Kiki's snack down her gullet. Though that gratitude turned to a curse as you neared the front of Kiki's mouth and saw that her lips were sealed up tight.

'Figures,' you thought. 'I'm the size of a microbe compared to her. How am I gonna manage to climb up there and pry her lips apart?'

With a grunt, you stepped off her tongue, prepared to scale the inside of the tanuki's lips. However, once you did so, Kiki gave a dissatisfied moan in her sleep.

'What was that about?' you thought. 'Bad dreams?'

Kiki let out another sad moan and behind you, her tongue rose like a mighty leviathan.

"What the hell?!"

Kiki's tongue struck like a viper and slammed into you. As soon as it made contact with you, Kiki gave a satisfied moan of delight.

'Oh no, she wasn't moaning because of bad dreams. She was moaning because she missed your taste!'

On the outside Kiki smiled in her sleep, as she sucked on your body, savoring your flavor. To anyone in the world it would appear that Kiki was dreaming about eating a hard candy. For you, the reality was much more terrifying and painful. You were worked all along the inside of her mouth, squeezed by her tongue, the suction of her cheeks occasionally crushing you. All the while you screamed and struggled.

It took several minutes before the sleeping tanuki was satisfied. She had gotten more than taste from her naptime snack. It was time to send it where it belonged. Her belly.

Her tongue began to raise, reaching to her roof and curling backwards to her throat. You tried to scramble for a hold on one of her tastebuds but were unable to get a firm grip, your hands slipping on saliva.

"Curse you benevolent diety!" you cried as you slid downward, as though on a massive waterslide. Only this slide led to certain doom.

"Nonononononononooooooooooo!"

All of a sudden, you ran out of tongue and plummeted down the seemingly never-ending shaft of her throat. You fell for what felt like hours before you land with a splash in the corrosive acid of her stomach. You choked and flailed with the acid, until you found a nearby piece of pasta, that you climbed upon like a raft.

On the outside, Kiki gave a contented sigh in her sleep. A second later, Kiki's stomach groaned and she let loose a massive fart. It seemed like the room shook, and the expulsion of her own gas, caused her to waken with a start. She sniffed the air, and blushed, looking over her shoulders to make sure no one had heard. She quickly--for her anyway--resumed her work, trying to take her mind off her own embarrassment.

Inside her stomach, you grimaced. After all the close calls, all the screw-ups and near misses, your luck had finally run out. Kiki had eaten you and hadn't even realized it. Now you'll be digested and your biggest contribution to this paper will be giving your colleague gas.

"No damn it!" you said. "That's quitter talk! I'm not gonna die in here! KIKI!" you cried. "KIKI! LET ME OUT! YOU ATE ME!"

Your only response was the ominous squelches and growls of Kiki's stomach.

"Wait. What am I thinking? I have a perfectly good phone! I'll just make a call and rescue will come in no time!"

You reached into your pocket and your heart sank as you gazed into your phone's screen. The battery was so low it might as well count as the undead. You guessed you only had enough power left for one call. What would be your best hope of rescue?

Mazee was your girlfriend, if she knew what happened, you were positive she would drop everything and come running to save you. But she was out in the field today. If you called her, she might arrive too late. Then there was Kiki. She was the one who ate you after all, and if you called her you might be able to talk her into getting you out... Or she would just be a lazy bum like she's been every minute of every day for her entire life and leave you to digest.

Who do you call?
142121212.title: She swallows you in her sleep

1421212122.content:
As Kiki continued her work--given a very loose definition of the word work--her stomach continued to grumble.

"Ugh, pasta usually doesn't given me so much gas," she said in her usual monotone. "And where's that human? He was supposed to be giving me a foot massage."

Suddenly, Kiki's cellphone started to ring. With a look of annoyance, as if even this task was too monumental for her to handle, Kiki grabbed her phone and answered.

"Hello," she said disinterestedly.

"KIKI!" your voice cried out from the phone amidst a burst of static. "KIKI IT'S TIM!"

"Well... well... well," Kiki said slowly. "Look who it is. I believe someone is supposed to be here, giving me a foot rub, instead of dodging work... Wait until I tell Lexi you were slacking off."

The complete hypocrisy of this statement would normally be enough to cause you to slap your forehead in frustration, but seeing as your life hung in this slothful tanuki's hands, you decided to bottle up the flood of sarcastic comments that popped into your head.

"Kiki, you have to help me! You ate me with your pasta! I need you to throw me up!"

There was a pause as Kiki needed this information to sink in. It took a couple of a seconds.

"Ohhhh," she said at last. "You're what's upsetting my stomach. Humans usually have that effect on me. Heh, oh well, it usually passes in a couple hours."

"HOURS?!" you screamed. "Kiki, are you insane?! You have to throw me up, I'm going to die in here!"

"Hmm?" she said, her mind starting to wander already. "Oh. Yeah, Tim I'm actually really swamped here," she said as she scratched her massive backside. "Going all the way to the bathroom, throwing up... I just don't have the time right now. Maybe tomorrow."

"Kiki," you said, your heart filling with dread. "You can't be serious. Please. I'm begging you. Let me out of here!"

Kiki was already staring at her computer, a glazed expression on her face. You heard her let out a giant yawn into the phone.

"Sorry, Tim, wish I could help. Anyway, I gotta go. Bye Tim... Working with you was... whatever..."

"KIKI! KIKI NO--"

Kiki turned off her phone with nonchalance and put it back in her purse then leaned back into her chair and closed her eyes. She let loose another fart and grimaced.

"Meh... It'll be over soon enough," she said. Then she started to snore.

Meanwhile, in her stomach...
1421212122.title: Kiki! Because you make terrible decisions!

choices: Try to climb up Kiki's throat
Just stay here, where it's comfortable.
14212121221.content:
Inside the stomach of the tanuki giantess, you try to call your host again, but unfortunately, your phone's screen goes black and the device dies. Well, there goes all your contact with Kiki. Nothing to do now but wait for the inevitable. You dive into the boiling lake of acid, resolving to end things quickly and mercifully. Expecting a sheer, intolerable amount of pain, you...

...feel absolutely nothing painful. No sting, no burns...nothing.

Guess you're impervious to Kiki's stomach acids!

You swim up to the surface of the bubbly pool and lean back on one of the walls, now aware that your prison can't dissolve your feeble body. This...might not be so bad after all!

But...you DO want to eventually escape from this chamber...right?
14212121221.title: Alive...but still trapped.

choices: Kiki feels you, and spits you out
142121212211.content:
Sure, Kiki's stomach is nice and warm, and the acids can't even digest your body...but you still don't want to spend the rest of your life in here. You try to get a grip on the stomach walls (which takes a few attempts), and in about a couple minutes, you're climbing up its fleshy surface to the sphincter that forced you into this chamber in the first place.

Mustering all your strength, you manage to squeeze your way through the tight opening and worm your way into the tanuki giantess's esophagus. While it is a little cramped in this thin tube, you persevere regardless. You climb for minutes that feel like hours, which in turn feel like DAYS, when...
142121212211.title: Up the way you came...

1421212122112.content:
Your climbing seems to have paid off -- you make it from the tight tube of Kiki's throat up into her cavernous mouth! However, the lips are shut as your coworker counts Z's.

During her sleep, the tanuki groggily wakes up, feeling something unusual on her tongue -- and it's not the tasty kind of unusual. Now recalling that tiny human she accidentally ate, she hawks and spits you out onto her hand.

"Th-thanks..." you say.

"You're welcome, I guess..." Kiki responds. "Just...try not to hop into my food again, 'k?"

Next...
1421212122112.title: Awkward Exit

choices: Try to climb up the throat
142121212212.content:
Deciding on a quick escape from Kiki's stomach, you dive into the green, bubbly lake in search of a way into the intestines. Soon enough, you find just the sphincter you're looking for!

Unfortunately, your tiny muscles are far too weak to budge the tightly-closed gateway to freedom.

Great. Just great. Now what?
142121212212.title: Or not. That works, too.

14212121222.content:
Frantically, you tried making another call on your phone, but it was no use. On the first ring, the screen went black and wouldn't come back on. 'Oh, why didn't I call Mazee instead of that lazy tub of lard?!'

Without warning, your foot was submerged in Kiki's stomach acid. It was only in for a second, but the tingling heat was enough to cause you to yelp and pull you're foot out. Unbeknownst to you, while you were pleading with Kiki, the piece of pasta that you were on had slowly started sinking beneath her gastric juices. You climbed further up the end of the pasta that wasn't submerged, and tried to peer out into the darkness of her stomach for something else you could use to keep yourself afloat. But there was nothing else, all the rest of her meal had already sunk beneath the waves of her stomach acid.

"Oh no," you pleaded. "KIKI! LET ME OUT! KIKI!"

The pasta sunk faster. You had climb to the top of the food but were nearly submerged yourself.

"KIKI! MAZEE! ANYONE! HELP!"

With a final cry you slipped into the sea of acid yourself. You struggled to tread her gastric juices. You swam for minutes, but all the while the acid around you burned more and more as your strength failed. At last, the fight went out of you, and you disappeared into the murky depths of Kiki's stomach, along with the rest of her food.

An hour later, outside of her stomach, Lexi went outside to check and see how her "favorite" employee was doing. She was met with the familiar sight of Kiki snoring at her desk. "Figures," she muttered. "Kiki. Kiki!"

Kiki woke with a start. "Oh... Boss... I was just working on... that thing," she said, wiping an errant strand of drool off her cheek.

"I can see that," Lexi said, with a roll of her eyes. Lexi took a breath threw her nose and her face nearly turned green. "Ah, dang it, Kiki, did you have to do that here?"

"Sorry," Kiki said. "Something I ate... Didn't agree with me. But I'm feeling better now."

Lexi eyed the half eaten pasta container on her desk.

"Well, good to hear," Lexi said. "So, where's Tim? Has he been doing everything you've asked like I told him?"

"Who?" Kiki asked, genuinely not remembering the coworker she had doomed.

"Tim," Lexi said patiently. "A human. A bad luck magnet. About this tall," she said, holding two of her claws an inch--to her--apart.

Kiki furrowed her brow in thought. "Oh," she said at last. "Him... Um... he..."

Lexi stared at Kiki in open awe. She had never seen the tanuki apply herself so hard to think before. Once again, Lexi's eyes darted to the food container on Kiki's desk. She remembered the smell in the air and put two-and-two together. A smile broke across her face.

"Kiki, did Tim... "join you" for lunch?"

"... Kinda," Kiki said slowly.

Lexi was barely able to keep the joy off her face. She failed, then broke and laughed. At last--at last! The jinx was finally gone! Finally the paper wouldn't have to waste so much money on repairing all of his accidents! Her dreams had finally come true!

"Kiki," Lexi said, "we've just come into an increase of funds. Let's talk about getting you a raise!"

"Huh? Oh... Sure," Kiki said, stifling a yawn.

'With all the work I do around here, it's about time,' Kiki thought to herself, already beginning to forget about her mid-day snack.
14212121222.title: Digestion starts.

14212122.content:
Before Kiki can devour you someone comes from behind and wraps their arms around her. This startles her and causes her to jerk her hand back. You're thrown off the fork and land on the table. "Hey Sis!" Sis? You look up at this newcomer and see that its another tanuki girl like Kiki. She's certainly not as heavy as Kiki, but is still a little thick. Her fur is the same color as Kiki's but her face markings look different. Judging from her greeting she's apparently Kiki's sister.

"How's it going? Still working hard?" asks the new tanuki. She says the latter half of that statement sarcastically. Kiki looks at her sister and sighs. "What are you doing here Rockie? I'm sort of busy." This girl, Rockie apparently, laughs. "Do you know how weird it is to hear YOU of all people say that?" Kiki rolls her eyes and resumes eating. Rockie begins to open her mouth again but switches focus when she spots you. In a flash she's got her gigantic face in front of you, causing you to stumble back a little.

"Oh a human! What are you doing here little guy?" she asks enthusiastically. You compose yourself and answer. "I work here, my names Tim." you say as you stare at the huge tanuki. She cocks her head to the side. "Work here? You? Aren't you a little small?" You chuckle and rub the back of your head. "Well its kind of complicated." She laughs and stands up to her full height. "Well its nice to meet you Tim! My name's Rockie, and I'm Kiki's little sister! I just decided to stop by and say hi to my big sis!"

She leans on her sister's shoulder and continues. "So what are you doing here with my sister?" Then her eyes widen a little. "Oh! Are you two an item?" Your own eyes widen at this. How did she come to that conclusion? "He's a little small, but I guess he's cute. Nice going Sis!" Rockie says as she nudges Kiki. "No, I'm just helping Kiki with her work! I already have a girlfriend!" you say while waving your arms. The last thing you needed was anyone getting the wrong idea. If it ever got back to Mazee, you'd be in trouble.

Kiki sighs and turns to you. "You want to know how you can help me? Keep my sister company." Wait, what? "You heard the lady!" Rockie says and snatches you up as she leaves. You catch a last glimpse of Kiki eating as Rockie exits the room. You look up at her and try to see what she wants. "Um, Rockie? What exactly are you doing here?" She looks down at you as she walks. "I was just bored and had nothing to do, so I wanted to visit my sister. I see she's still hard at work." Again with the sarcasm. Guess Kiki's always been like that. "Now how can we have a little fun?" With that Rockie.....
14212122.title: A Rockie Start

142121221.content:
Rockie begins wandering around the building with you in tow. You sigh and look up at her. "So Rockie, where exactly are we going?" She grins down at you. "Nowhere in particular, just looking for something to do. I find that opportunities tend to present themselves." You wonder what she means by that. Rockie happens to pass by a dragon girl and smiles. She watches as this girl heads to her desk and sits down. She heads to a corner where no one will notice her, and without warning you are both consumed by smoke.

When the smoke clears you're not being held by Rockie, but by a vampire girl. She looks down at you and smiles while putting her finger to her lips. She stuffs you in her cleavage and walks over to the dragoness. Then, in an act of what you'd call lunacy, she grabs a cup of water from the desk and throws it right in the dragon girl's face. You can see the anger in her eyes as the vampire turns and runs. She stays ahead enough of the dragon to duck away somewhere. There is another flash and some smoke, which reveals Rockie once again. She then peeks out from her hiding spot in time to see the dragoness blow a puff of fire at the real vampire girl who Rockie was impersonating. Her clothes catch fire and she runs around like crazy while Rockie laughs.

"Uh, what was that about?" you ask. Rockie looks down with a grin. "It was about fun, thats what!" You have a feeling this girl could be a handful. She leaves her hiding place and resumes her stroll. Then she sees someone, but who?

Fate doesn't answer and you let out a groan. "It's gonna be another one of those nights." As you walk forward, Fate lowers her tail for you to climb up. She did this so she could tend to you without losing focus. "Someone seriously needs to get laid." You think to yourself as you get on Fate's tail and she puts you on the table.

Fate has that same stoic look on her face as she looks at the screens. Nothing escaped her eagle eyes. "So, Fate," you say trying to start a conversation. "Anything good on monster television? All the human networks suck." But Fate doesn't answer or even look at you and you turn to the screens. You're about to walk forward but Fate simply uses a claw to scratch a line in the table in front of you. The last time you worked with her, you broke three monitors and she didn't seem to forget it.

You wish Fate was more social. She wasn't malicious, but she wasn't much fun to be around. That gargoyle was married to her job, just like her mom. You decide to kick back and relax, it was going to be a long night.
145.title: Nightshift

choices: She gets angry that you asked
1451.content:
After about two hours of staring at the monitor screens, you're getting rather bored, and decide you might as well talk to Fate, even if she won't talk back. Maybe you'll get lucky and get a reaction from her.

"So, Fate, how's your mom doing?"

Fate grunted in response. Okay, that's more than you usually get from her. "Is she still having a hard time with that one prisoner? What's his name? Wilfred? Wilson? I know it's something that starts with a W."

"Wade." Fate muttered. "Oh right, Wade! Still trying to escape, is he?" Fate just sat there, still as stone. Fitting, since was a gargoyle and all. You've always wondered whether gargoyles really turned to stone or not. You decide you may as well ask Fate.

"Hey Fate, I was just wondering, do gargoyles really turn to stone in the sunlight, and that's why you work the nightshift?"

What is Fate's response?
1451.title: You Ask Fate How Destiny is Doing

choices: What was your life in the human world?
How did you managed to get the job here?
14511.content:
"No... but I understand if you asked. Normally that would happened in the human world, but since we are in the monster world, that's a different case. Sorry if I wasn't speaking up, it's just... some furstrations in life makes you want to be alone. I understood if you asked." Fate said to you, getting a little bit friendly to you. "I understand." you replied. "Say... how did Wade got into prison?"

"He set Cleotiti on fire in the human world just as she was doing a monster flick for you guys, and he got thrown in jail, been trying to break out ever since. Trust me... no human wants to end up in that prison, that's for sure." Fate advised her just as she poked at you, having a bit of fun on you, you managed to open her up a bit. "My mom is doing alright. She's the best of the best."

"Okay... remind me not to ask that again." you smiled. "Agreed! Say... I want to ask you something?" Fate asked, and you replied. "Sure."
14511.title: Not really

choices: you break down crying because of a traumatic flashback
you tell her to get it off your chest
145111.content: you look down and tears start forming"it was shit," she looked surprised" really? how was it shit?" "well...."
145111.title: What was your life in the human world?

choices: A Monster Spy from a Rival Paper
Wade... Looks like he Finally Got Out
145112.content:
"How did you get a job here Tim? You're not exactly well... competent." You let out a nervous laugh. "Well, you say. "I came for a job because they threw me out of my human town and found myself in Fearfield. They probably deported me here so a monster would eat me. I saw a help wanted sign on the tower's door and Kiki let me in to see Lexi. I must admit, I didn't expect the monsters to be so big. Lexi was going to eat me if I couldn't answer her riddle and at that moment I clock rang and she asked what time it was and..." "Oh, I get it. Just plain old dumb luck. I'll bet Lexi's face was red that day. I thought sphinxes were supposed to be smart." As Fate laughs to herself, you decide to ask the gargoyle giantess a question.

"So how did you manage to get a job here. Wouldn't you rather work as a guard at Under Gloom?" Fate lets out a scoff. "Not until Mom retires, I don't want any special treatment or ridicule just because I'm the warden's daughter. I came to the Daily Tombstone to prepare for when I finally get around to that prison. I didn't have to twist Ms. Luxor's arm to get her to hire me. Most gargoyles wind up with security related jobs, we're nocturnal and most of us are larger than most monsters. In other words, we're perfect guards."

"Yeah, much better than Beth." "Oh, don't get me started on her. If she wasn't on duty during the day when nobody breaks in, that behemoth would've been fired long ago. She thinks with her pants before she thinks with her eyes. But she's not all bad." You then decide to ask a more serious question. "About Beth killing the last human she was attracted to, is that true?" Fate just looks down on you with a sneer, as if she wants you to keep guessing. Well, at least now you know she has a sense of humor.

Suddenly Fate's eyes turn to the highest monitor. "Looks like we have company." You look up and see that this is indeed true. There was somebody trying to get into the tower after hours.

But who is breaking in?
145112.title: Intruder Alert

1451122.content:
Surprisingly the figure on the monitor looks rather small, you'd say the size of a human. Fate rubs her chubby chin slightly before she zooms in on the camera and then you see that it was indeed a human and this human was a scraggly looking guy around your age and was wearing an orange jumpsuit. "Oh, you have got to be kidding me," says Fate. "How'd he get out?" You look in confusion before Fate holds out her clawed hand for you to climb in.

The gargoyle girl gets up before placing you on her shoulder. "Is that the Wade character you told me about?" Fate nods her head. "Looks like he finally managed to escape. Mom's not gonna like this. But if he thinks he's getting off scott free, he's got another thing coming." You let out a laugh. It was kind of ironic that Wade managed to get away from Warden Destiny only to run into her daughter.

At that time downstairs Wade was in the lobby feeling sure of himself. "I told that overgrown Smurf I was gonna escape. I'll just stay here until the heat's off and I can saw good riddance to Fearfield." As Wade was laughing to himself, he heard tremors. Before he could react, Fate snatches him up by the leg yelling. "What the?! Hey what's...?!" Fate takes Wade up to her face and glares at him as Wade looks in shock. Obviously he sees Fate's resemblance to Destiny.

It isn't long before Fate takes Wade back to the guardroom and puts him in a jar. "Let me out of here you dumb fatso gargoyle! I know my rights!" Fate rolls her eyes. "You're just as annoying as Mom said you were." "Mom?" asks Wade. "You mean you're Warden Destiny's spawn? I should've known!" Wade bangs on the jar yelling at Fate as you walk up to the outside of the jar. Wade turns to you and glares. "What are you looking at traitor." "What did I do?" you ask. "You're on their side!" yells Wade back. "These beasts are nothing but trouble. Gargoyles are especially awful."

Fate shook her head and turned to you. "Well Tim, Wade is officially the first prisoner to slip past my mom's nose, but too bad he won't be able to enjoy it. Could you please guard the prisoner. I'm going to call Under Gloom to tell them about their missing prisoner." Fate gets up to walk to the phone while Wade is still fuming mad in the jar and has to yell out an insult to Fate. "Go on a diet while you're at it Angela!" Fate immediately stops what she's doing to shake the jar and Wade before resuming walking to the phone.

Wade grumbles to himself in the jar as you walk up towards it. "You really think it's a good idea to pick a fight with a thousand foot tall gargoyle? Monsters aren't all bad." "Shut up jerkface!" yells Wade. "That mummy started it when she crushed my car and they call me a bad guy for setting that careless used bandage on fire? What’s worse is I get stuck in a jail with the most tyrannical prison warden in the world. Now her brat has me in a jar. I mean, how humiliating is that? It’s bad enough I have to share a cell with a stinky Loch Ness Monster.”

And you thought that Tara had a bad attitude. Mazee told you that Warden Destiny was always in a nasty mood and now you know why. This guy really hated monsters. “Come on,” you say. “Monsters aren’t all that bad. I actually have a monster girlfriend.” Wade’s eyes actually pop. “Are you brain dead!?” he yells. “Listen, monster and human romances are a load of crap. I should know. I have a stupid cheshire cat stalking me back at Under Gloom. If I couldn’t use her to break out, I wouldn’t give that flea motel the time of day. Who’s your girlfriend? That bloated lawn ornament? No, nobody would be stupid enough to touch the daughter of that filthy blue who...”

Before Wade could finish his sentence, Fate walks back and then shakes the jar in her hand. As Wade is dizzy, Fate puts down the jar and then looks down on you. “I told Mom everything,” she says. “But neither of us can leave our post. She’s going to come in next morning to pick up the prisoner.” You’re suddenly very afraid. “Warden Destiny?” you ask. “Here?” Fate lets out a sigh. “Don’t worry, Mom’s not some hard hearted fiend. She just has a very stressful job. In fact, she’s very fond of humans. But there is one word you must never say in front of her.”

“What’s that?” you ask. Fate looks around before telling you the word. “Demona.” “What does your Mom have against a gargoyle from a TV show?” “Let’s just say Mom wasn’t amused with her character design.” You decide to take Fate’s word for it, but the idea of you being face to face with a prison warden. You have no criminal record yourself, but this woman sounded like she ran a tight ship. Wade gives a sour look and taps on the jar but Fate holds onto it tight. It was going to be one long night.
1451122.title: Wade's Not so Great Escape

choices: Wade Insults Fate to a Breaking Point
14511222.content:
As you and Fate keep looking at the screens and guarding Wade, the prisoner appears to be getting restless. You turn to him and he sticks his tongue out at you before turning to Fate. "You're just as bad as that asshole mother of yours." Wade says. Fate doesn't turn away from the video screens but it's obvious that Wade's words got to her.

"Dude," you say. "Do you really think you should be trying to piss off a 1000ft tall gargoyle?" "Shut up monster lover!" yells Wade before her turns to Fate. "You listening to me Angela?" "My name isn't Angela," says Fate in annoyance. "It's Fate." "Well I think it would be more accurate if you removed the last letter you bloated eggplant." "I know I'm not the thinnest gargoyle," says Fate. "Quite frankly I don't mind." "Oh yeah?" asks Wade. "I'll bet the reason your gut is so big is so people don't notice your ugly hairstyle. Is it blonde or brunette? It looks like barf in my opinion. I'll bet you've got some killer warts that cap fatty!"

Fate was clutching her hands as she drove her claws into the control panel. "Fate?" you ask in concern. "Are you okay?" Fate lets out a sigh. "Sorry. Mom warned me that Wade was the most obnoxious and irritating prisoner she's ever had to deal with." "Your mother is evil incarnate," says Wade to Fate. "That woman is no prison warden, she's a straight up Demona using her position to torture humans like me." Fate grits her teeth slightly and you wisely step back. It wasn't a good idea to be too close to an angry gargoyle.

"If Mom was torturing you," says Fate. "You definitely had it coming. She actually likes humans. You're just" "Yeah right. I'll bet she's not even a real redhead!" yells Wade. "You and your stupid monster kind attacked first when that mummy friend of yours wrecked my car. A guy's gotta have a patriotic duty to exterminate a lower life form like you. You monsters are nothing but trouble. You overgrown fruit bats are the worst of the bunch. You probably hypnotized that Weisman guy to make you look good so you can plan an invasion. As for your stick in the mud Mom, I don't care what she says, she's a real life Demona, a menace to society."

Fate gets so steamed her eyes start to glow bright red. You didn't know gargoyles actually did that. "Watch it Wade," says Fate. "I could swallow you whole if I wanted to. Augh! No wonder Mom is always angry." Wade gestures with his hand as if to say "Blah, blah, blah." Fate looks at the screens to try and take her mind off of Wade. "Ignore him Fate," she mumbles to herself. "You just have to hold him until morning and then Mom will take it from here. Maybe this time she'll finally execute him. No, that's a cruel thing to say. Just ignore him. Remember Tim is right near you. Remember your training soldier." It becomes clear Fate is doing all she can so Wade doesn't piss her off too badly.

"It's gonna be a long night." You say to yourself.
14511222.title: Bullying a Dragon er... Gargoyle

15.content:
Lexi lets out a sigh. “Listen Tim,” she says. “This next job is super important. We’re expecting five new interns at the Daily Tombstone and I need you to give one of these girls a tour around the building.” You gulp at that thought. “New interns? But Lexi, these are giant monsters. What if they don’t like me.” “Then I won’t blame them.” Says Lexi with a hint of venom in her voice. She really didn’t like you because of all the damages you inflict on the building as well as the amount of injuries you cause her.

You hesitate and then Lexi growls. “Go!” she shouts. “Alright!” you yell nervously. “I’m going.” You run off to find the intern, not wanting to incur the wrath of the sphinx. “She sure is grouchy today,” you say to yourself. “Must be her carnivorous diet.” Soon you reach the lobby, stopping momentarily to avoid getting accidentally stepped on by Emma and Beth. Once the two walk away, you continue on before hiding under a potted plant as Grace walks in. You could even swear she was eating a croissant with humans inside and shake out of fear.

You know the smallest monsters are around 300ft tall but most of the monsters in the building not only surpassed that height, but were heavily built, mainly BBWs like Fate, Mazee and Willa. You felt like a germ compared to the massive girls that worked here. Your smallest coworker could use you as a toothpick. But you couldn’t worry about the coworkers you know. You had to meet one of the interns and show her around and you had no idea what species of monster she was. You run up and feel tremors before you look up and see that the new intern is...

(I’ll let you make your own monster girls for this round. Try to make them different species than the ones already listed. No Mechas, mutates or human giantesses though and no underaged. New rule, the interns can't be the same species as the other interns or the reporters already on the character list. Try to have some variety.).
15.title: The Intern Net

choices: Angry. "I'll have you now that is a succubi stereotype!"
Flirty. "Not unless you want me to." (wink)
151.content:
As you look up at the titanic intern, you see that it vaguely resembles a human woman, except for some distinct features. For one thing, her skin was a light shade of purple, with long black hair down to the small of her back, from which two bat wings sprouted. Her eyes were yellow and slitted, like a cat's, while two horns protruded from her forehead, and her nails were long and sharp as knives, and painted red, while a long devil's tail with a heart shaped tip dangled from her backside.

For clothing, she wore a black business suit and skirt that showed off her smooth legs. There was only one sort of creature this woman could be. A succubus. You begin to tremble in fear. You weren't religious in the strictest sense, but you knew enough about succubi to know they were the most dangerous of all monsters. They wouldn't just kill you, they could steal your very soul, dooming it to unimaginable torture.

The beautiful yet intimidating creature looks down at you and smiles. "Hello, I'm Beatrice Zebub, but just call me Bea. You must be here to show me around." You nod timidly. "Yes, but I have one question first. You're not going to steal my soul, are you?"

How does she react?
151.title: Beautiful but Deadly

choices: You Show Bea Around the Building
Mazee Walks out from the Corner
Bea Snatches you and Stuffs you in her Cleavage
1513.content:
Bea lowers her head and giggles as her monumental breasts shake and she bends her knees. "Not unless you want me to." She says with a wink. Bea then turns around and shakes her butt above you as her tail twirls You see nothing but fur under her skirt and look down as fast as you could. Bea even blows a kiss at you and you jump out of the way. You knew all too well where this was going and you didn't like it. "No! No! No! I'm already in a relationship with a monster. Mazee Robinson is the only girl for me. Understand?" Bea actually looks in disappointment. "Oh," she says as her tail and horns droop down. "I understand."

You let out a sigh of relief. This monster was a flirter. You get enough of that from Blake and Beth and honestly you didn't want another. While your girlfriend Mazee was very loyal to you and you'd never cheat on her, you don't like to risk anything being taken out of context. Having Mazee mad at you would be a very bad thing, especially since she's one hundred times bigger than you.

Bea unbuttons her suit slightly and you have to cover your face as more of her cleavage is exposed. "That girlfriend of yours must be a real bombshell if you'd turn down a succubus. What kind of monster is she? A siren? A gorgon? Maybe even a hippogriff?" You shake your head and smile. "She's the most beautiful wererat I've ever seen." Bea's jaw drops as she looks at you in disgust. "You're kidding me? A wererat? You're dating a dirty rodent that eats toxic waste? You're sick." You let out a laugh. "Funny, that's what Willa tells Mazee about dating someone as small as me."

Bea gives a disgruntled look. Obviously she thought you were implying she was less attractive than a wererat. You're confused because Mazee isn't a fraction as ugly as most people think wererats are. "So, uh Bea. Shouldn't we go on with the tour." Bea then realizes something and nods her head. "Oh-okay. For a minute I forgot I was learning to be a journalist." You let out a smile and start walking away, obviously forgetting that Bea could cover more ground than you in less time. "Right this way Bea. Thanks for not eating my soul."

You don't notice it, but Bea keeps looking down on you with lust in her eye, very common for a succubus?
1513.title: Not Another One

15132.content:
You gesture for Bea to follow you. You decided to stick to the tour and not worry about the possibility of the demon giantess seducing you. Mazee would kill you if she thought you were messing around with a succubus and Bea didn't seem to like the idea that you had a girlfriend already, especially a wererat. "How about we start with the cubicle area Bea?" you say happily. "I think I'll surprise Lexi by showing you her office last. Lexi says I'm a great motivator." "Oh really?" asks Bea. "Yep," you say proudly. "She says every time I get assigned to a coworker, they have to be ten times more careful and work harder." You didn't realize that Lexi didn't mean that as a compliment but Bea rolls her eyes at you.

As you walk on ahead, you hear stomping and step back. A monster was coming forward. But then you see the monster's shadow and realize that this monster is Mazee, your giant wererat girlfriend. She had just arrived at work. "Hi Mazee!" you yell up at the giantess wererat. Bea looks in surprise and sees Mazee. "That's your girlfriend?" she asks in confusion. The 500ft wererat looks down and smiles as she shows you her teeth. "Hi Tim," she says in a lustful tone. "Sorry I'm late baby." Mazee picks you up off the ground and puckers her lips to kiss you. She's extra careful not to swallow you as she covers you in saliva.

Bea looks on in disgust before the kissing stops and you shake off Mazee's spit. "I'm sorry Maz, I can't hang out until after work. Lexi has a new intern she wants me to show around." "New intern? And Lexi put you in charge? What is she? A landshark? A werecrocodile." You shake your head before Mazee puts you back on the floor. "She's right over there. Bea, this is Mazee."

Mazee looks at Bea and her eyes pop. "A succubus?!" she yells. "Here?!" Mazee then walks up to Bea to get a closer look as you look up at her enormous shaking butt and swirling pink tail. Bea seems to be fighting back the urge to get mad at Mazee for being your girlfriend. Why won't those type of girls get the hint with you?
15132.title: Mazee Meets her Match

151321.content:
To your surprise, instead of getting mad, Bea actually smiles at Mazee.

"I have to admit, you're much prettier that most of the wererats I've meet." Bea says.

"Thanks, I think." Mazee replies, unsure of if that was a compliment.

"When Tim said he was dating a wererat, I'll be honest, I thought you would be awful looking. But Tim did pick a real looker. And you wear all that weight very nicely." Bea compliments Mazee, or at least, that's what you think she's doing.

"Thanks. Hey Tim, I don't have any assignments. Mind if I tag along?" Mazee asks you.

"No problem, babe." You reply, happy that Bea wasn't getting angry.

Mazee picks you up and places you on her shoulder, and the tour continues. You show Bea through all of the building, pointing out each employee and their job. The whole time, Bea was happily chatting with Mazee about your relationship. You were honestly surprised. The way Bea was acting, you thought she would starting fighting with Mazee.

Eventually, the tour ends and you arrive at an empty cubicle.

"This is were you will be working, Bea. We're glad to have you aboard." You say.

"Thank you." Bea replies before walking into the cubicle, giving you a nice view of her rear. Well, it's clear she won't stop flirting with you, but at least she doesn't hate Mazee.

"Hey," Bea says. "Since you were nice enough to show me around, how about I take you both to dinner tonight?"

What do you say?
151321.title: A Surprising Friendship

choices: "Humans are only worth eating, nothing more. But you're safe, Tim...for now."
"I like some humans. Most are pests, but others can be alright, I guess..."
152.content:
You look up, and up, and up, taking in the sight of the new intern. Monsters took a lot of looking to take in the sight of, of course, just due to sheer size, but it took you a moment to discern a species. And when you do, you're still not entirely sure what you're seeing. It heavily resembles a...hyena? But it looks a bit more brute-ish, with a darker fur and a bear-like face. She was quite tall, outshining Lexi at 900 Feet tall. Her body was fairly well defined, something you could tell despite the fur. A fact made more easily visible because of how naked she was, although whether or not she was technically naked was debatable due to the whole fur thing. She wasn't particularly 'curvy', but she looked strong, like she could easily tear apart any monster her size. You're really not sure what she is, but it's far too late to contemplate that as she suddenly snatches you up before you have time to realize she'd even seen you.

Holding you up to her face, the strange creature grins wickedly, her sharp teeth showing. Her large, single eye, which you only just noticed, stared at you intently, and you nearly wet yourself. "A human, eh? Are you sure you should be walking around unattended? It can be awfully...dangerous, to be caught off guard..." she says, licking her lips. You gulp. "I'm, uh... Tim, my name's Tim..." you say with a hint of nervousness. "I'm here to give you a tour of the building...and, uh, I couldn't help but ask...what are exactly are you? I've never seen a monster like you before..." The strange hyena-like creature lets out a laugh. "Yeah, you wouldn't. My family is somewhat...seclusive. But if you really must know, human, I'm a Nandi Bear." Ah. Everything clicked in your head.

She was a monster that resembled a cross between a hyena and a bear because that's exactly what a Nandi Bear was. It was on par with the Loch Ness monster in terms of how much it actually existed, but it was...not nearly as popular as the Loch Ness monster in that way, for sure. Only Nandi Bear's were supposedly vicious creatures, and you didn't really want to be face to face with one...which is exactly where you were, right now. Except it was a giant monster. And you had to give it a tour.

Shuddering, you slowly begin to speak. "S-so...shall we begin?" you ask nervously, and the monster lets out a chuckle. "Go on, 'Tim'. You're the tour guide, after all. Tell me where we're going first."

After some walking, and you nervously explaining certain areas of the tower to her while trying to hide how secretly worried you were, you learned her name was Brandy. Heh. Brandy the Nandi Bear. It rhymed. Although you wouldn't point that out to her, for obvious reasons.

Even longer after that, you work up the courage to ask a question you weren't really sure you wanted to ask. But if you don't ask, you'll spend the whole time wondering. So mustering up all your strength, you ask her "...Brandy, what is your opinion on, uh...humans?" you ask quietly, and her large, single eye squints as she considers the question, wondering how to respond. Finally, after a few moments of silence, with you practically shaking in fear as you wondered what she'd say, she says...
152.title: New Character 2

153.content:
It is a huge surprise, it's a 3 headed monster (specifically a hydra) and it was a dragon like being with not one or 2, but 3 heads like Cerbeus. It was a pink dragon mostly (with clothes, etc...) but what sets it self apart is that they are 3 heads. They were all looking at the juicy human that is a.k.a. You, and you are perhaps hoping that this creature isn't meancing, and this fella is 600ft tall, and then the heads begin to talk.

"So you are that juicy human that is causing all the problems with your accidents, you better hope you don't mess up our trip..." the left head said. "Give the human a chance to improve himself, we all make mistakes, and also.... Hi human!" The right head smiled. "Agreed, but still, he looks interesting." The middle head added. "This is Konia, and the 2 other heads are Konia L and Konia R. I am Konia M!"
153.title: The three heads of Konia!

1531.content:
"Well, it's nice to meet you gals. I am Tim, and I am here to help you interns get to know the place, this is Monster Tower, and here, we do all the newspaper stuff, so I hope you will enjoy the tour as you might find this a place for the 3 of you to work." you said nervously as the violent head of Konia glares at you. "You calling us 3 heads, I am Konia you nitwit!" Konia L roared at you just as she prepares to bite you, but Konia M and R intervene. "Calm down... what he is saying is true though, we do have 3 heads, but that's usual for a hydra." Konia M said calmly to you. "Well it's true silly.... I hope we get to see everything this place has to offer." Konia R said in a cutey voice, and then the tour begins.

"Alright, we shal begin the tour at?" you said....
1531.title: Continue

choices: Lexi scorns you for destroying the lunchroom
15311.content:
"The lunchroom! A place where we all eat without having to go to fast food joints everywhere." you said to her, and then you (riding on M's head) walks in to the lunchroom, and then everyone turns surprisingly to look at Konia. Normally monsters are 1 head, but 3... well, let's just say that there is about to be a huge incident, and guess who will mess this one up. Tim... and what this time for....for bring in a 3 headed girl here. The people just freaked out and ran for their lives, and it was mass hysteria at the lunchroom, people were running out of the place with comments like... "3-headed freak!" "Dearly mother of monster!" etc...

"Thank you Tim, our tour is ruin thanks to you!" Konia L yelled at you, and the other 2 heads intervene just before she eats you. "Stop it!" Konia R yelled. "Sorry... many people then to freak out a lot thanks to our appearance, it's been an issue we had all our life." Konia M mentioned, and the people came back in, no longer freaked out. "Sorry guys... never saw it before!" they said.

What happens now?
15311.title: Lunchroom freak out!

153112.content:
It isn't long before you're called into Lexi's office and she is pissed. "You imbecile!" yells your employer. "You had one job! One $@ing job and you blew it. Do you have any idea how much time and money it's going to take to repair the lunchroom?" "In all fairness," you say. "That wasn't my fault, Lexi. Konia startled everyone. I mean, there aren't a lot of monsters in Fearfield with more than one head."

Lexi just growls at you and step back. "If you hadn't answered my riddle correctly," says your sphinx boss. "I'm have you for lunch." Lexi even snaps her jaws to emphasize her point as you're shaking. She even shakes her tail. "You really outdid yourself this time, Tim," says Lexi. "I don't know whether or not to fire you or to shoot you." You actually sweat at that. You definitely didn't want to be fired by Lexi but she's just so mad right now.

However, then Lexi moves her eyes as if she's deep in thought and pins you to the ground with one of her claws. She has it dangerously close to her neck, like a cat playing with a mouse it intends to kill. "But then again," says Lexi. "Everyone deserves a second chance. It recently occurred to me that having only two guards, neither of which have the same shift, is inefficient. So I recently hired two more security guards. One for the day shift and one for the night shift. They coincidentally start work today at the same time."

Lexi then picks you up and holds you in front of her face as you grunt. "And it's just as well. Fate can't work the night shift tonight because she's helping her mother with some pest control and Beth can't work the day shift. Poor dear caught a nasty flu and couldn't come in today. Of course, the new guards will need some guidance. Your choice. Day shift or night shift."

You didn't even know what the new guards looked like or what species they were, but this was your only chance to save your job. Which shift should you cover?
153112.title: Hot Water

1531122.content:
"I'll take the night shift." You say. Lexi nodded.

Just then, the door to Lexi's office opened. And in walked who you assumed was the new employee.

The new employee was an 845 foot tall female vampire like Tara. She had chalk white skin, blood red lips, and blood red eyes. You saw that she was completely bald, leaving her pointy ears exposed. You also noticed the she had an even bigger hourglass figure then Aurelia. She had ZZZ-Cup boobs and an ass that could fill a couch. She was wearing a tight silver dress with a short skirt.

"Tim, this is Violet von Westbell. Please Violet, have a seat." Lexi said.

Violet nodded and sat in a chair...

...only for the chair to completely shatter, sending her onto the floor.

"Sorry, sorry." Violet said in a German accent. She sat in the other chair, but that chair shattered too. She stood up, only to slip on a piece of wood and fall head first into Lexi's desk, spilling Lexi's coffee onto Lexi.

"Great, another jinx." Lexi said. "I was going to orient you, but I'll let Tim do that. Please get out before you wreck my office."

Violet looked down and saw you. She picked you up by the shirt, but your shirt ripped and sent you falling into Violets cleavage. Violet reached down to get you, but slipped on the same piece of wood and stumbled backwards, breaking through Lexi's door. Lexi sighed.

"Sometimes I wonder if it's worth getting out bed." Lexi mumbled.

Outside, Violet finally caught her balance and pulled you out. Just then, Mazee walked up and saw you two. She saw your ripped shirt, looked at Violet, and snickered.

"Good to see you again, Violet." Mazee said.

"Hi, Mazee." Violet said sheepishly.

You looked between the two. "You know her?" You asked Mazee.

"Yup. Back in High School." Mazee said, grabbing you from Violets hand. "Violet is, by and large, the unluckiest monster in the country. She's a vampire who's allergic to blood. In her senior year, she had an accident with chemicals that left her permanently bald. After college, a witch cursed her with an hourglass figure that's still growing for no reason at all. She gets rained on even if there's no clouds."

"It's like the universe itself is out to get me." Violet said. Then she turned to look at the office, but her boobs hit Aurelia, who was passing by with a cup of coffee. The scalding hot coffee spilled into Violet's cleavage, making her scream and jump, which made her hit her head on the ceiling.

"See?" Mazee said. "So, Violet, you want Tim to give you a tour now?"

Rubbing her head in pain, Violet said...
1531122.title: Double Jinx

choices: Wish for Blake and Beth to leave you alone
You need to think this over first
154.content:
You look up to see what you at first thought was a human woman, but then you notice some distinct features that suggest otherwise. For one thing, she had orange skin with purple hair in a very long ponytail that went down to her knees. She also had a cat's tail and ears, with glowing yellow eyes and with slitted pupils. For clothes she wore what looked like a belly dancer outfit, with a red silk tube top that exposed her stomach, pants and shoes, with a veil covering her face from the nose down.

"Hi there." She said in a friendly tone. " I'm Jasmine. Are you hear to give me the tour?" You nod. "Yeah, but I have one quick question, what kind of monster are you? I've never seen anyone like you before."

Oh. Well, I guess you could say I'm a hybrid of sorts. My mother was a neko, and my father was a djinn, and I'm the result of their love. I'm not really sure what you would call me though."

"So does that mean you can grant wishes and stuff?"

" As a matter of fact, yes. Would you like me to show you? Maybe cure that bad luck of yours?"

"How did you..."

"Your reputation precedes you, Tim. I haven't even started working here yet, and already I've heard about all the injuries you've caused, maybe I can help with that."

Here was your jinx to be rid of your jinxhood forever! On the other hand, this could be one of those times where if you don't word your wish exactly right, it could bite you in the ass. Maybe you should try something small first, like getting Blake and Beth to leave you alone?
154.title: A Friend Like Me

choices: The Spell Works- Beth and Blake Lost Interest in You
The Spell Backfires- Now They Both HATE Humans
The Spell Backfires- Now Fate and Kiki are after you
1542.content:
You think hard on the matter and then you realize that with your bad luck, not even magic could cure you of being a jinx. But you had one wish that might get rid of two headaches once and for all. "Actually Jasmine," you say. "I have a different wish in mind. Two problems I'd like to sort out." Jasmine levitates slightly in the air and smiles down at you as she leans forward. "Oh. Tell me. I haven't granted a wish in a donkey's age. What is it?

You think about the two non predators in the news building that have caused you and Mazee the most trouble and give a smile. "You see Jasmine. There are two monsters in this building who are too interested in me than I'd like. They're smitten and won't leave me alone." Jasmine blinks and then twirls her tail. "But, if you have two girls fighting over you, what's the problem?" "I already have a girlfriend. She's a beautiful wererat." Jasmine lowers her ears in disbelief. "You're dating a rodent. I would've thought you could do better."

"That's not the point. These two won't leave me alone. I'm afraid if it keeps up, Mazee might break up with me." "Oh," says the neko genie. "I see. Well, as you know, genies can't make anyone fall in love with anyone else." You let out a groan and slap yourself on the forehead. "But there isn't a rule about making someone fall out of love. Just tell me the targets."

You're excited because you finally had a way of getting rid of Blake and Beth. "The first one is the entertainment critic, Blake, this bit fat weretiger. She never wears clothes and she's out to get me to marry her. One time she put me in a cage. The second is Beth, one of the security guards, a big hulking behemoth. She shows her love through torture. My back is still sore from that whip and I keep seeing that skull tattoo on her ass in my nightmares. I'll be sure to stay away from hippo monsters from now on."

Jasmine crosses her arms at that last line. "Hippo monsters aren't so bad. One of my best friends is a bahamut. But I see where you're getting at. Just say the word and your problems are over." You smile because you know just what to wish for. "I wish that Blake and Beth would leave me alone." Jasmine squees and spins her ponytail. "Oh boy! It's been too long since I granted a wish. I hope I get this right Tim. Alright. Shazam!" Jasmine snaps her fingers and the room fills with blue smoke to your confusion.

In two different rooms, the spell was taking effect. In the guard room, Beth was with Fate, the other guard. As Beth was about to take a sip of coffee, she felt her head and begun to cough. Out of concern Fate gets up and taps Beth on the shoulder. "Beth?" asks Fate. "Are you feeling alright?" Fate coughs again as that same blue smoke from the spell blows out of her large mouth. "Oh. I think this coffee is rotten. My head feels a little funny."

In the cafeteria, Blake was with that Kiki, Lexi's secretary. Kiki was scarfing a plate of crullers as Blake was busy drawing pictures of you and her in pink pen as she smiled. Blake starts to feel lightheaded just like Beth and tries to get up but falls over on Kiki, only for the tanuki to push her to the side as the same blue smoke from the spell comes out of Blake's ears.

Back with Jasmine, Jasmine's eyes glow as she continues casting the spell until finally she snaps her fingers. "It should be done now." She says. You really hope that you're rid of Beth and Blake stalking you from now on. But did Jasmine's spell do anything? She said she hadn't granted a wish in a long time. There was always a chance for the wish to go horribly wrong.
1542.title: Stalker be Gone

15423.content:
As Jasmine is completing the spell, the same blue smoke from Blake's ear enters Kiki's mouth as she's busy eating and Kiki begins to cough. Then something comes over her and stares like she's in some kind of trance. Back with the guards, the blue smoke from Beth's mouth hits Fate in the face and Fate starts to stare as if she's in the exact same trance.

In the next room, Jasmine finishes the spell and lets out a purr. "It is done Tim." "Yes!" you yell. This was it, you could finally enjoy Mazee without fear of Beth and Blake flirting with you. As if on cue, Blake walks right by. "Blake!" you yell. "Hey Blake!" You run in front of the tigress and she looks down at you before shrugging her shoulders. "Hi Tim. Listen, I'm busy. I need to be at a movie opening, so, get lost would you." With that Blake walks away.

"Alright," you say. "Thanks Jasmine. Now I'll never have to worry about stalkers again." Jasmine twirls her tail and lowers her ears as she twiddles her fingers. You really don't like how the neko genie hybrid is looking at you. "Well," says Jasmine. "There's one thing. The love couldn't be destroyed, so it relocated." "Relocated?" you ask in concern. "But you said that genies couldn't make people fall in love with anyone else."

Jasmine mews and then nods her head. "True. But this is a case where that rule is fudged slightly. Since Blake and Beth lost interest in you, two other monsters have fallen in love with you to make up for it." You begin to gulp and grab your hair as you groan. Jasmine's spell had backfired and now you had two new stalkers. One of them was coming and you turn around and see a shadow.

Which of the spellbound monsters is it?
15423.title: Two New Stalkers

154231.content:
You look up and see Kiki standing over you. She's got the same lazy look on her face as always, except now she's smiling. "Hi Tim, fancy meeting you here." she says. She still sounds apathetic, but you can actually hear a little enthusiasm in her voice. "Um, hey Kiki." you say. The look in Kiki's eyes is making you a little nervous. "Do you think you can come with me for a second?" the tanuki asks. Now this is strange. Usually you can't get Kiki to do anything, but now she's coming to you. Jasmine shrugs her shoulders. "Well I guess I'll be on my way." she says and walks away. Before she leaves she gives you a knowing look. You think about that look and then look up Kiki. You think the smile she's wearing is familiar and then it hits you. Its the way Blake used to look at you! Kiki must have gotten Blake's love for you!

This revelation is cut short when Kiki reaches down and scoops you up in her paw. She begins to carry you away while glancing down at you every now and then. "So...what do you need me for?" you ask her. "Oh, I just wanted you to help me with something." she answers. She arrives at her desk and sits down, setting you down as well. You look up at her as she looks down on you. "Okay, so what did you need help with?" you ask. "Well I was just sitting here working," she starts. Working? You doubt that. She was probably slacking off. "When all of a sudden I realized that I could really use your help." she continues. "Okay, lets get started." you tell her. Immediately after you say his her giant paw returns to grab you. Then she deposits you into her cleavage and relaxes in her chair.

You struggle to climb out and stare upwards at the giant tanuki. "Kiki, what are you doing?" you ask. She rubs your head before answering. "Just taking a little rest. I just ate so I should let it settle before I go back to work." she tells you. You feel like thats one of many excuses she's used to get out of work. Now she's just sitting there with you in her boobs, glancing down every so often. She doesn't even pay any mind to the people walking by. Now this is a strange feeling. She's actually paying attention to you, but only you. It makes sense though. She may have taken the love from those other two but she's still got her usual personality. Of course she'd express her feelings differently. All things aside though, you need to get out of this. Kiki has started to doze off so you decide to try and escape. Can you?
154231.title: Lazy Love

1542312.content:
Try as you might you just can't escape from Kiki's boobs. She's out cold above and you can't even wake her up. If a monster has a hard time, a human has no chance. Nevertheless, you keep trying, struggling to get free from the furry mountains. As you push down on them to try and force your way out you notice a smile on her face. "Mmmm...Tim you little devil." she murmurs. What kind of dream is she having? Suddenly you feel yourself going down and see the desk getting closer. She's going to sleep on the desk! You brace yourself for impact as the soft cushions collide with the hard surface. You actually don't feel anything because they're so soft. As Kiki lays against her desk she smiles and even wags her tail a little. She might be in love with you but she's still all about being lazy.

Eventually you hear stomping and Lexi comes over. "Kiki, wake-" she begins before she spots you. "Tim? What are you doing there?" she asks. "Well, long story short Kiki is in love with me. Now she's forcing me to take a nap with her!" you explain. Lexi laughs out loud, but Kiki doesn't wake up. "Look, can you help me out of here?" you ask. Lexi chuckles before putting on a straight face. "Actually, i think Kiki has been working pretty hard, so I'm gonna let her sleep for a while." she says. What an obvious lie!
