Kiki hasn't worked hard since the day you met her! Lexi turns to walk away as Kiki sleep talks some more. "Timmy...you're so dreamy." she says. Lei stifles a laugh and heads back to her office. You grunt in frustration as the giant tanuki sleeps.

Pretty soon your predicament has just become an annoyance. Its not uncomfortable, since Kiki's breasts are so cushiony, its just something you figure you'll have to wait out. The waiting ends when Kiki raises herself up and stretches her arms. After letting out a yawn she looks around. Did she forget about you? You get your answer when she looks right at you and smiles softly. "Hey Timmy, did you sleep well?" she asks. "Just great." you says sarcastically. She then pulls you free and sets you on the desk. As you stand she begins twirling her finger on the desk as if she's bored. It knocks you down every so often and she tickles your belly. Wow, she really is focused on you, even if she's still oblivious to everything else. When she's done her little game you notice the girls around you leaving. It must be closing time. Before you can go Kiki yawns and snatches you up. "Time to head home." she says and stuffs you in her cleavage once again. Your cries are muffled as she walks to the exit. This is bad. If you don't meet up with Willa she'll just assume you left with Mazee. What now?
1542312.title: A Tanuki In Love

choices: Lexi Tells You To Stay and Help Fate
The Next Day You And Fate Have A Special Assignment
154232.content:
The rumbling getting closer tells you that someone's coming. When she arrives you see that its Fate. "Hey Fate..." you start, but stop when you see her face. She looks a little nervous, which is something you've never seen on her. Her usually composed face is a little red, like she's blushing. As if she realizes this she quickly shakes it off and begins speaking. "Ahem, hello Tim. How are you?" she asks. She sounds calm, but you can tell she's a little eager to talk to you. It might seem like nothing, but you can spot these subtleties because its so out of character for her. "I'm fine. What brings you here Fate?" you respond. "Oh, nothing. Just wanted to say hi." she says and walks away. When she does you see her face redden.

"Well I guess we know who got the love." Jasmine says. "She was acting a little weird." you note. Then it hits you. Fate may love you now, but she's still Fate. She won't let her emotions control her, so you don't have to worry about her stealing you like Beth or Blake did. "She seemed like a schoolgirl with a crush." Jasmine comments. When you think about it you wonder if Fate has much experience with liking guys. She seems like she doesn't worry about stuff like that and focuses on her job. You've also heard that her mom is pretty tough, so it's not strange to imagine she would keep the guys away. Just as you start feeling safe the rumbling returns and a shadow appears over you.

"Hey again Tim. Are you done with this girl here?" Fate says as she walk up. "My name is Jasmine, and yes, we're about finished." Jasmine tells her. Before you can say anything she starts to walk away. "Sorry if I caused you any trouble Tim." she says as she goes. "What does she mean?" Fate asks. "Nothing." you answer. Fate then picks you up and places you on her palm. She starts to walk forward with you in hand, giving you a chance to observe her. Her face has a triumphant look, like she just made an accomplishment Then your eyes wander lower and see her massive chest just above you. She looks down and catches you staring, causing you to quickly look away. You look and see that she's also looking away, blushing once again. She really is like a girl with a crush.

When Fate arrives at the guard station you see that Beth is there as well. "Hey Beth." you say. She regards you with a quick look and then goes about her business. "Hey Tim." she says. At least she's off your back. You turn your attention back to Fate, who has begun absentmindedly scratching your head. "So uh, what did you bring me here for?" you ask. Fate thinks for a second and then begins stammering. "Well, I..." she says. You figure she wanted to get you to herself but didn't think too far ahead of that. The moment is interrupted by Beth walking out. "Well I guess I'll see you guys later." she says. It must be getting late, so Fate is taking over. She is the night guard after all. What now?
154232.title: It Must Be Fate

choices: It's Mazee and She Knows What Happened
It's Destiny and She Sounds Furious
1542321.content:
You crouch down and let out a sigh as Fate keeps scratching your head with her claws. She's surprisingly gentle. Then again, she's a species of monster that doesn't harm humans. You grunt a little and then Fate blushes. "Oh, sorry about that Tim," she says. "I'm not used to handling humans." "It's okay Fate," you say nervously. "You're much gentler than Beth at any rate." Fate giggles slightly and you let out a sigh. "Mazee isn't going to like this." You think to yourself. That's when you turn and see Lexi walking into the room. Obviously she wasn't expecting to see you.

"Tim?" asks Lexi. "What are you doing here? I thought I asked you to watch the new intern?" You mumble nervously and then Lexi sees that Fate has one eye on you. Fate quickly looks the other way as Lexi looks in confusion. "Hey," says Lexi. "What's going on? Isn't it Beth who's supposed to be all... I dunno crazy for you?" "Well Lexi," you say. "One of the interns turned out to be half genie and I wished to be rid of my stalkers and well, it kinda..."

It doesn't take Lexi long to put two and two together and her eyes pop out of her head. She then cracks a smirk and lets out a purr. "Oh," she says. "I see. I see. Carry on. I want you to help Fate. She could always use an extra set of eyes." Lexi walks away and begins laughing to herself. Somehow you're worried because it doesn't look good for you. Lexi laughs to herself as she exits the guard room. It looks like she has a plan.

"This is too perfect. Too perfect. Warden Destiny doesn't like any man to so much as look at her daughter. When she finds out about Tim, she'll go ballistic. I'll finally be rid of him. Kiki, get Under Gloom on the phone. I've got an idea." What Lexi doesn't realize is that Kiki has just as much of a lovestruck look on her face as Fate does.

Back in the guardroom, you look at the screens. Fate is half focused on the monitors and half focused on you. She seems to be somewhat nervous, as if she isn't proud of this lovesickness. You doubted she even went on a date in her life. You then turn your head and see a photograph that catches your attention. It depicts Fate as a child with who you assume is her mother Destiny. From the looks of it, Destiny is a light blue skinned gargoyle, similar in appearance to her daughter, albeit much skinnier and has what appears to be reddish pink hair. You immediately become nervous because you realize exactly who her appearance reminds you of and it isn't someone particularly friendly.

"You know Fate," you say. "Your Mom looks like somebody I've seen before, a long time..." Fate lets out a sigh. "Mom is perfectly aware of the resemblance, so please don't remind her." Either way, Destiny looks like a real hard case given her facial expression in the photograph. You heard from Mazee that Destiny was never in a good mood. If she found out about what was going on, spell or no spell, she'd hold you responsible. You heard that Fate hatched out of wedlock and Destiny didn't want Fate to make the same mistake she did. If Destiny thought you were trying to seduce her daughter, you were as good as dead. It was definitely going to be a long night.

Suddenly you hear your cellphone ring. "Uh Fate, I need to take this call. Could you do me a favor and keep an eye on the screens." You run to a safe place and answer the phone. But who is it at the other end?
1542321.title: Never Trust A Sphinx

choices: A Month's Guard Duty with Fate
15423212.content:
"Hello?" you ask. "Don't hello me you incubus!" yells a female voice on the other side of the phone. "You snake in the grass!" You let out a gasp. That was probably Destiny. How the heck did she get your phone number? She sounded pretty angry. That's when it hit you. She found out about you and Fate. "Uh," you mutter. "It must be destiny, I mean, you! You must be Destiny!"

"Listen here Mertins," says Destiny, growing more and more angry by the second. "I don't know how you seduced my Fate, but if you lay one hand on any part of my angel, I'LL ROAST YOU ALIVE!!" You gulp at that thought. "Now wait Destiny," you say. "Ms. Sirtis. Let's not do anything rash. This was all an accident. Long story, it involved a half-genie and perhaps one little..." "You cast a spell on my daughter?!" yells Destiny even more angry than before. "I knew it! I certainly didn't raise my angel to ogle at anything that moves! Stay away from Fate or you're freakin' DEAD!!" "Y-Yes ma'am," you say nervously. "No problem Warden Demona. Good grief!" You grab your mouth at that Freudian slip. The next second, Destiny lets out an angry kaiju-style roar. Obviously she didn't appreciate that Demona comment. Suddenly, all you hear is a ringtone.

"Huh," you say. "She hung up." Actually, Destiny didn't so much as hang up, but got so enraged that she broke the phone in her hand. Back at Under Gloom, she opens a drawer to take out a spare telephone and she's so angry at this moment that not only are her eyes glowing red, but her blue skin takes on a more purplish color. "I'M GONNA FREAKIN' KILL HIM!" she shouts out loud.

Back at the guardroom you walk up to Fate and see that while one of her eyes is focused on the screens, the other eye focuses on you. "Who was that on the phone Timmy?" She asks. Fate covers her mouth and blushes. "Uh," you say. "No one important Fate. Dumb question, but have you had any boyfriends before." Fate actually bites her lip in embarrassment. "No. Men usually stay away from me. My mother has always been a tad overprotective. My father abandoned her when he realized she was pregnant. They weren't even married." "Ouch." You think to yourself. "Mom brought me up since I hatched and didn't have anyone to help her. Many people don't think to much of her, but she's a lot nicer than you'd think. She's actually fond of humans." That surprised you. You'd think that given who she looked like Destiny would despise humans. Then again, she is a gargoyle. Though Destiny did threaten you over the phone.

"Of course," says Fate as she rolls her eyes. "Mom, well, she does not like men much. The last time somebody tried to ask me out, she chased him away with a gun. And that was another gargoyle." You gasp but then Fate smiles and rubs her head. She's smitten with you because of the spell, but seems nervous to get close to you. Obviously Fate is probably well aware of her mom's ferocious temper towards any man that gets near her. She obviously doesn't want to risk your safety. You let out a groan as you try to think of a way out of this horrible situation.

Hours pass and soon the sun comes up. Fate lets out a yawn. "Well," she says as she pets your head. "It looks like quitting time." She wakes you up and you let out a mutter. "Okay, good, morning Fate. See you later." Before you can walk away, the gargoyle giantess bends down and kisses you, much to your shock. She then blows another kiss and walks away. You let out a groan. "This is not good." You say. Fate is stalking you and her mom probably wants to kill you. You have got to find Jasmine to see about some way of reversing this curse.

Before you could do anything else, Lexi walks up and lets out a purr. "I trust last night was uneventful Tim?" "Oh," you say. "Good morning boss. It was okay. Nobody tried to break in." Lexi then lets out a laugh. "Uh, I can start work at any time." Lexi just smiles and rubs your head with one of her paws. "Good. But today, I think I'll let you choose your assignment." That didn't sound like Lexi. But you weren't complaining. Maybe you'd get to spend some time with Mazee tonight.

"Well," says Lexi. "For one, you could accompany Jasmine on her first assignment. There's gonna be a parole hearing at Under Gloom and she's covering it." You let out a gulp. Under Gloom? That's where Fate's mom worked. "Or," says Lexi. "You can spend the entire month assisting Fate on guard duty since you did such a good job last night. By the way, you have to choose one option or you're fired." Lexi smirks at you and you shake.

On one hand, you'd be going right into the lion's den and risk getting killed by an angry gargoyle mom. On the other hand, you'd be delaying the inevitable and with each night with Fate, Destiny would just get angrier and angrier. But maybe Under Gloom wouldn't be so dangerous. Destiny doesn't even know what you look like. Maybe you can hide from her under her nose. "So Tim?" asks Lexi. "What's it gonna be?"
15423212.title: Your Destiny Looks Bad

154232121.content:
You gulp and then twitch your fingers. "I'll take Jasmine to Under Gloom." Lexi lets out a laugh and you're forced to plug your ears. "Good. Well, good luck." Lexi walks away smirking. "Adios Tim," she thinks to herself. "Destiny will clobber him. I can imagine her stomping him right now." You walk up and Jasmine looks down at you with a smile. "I can't believe it," she says as she picks you up. "My first assignment. And I get to work with you." You mumble slightly and nod your head.

Then you gasp as Aurelia the werejackal comes forward. "Huh, you're brave newbie," she says. "Going into Under Gloom for your first case. My wife works there and she told me that the warden was in a bad mood for some reason. I'd stay away from her if I were you." "Really?" asks Jasmine. "Oh, thank you. But what does she look like so I know to avoid her?" Aurelia looks around before whispering to Jasmine. "Just stay away from anyone who looks like Demona."

Soon, you and Jasmine are walking to Under Gloom with you on Jasmine's shoulder. "Gee," says Jasmine. "Under Gloom. That's the most awful prison known to Monster. I heard some bad things about Warden Destiny Sirtis. She's the toughest warden the prison's had. Nobody's managed to escape since she took over. She has thugs working for her that torture the prisoners for fun." You nod your head. "Jasmine, could you do me a favor and address me as "James" once we step foot in Under Gloom." "Why's that?" asks the genie giantess as she gets on a bus. "Well," you say. "Destiny is..."

Suddenly Jasmine realizes something and gasps. "Fate," she mutters. "Destiny. Destiny is Fate's mom?! I made the daughter of a prison warden fall in love with you!? Oh no." You gulp. "Destiny has alienated every man that's so much as looked at Fate. If she figures out who I am, she's gonna kill me." Jasmine gulps. "Yeah. Don't worry Tim. Mum's the word." Poor choice of words, but you realized something. Destiny didn't know what you looked like and it's unlikely she suspected you were a human. Maybe you'd get out alive after all.

When you and Jasmine reach the prison, a guard comes forward. This guard is a large ogress who proceeds to strip search Jasmine much to her embarrassment. "Sorry to do this Miss," says the ogre woman. "But we need to be as thorough as possible. Especially today." The ogress gulps as she gives back Jasmine's clothes before a blue harpy resembling a snow roc flies down to you and lets out a slight shriek. "Hello," she says in a chipper mood that contrasts with her coworker's nervous tone. "I'm Icy. You must be the reporters for the Daily Tombstone. Come right in." Jasmine follows Icy and inside, the prison is in chaos. Nobody's broken out, but there's panic. The guards are running around like crazy with looks of fear in their faces. One saber toothed weretigress guard even pauses to inspect a cell to make sure nobody broke out.

There were three guards in particular walking forward. The first was Clover, a green grootslang, a monster resembling a reptilian elephant with a snake for a trunk. Next was Simone, a Nue, a creature resembling a baboon with tiger arm's and a snake's tail. Last was a monster you've heard of, a bloated brown furred striped were hyena. That was Cree, Aurelia's wife. You gag as you look at Cree's obese and deranged looking form and it doesn't help that she's completely naked.

"Geez," says Clover. "Today's a bad day." Simone shrieks in agreement. "I hate it when I agree with you hose nose." "Hi guys," says Icy. "What's going on?" "What's going on?" asks Clover. "You birdbrain, don't you see that the boss is on the warpath?" Suddenly you hear a scream coming from down the hallway. Down the hallway, a pegasus guard is sweating as Destiny glares at her and holds up a pair of keys. "I saw you drop these when you were patrolling the Dark Side. That's a mistake most guards only make once. If you can't hold onto your keys in the future, you'll be fired!"

Yikes, Destiny was so angry with the situation between you and Fate that she was taking it out on the guards. Destiny then walks the other way and grunts in pain. She looks to see she stepped on a particularly sharp human rib bone and her eyes glow red with rage. "Cree!" she shouts. Cree whimpers like a dog and lowers her head. "How many times do I have to tell you not to leave your leftovers laying around on the floor! Clean up these bones or you're fired!" Cree whimpers again and Clover lets out a laugh. Apparently she and Cree don't like each other.

Suddenly Destiny grabs Clover by the trunk and makes her scream. "I wouldn't laugh if I were you Clover. You punched in ten minutes late this morning and thought I wouldn't notice. If it happens again, you're fired!" Destiny then stomps off in rage and Icy is confused. "What crawled up her crack?" the harpy asks as you hide behind Jasmine's hair. Cree let out a sigh. "It happens every time. Whenever some dummy tries to hit on Fate, we get stuck with a bomb that won't stop going off. When the warden gets this mad, even the smallest transgression can get you a pink slip." Icy raises an eyebrow. "All this because someone likes her daughter. Warden! Don't you think you're overreacting?"

Cree, Clover and Simon gasp and Destiny turns her head with glowing red eyes before she flies at Icy and grabs the harpy by the neck as she squawks. "Overreacting?" asks Destiny. "Overreacting?! Overreacting?! You're still new Icy, so I'll give you a fair warning. There are three ways to get on my bad side. I don't like people who try to escape, never call me Demona and if you have something between your legs and you value your life, STAY AWAY FROM MY DAUGHTER, or so help me... I WILL PEEL YOU LIKE AN ONION!" Destiny drops Icy and then walks off to inspect another part of the prison. You're now very afraid. If she finds out who you are, and with Fate under that wish gone wrong, that gargoyle will rip you to shreds.

Icy bites her feathers. "Yikes," she says. "And I thought my mom was overprotective." "No joke Sherlock," says Clover. "She doesn't even like other gargoyles looking at her. Thanks to that idiot flirter..." Simone shrieks out a few things in an angry tone and Icy actually looks in surprise. "Whoa," she says. "Simone, I don't feel comfortable translating that." Jasmine turns to you as you walk out. "Looks like you have every right to worry Tim." She whispers. You nod your head.

"If I got my hands on that Tim," says Clover as her trunk lets out a hiss. Suddenly Cree realizes something. "Tim? I know who he is. He works in the same building." You gasp. Cree didn't seem to recognize you (not surprising since she never met you), but she was aware of you from Aurelia. "Oh that's right," says Icy. "Aurelia works at that place too." "Yeah," says Cree. "And Aurelia's been trying to catch that Tim and eat him for some time." "Eat him?" asks Clover. "You mean he's human?" Simone's jaw actually drops. "Oh no." You say.

"A human in a romantic relation with a monster?" asks Icy. "It's not as weird as you think," says Cree. "My sister, who I'm not on speaking terms with, lives next door to a Nemean lioness who's married to one." "Nemean lion?!" you think to yourself. "What kind of nut would marry a lion? She'd probably eat him in his sleep." Clover sticks out her tongue. "It's weird he'd be interested in Fate," says Cree. "Aurelia said he already had a girlfriend." That's when Cree realizes something and covers her mouth. "Oh crap."

Like a bolt of lightning, Destiny flies back and tackles Cree into the wall as the other guards scatter. Destiny grits her fangs and glares at Cree. "What was that Macbeth?" she asks. Cree whimpers. "Tim has a girlfriend," she says. "It's not just Fate." "What species?" "W-Wererat." Destiny is so mad that she scratches the wall with her claws as she drops Cree. "That jiggalo!" she shouts. "He thinks he can add my baby to his harem? Now I'm going to kill him harder than I was going to before."

This didn't look good for you. Destiny was pissed beyond belief. If she found out you were Tim, you're dead. Destiny finally notices Jasmine and Jasmine is holding her tail in nervousness. "H-Hello Warden. I'm here about the parole hearing. Lockette Locksley I believe. I'm from the Daily Tombstone." "Of course you are," says Destiny, her tone sounding as if she's making an effort to calm down, but not by much. "Come right this way." That's when you sneeze and Destiny notices you.

You nervously hold out your camera as Destiny's eyes return to normal. "A human?" she asks. "Keep him close to you. Humans have a tendency to leave this building through the plumbing system. If you know what I mean." You gulp. "Don't worry about me Ms. Destiny ma'am," you say trying to make your voice sound deeper. "No siree." Destiny however raises a... well, gargoyles don't have eyebrows.

"You sound familiar," she says. "I think I've heard your voice somewhere." "W-Well," you say. "It's probably a coincidence, like the fact you look like De... uh, it's a coincidence." Destiny lowers her eye to your level and you see that her eye encompasses the entire sky. Destiny may only look like Demona but she was so angry right now, she was as deadly as the real deal. You begin to cough slightly, hoping Destiny doesn't recognize your voice as the man who she thinks is trying to seduce her daughter. This wish was looking really bad right now.
154232121.title: Burning Destiny

choices: You address her by her real name
You slip and address her by her hated nickname
1542321211.content:
You pray that Destiny doesn't recognize your voice and as the blue gargoyle looks down at you, she nods her head. "Right this way," she says, still trying to stay calm. "The prisoner is down the hall. The hearing is in twenty minutes." Destiny leads you and Jasmine down the hall and you let out a sigh. "Looks like she's none the wiser," whispers Jasmine. "Don't worry. I'll get you out of this Tim. Somehow."

You see that even though Destiny is acting calm, her eyes are still bright red, albeit not glowing yet. As long as she thought you were trying to seduce Fate, she was out for blood. As Destiny is stomping down the hall, the guards begin to speak to themselves. "What was that Tim character thinking?" asks Clover. "And who is he? He has some serious cajones if he's flirting with Fate." "It gets worse," says Cree. "I heard she was on the phone with him last night and he called her... the D-word." Icy lets out a squawk. "The D-Word!? Does he have a death wish or something? Even I know better than to call the boss lady that hated nickname."

You gulp. "I take it somebody doesn't have much of a sense of humor." Then you turn to Destiny and try to get on the right foot with her. "So," you say. "Warden. You seem stressed." Destiny lets out a growl. "I am stressed," the blue gargoyle says. "I just learned that some viper is trying to seduce my daughter. What's worse is that now I know she isn't the first woman he's targeted! That womanizing creep! Just wait until I get my claws on him! There's no way in hell I'm letting my Fate make the same mistake I did!" Destiny even shows her fangs.

"Why are you so against Fate having a boyfriend?" asks Jasmine out of curiosity. "She seems nice." "Because," says Destiny speaking in a whisper that is progressively getting louder. "Men! Are! Poison! The last man I trusted left me holding the egg! I refuse to let Fate go through what I did!" Destiny begins to pant. "Calm down Destiny," she says to herself. "Just take the reporters to interview Lockette. She's one of the good inmates."

Destiny gestures for Jasmine to follow her and Jasmine holds you tight as you shake. It doesn't look like you can explain the truth to Destiny, she's way too mad for that. She then leads you both to a cell with a purple loch ness monster giantess was sleeping away on what she hopes would be her last day at Under Gloom. "There she is," says Destiny. "Hopefully, by the end of the day she'll be out for good behavior."

Jasmine smiles and so do you because it sounds like you got off Scott free and Destiny doesn't know you're Tim. Maybe that wish wasn't going to be so bad after all.

Then comes the moment where you have to really be careful. You turn to Destiny and say. "Thanks Warden...
1542321211.title: Destiny is None the Wiser

choices: Fate Stands Up To Her Mother
Jasmine Tries To Fix Fate, But Accidentally Sends The Love To Destiny
15423212112.content:
"Thanks Warden Demona." As soon as you say it your hands cover your mouth. Jasmine gasps and before you know it Destiny is in your face, eyes glowing red. Her enormous face fills your vision like an angry burning sun. "What did you just call me?!" she shouts. Her voice rattles you and you try to hold on to your perch. "I'm sorry! It just slipped! If you try not to do something hard enough you occasionally slip up!" you say frantically. Destiny growls but as you try to explain yourself her glowing eyes widen. "Wait a second...its you!" she exclaims. Uh oh. She must have recognized you from the phone when you started stammering. "Look I-" you begin before she snatches you up and holds you in front of her face, giving you a clear view of her fangs. "You have some nerve seducing my little angel and then insulting me to my face?!" she yells. Everyone around you is backing up nervously, even Jasmine. You need to get this gargoyle to understand!

"Look, warden! I didn't do anything!" you shout terrified. "You corrupted my Fate!" she says in a rage. "Look, its a long story. There were these two women who were in love with me so I-" Destiny interrupts again. "There are MORE women involved!? And now you want to make MY Daughter part of your little harem!?" she says. You don't know how its possible but she just keeps getting angrier and angrier. Finally deciding to help you Jasmine steps forward. "Um, Miss Destiny? Tim hasn't-" but she is also cut off. "Oh, and are you another of his girlfriends?" she says as she rounds on the neko. Jasmine just cowers and shrinks away. Destiny turns her attention back to you. "Now how to deal with you? Should I stomp you? Or should I just make you a snack? I normally don't eat humans, but I think I can make an exception!" she yells. She opens her mouth and brings you closer, the fangs growing ever larger. You struggle frantically as Jasmine covers her eyes in fear.

With a final yelp you curse your bad luck. Then suddenly it strikes again but this time on Destiny. She fumbles a little and you slip out of her claw's grasp. You scream as you fall and then collide with her boobs. You bounce off of them and tumble down the front of her uniform. During your fall you try to grab hold of her clothes but keep losing your hold. It does however slow your decent enough for you to reach the floor relatively safely. You find yourself tumbling to the ground right in front of her clawed feet. Gazing up you see her glaring down like a raging colossus. "You slippery little worm!" she says. Just as she raises her foot a voice calls out. "Mom! Stop!" Everyone, including Destiny, looks to see Fate standing in the doorway catching her breath. Looks like she rushed over here. "Don't hurt him!" she pleads. "Stay out of this sweety, I'm going to get rid of this little incubus!" Destiny tells her daughter. At the last minute...
15423212112.title: You slip and address her by her hated nickname

choices: She Flirts With You In The Prison
Later In The Week She Contacts You
154232121122.content:
Everyone in the room is on edge. Destiny has her foot over you, Fate is standing defiantly, and Jasmine is worriedly looking from one person to the next. Then in a last ditch effort the neko begins to work her magic. As she does a strange blue smoke exits Fate's mouth and swirls around the room. Jasmine sees it and smiles triumphantly, even though no one else knows what happened. Her face then falls when she sees the smoke head towards Destiny. It goes right in her mouth and she begins to cough before stopping her foot from squashing you. You look up to see her peering down at you with a confusing look on her face. She doesn't look mad anymore, and is staring at you like she's discovered something strange. She then reaches down and picks you up, lifting you to her mouth. "Mom, you're not going to eat him are you?" Fate asks, snapping her out of it. Destiny pulls you away and clears her throat. "Of course not." she says. "He hasn't done anything wrong." She then hands you back to Jasmine, who gives you a weak smile. If you didn't know any better though you'd think Destiny was about to kiss you.

From that point you continue making your way to the hearing, with Destiny sticking awfully close. Fate seems to be cured of the love she had for you, and doesn't seem to realize she ever had it. Jasmine explains that she manged to reverse the enchantment, causing you to sigh in relief. "Uh, don't get too happy." she says in a whisper, so no one else will hear. You look up and tilt your head as she explains. "When I extracted the love from Fate it uh...kind of went into her mom." You almost tumble off of her shoulder and she catches you. "What?!" you exclaim. It was weird enough when it was Fate, but Destiny? That woman was out for your blood just a few moments ago! "Look, just calm down. At least now she's not trying to kill you." Jasmine says quietly. You sigh and lean back in her palm. Maybe she has a point.

At this point Destiny looks over at the two of you and sees you in Jasmine's palm with her holding you close to her face. She frowns a little and interrupts. "I have a suggestion." she says. "I think it would be best for the photographer to ride with me so he gets a better vantage point.' She then plucks you out of Jasmine's hand and lifts you up. She stops for a second and looks like she's about to stuff you in her cleavage, but then doesn't and puts you on her shoulder. You see her face and get the feeling she was debating on where to put you. You don't know her that well, but from your recent experiences, you can guess this isn't her normal behavior. Like her daughter, she doesn't seem to be sure what to do about her new feelings. You see a faint blush on her face as you sit close to her neck. Just like Fate though, her feelings eventually begin to assert themselves.
154232121122.title: Saved (You Hope)

choices: Fate Wants To Talk To You
1542321211221.content:
All of you arrive at the hearing with little problems. The only thing is Destiny keeps glancing over at you. At least she's in control of herself. When its time to begin she stands to the side with a manticore woman who looks at you. "Whats this boss? A snack?" the manticore asks as she eyes you. Destiny glares at her. "No, this is the photographer for the Daily Tombstone. Don't get any ideas Belladona." she states, perhaps a little too forcefully. Belladona shrugs and turns back to the hearing, but still gives her boss a glance. Once the hearing begins you ready your camera as the Loch Ness monster girl walks in and sits in a chair in front of everyone. Jasmine and Fate are sitting off to the side, Jasmine taking notes. You check your camera and make sure its ready, but you wobble a little on Destiny's shoulder. You grab onto her neck to steady yourself, which catches her by surprise. She jolts and you are flung from your perch down toward her breasts. With a couple of bounces you land between her mountains. Frantically her claws fish you out and sets you in her palm. Looking up you see that her face is tinted ever so slightly. "Jeez boss, you feeling okay?" Belladona asks. "Of course! Lets just begin!" the gargoyle responds.

You walk a little to the middle of her palm and ready yourself. Meanwhile Destiny's eyes wander toward you and stare for a couple of seconds before she snaps back to the task at hand. Jasmine is watching closely while Fate looks a little perplexed at her mother's behavior. There is a panel of monsters here and they begin speaking. "So Lockette, you've been a model prisoner since day one. The warden personally feel that you've paid your debt and regret the crime you committed. How do you feel?" one asks. The Loch Ness monster takes a breath. "It is true that I committed a crime, no matter how small. My only goal when I got here was to serve my time and never make the same mistake again. I promise I will never get on the wrong side of the law again." she states nervously. The rest of the hearing goes by smoothly. Jasmine gets her article and you get a couple of good shots of Lockette. However there is the matter of the gigantic gargoyle looming over you, staring at you and then looking away. She might not be accepting of her feelings, but they are pretty strong.

After the hearing everyone shakes hands and chats a little. "Miss Lockette, can I get a few words?" Jasmine asks, and the newly freed girl agrees. While the interview is happening Destiny lifts you to her face. "So Tim, how do you like your work?" she asks hesitantly. She's trying to act differently but you feel she really wants to talk. "Uh its good." you tell her. "It pays the rent and I get to see some interesting sights. Plus I get to work with my girlfriend so thats great." Her eyes flash red for a second at the mention of your girlfriend but she quickly catches herself and looks away, as if she doesn't know why she did that. "The only problem is sometimes I end up n tight situations with my luck. Under butts, between toes, in mouths..." you list off the various situations. Destiny listens and actually has a glint of jealousy in her eyes at the girls in the office. "Well, you sound like a good worker. I wouldn't mind having someone like you around here." she says without thinking. She shuts her mouth and looks away again.

After more awkward small talk Jasmine retrieves you and carries you out. Destiny waves goodbye as you go. Fate follows behind. "Bye mom." she says. "See you later sweetheart." her mother responds. Fate look at her confused before leaving. At least thats over. Destiny might be in love with you, but at least she won't be close to you. With her job she'll be too busy to stalk you. Thats what you though at least. The next day...
1542321211221.title: An Unsure Destiny

15423212112212.content:
The next day you're at work feeling good considering yesterday. First Fate was in love with you, then her mother wanted to kill you for it. Now Destiny is in love with you. The good thing is she wasn't overly expressive of it. You suppose its her personality. Fate was shy when it came to love, so it makes sense Destiny would react in her own way as well. She seemed like she didn't know what was wrong with her. Guess after hating men for so long falling in love would confuse the hell out of you. Still, its good to be back in the office with nothing to worry about. With her job Destiny will be too busy to act on her feelings, or so you thought.

You walk in and head for Lexi's office. Time to find out what you're doing today. Then a rumbling comes and you find yourself between two giant furry feet. Looking up you see Mazee staring down at you. "Hello love." she says as she picks you up. She gives you a big wet kiss and holds you in her palm. "So how did it go with Under Gloom yesterday?" she asks. "Oh it was interesting." you say, which is quite true. "Were you scared at all?" she asks playfully. "Oh yeah." you answer, again truthfully. When work is over today you plan on sitting down with her and explaining this whole love magic business. "Well I'll get to work now, but do you want a lift to Lexi's office?" she says. "No I can walk." you tell her, and after another kiss she puts you down.

You make your way to Lexi's door and are about to knock when another rumbling sound approaches. You turn around to see a pair a enormous clawed feet. At first you think its Fate, but as you look up you see this person's figure is much slimmer than hers. Upon seeing her face you fall onto your butt in surprise. "Destiny!" you exclaim. You're not the only one who's surprised. Many of the other workers are looking at this intimidating gargoyle confused as well. What would a person like her be doing here? She lifts you off of the ground between two claws. "Are you okay?" she asks. "Uh yeah!" you respond. "Um, what are you doing here maam?" She rubs your head with a claw and smiles. "No need to be formal. Just Destiny is fine. To answer your question...I just wanted to talk to you." You look around for anyone who could help and spy Lexi looking through the window on the door. Looks like she finds this scene quite amusing. What does Destiny say to you?
15423212112212.title: Destiny Shows Up!

154232121122121.content:
You look up nervously as Destiny smiles down at you with lust and folds her wings into a cape (you had no idea that gargoyles really did that). She even showed her fangs and it didn't look like a threatening way this time. All around you your coworkers were looking in surprise and confusion. "The warden?" asks Anna-Maria. "Here?" "What the blimey going on?" asks Willa. "I've saw Destiny at Under Gloom before and she was bloody uptight. What the bloody hell is happening?" Grace even takes off her glasses slightly to polish them in disbelief as Emma squints. "I really wish I listened to my eye doctor right now." The polar were bear says. Yulong scratches her chin as she extends her neck to get a good look. "Fascinating." She says.

Cleotiti is so confused she actually forgets to be afraid of you. "Why is Destiny looking at Tim the same way Blake and Beth usually do?" asks the mummy woman. Aurelia is looking on as Destiny's tail wags and it doesn't take a genius to put two and two together and the were jackal is horrified.

"I think I left the teapot on," Aurelia says as she leaves the room. You know that's obviously a lie but then you realize something. Destiny was her wife's boss. Aurelia wouldn't dare attack you now if she was afraid of getting Cree fired.

You try to inch away, but Destiny puts a clawed finger to her back to make you inch forward as you're now in front of her face. "You know," says the gargoyle woman in a seductive tone. "It's been decades since I've had a man in my life. The last one was a lowly worm who looked like a powerhouse, but wimped out at something he couldn't take back. But I've been thinking about the whole cross species thing since... well, last night and if it worked for one couple, it could work in reverse."

The spectators are now horrified, with two exceptions. For some reason, Kiki has an angry face as she looks on and lets out a chitter like an angry raccoon. Lexi on the other hand is watching from her office with a bag of tortilla chips and a wicked grin on her face. "This is better than the Pompeii barbecue," the sphinx says to herself. "Time to kick back and watch the fun."

You look at Destiny nervously as her colossal blue visage is right above you. "W-What are you saying, uh Destiny?" you ask nervously. Destiny smiles wider than ever before giving you her answer. "Be my Macbeth," she says. "Slay the beast." Before you could answer, Destiny presses her lips down on you and you grunt as everyone around you looks in surprise.

"Oh my Ra!" yells Cleotiti as she grabs the sides of her head. Willa actually faints at the sight and Grace simply hands her glasses to Emma and Emma comically tries to use them to get a closer look at what's going on. "I have got to get my prescription changed," says the cheetah giantess. Harley actually turns her head and vomits in response as Tara's jaw drops. Ari however smirks and snaps a photograph with her phone. "Front paaaaage here I come." The weresheep says. Kiki actually gets so mad that she somehow manages to set herself on fire before stomping away.

Destiny's lips just keep pushing against you and you could barely breath. That spell Jasmine cast really messed up this time. That's when you hear a loud gasp and realize this was going to get worse because you turn your head and see...
154232121122121.title: Date with Destiny (Bad Joke, I Know)

choices: She's Sending You Back To Under Gloom
She's Asked Destiny To Act As Security For A Day
1542321211221212.content:
Heading for you is Mazee, and she looks mad. "Tim!" she calls out angrily. When she reaches you she goes to grab you but Destiny pulls you away. Mazee turns her attention to the gargoyle. "Now listen hear you..." she trails off as she looks up and sees who it is. "Do you have business with Tim?" Destiny asks. "She's my girlfriend!" you chime from her hand. The gargoyle looks down on Mazee as if she's studying her. "Oh thats right. You have a girlfriend." she says dismissively. Mazee is intimidated but tries to act tough. "Thats right, he's mine." she says. Destiny holds you close to herself. "Uh Destiny?" you say. "I kind of have to get back to work." She smiles and looks at you. "Oh! Sorry Tim. I kind of got carried away. " she says. "Lets continue this some other time."

Destiny frowns as she hands you to Mazee. "You've got some explaining to do!" Mazee tells you once she has you. You cower a little at this. Mazee is super sweet normally, but can be a terror when she's mad, Unfortunately there's another scary presence around now. You feel a glare and look up to see Destiny staring at Mazee with glowing red eyes. "You're not threatening him are you?" she asks. Mazee calms down and pets you gently. "Good, because I won't have anyone hurting him. There are plenty of cells in Under Gloom." Mazee turns to walk away but Destiny stops her. "Let me be clear." she says. "I'm going to make him fall for me and I'm going to take him from you." You look nervously from one woman to the other as Mazee walks away. Destiny smiles at you seductively and wags her tail as she leaves.

"What is this all about?" Mazee asks angrily. "Well...you know Jasmine?" you ask. "Yeah what about her?" You then explain everything thats happened. "...and now instead of Fate, her mom's in love with me." you finish. Mazee's face softens and she gives you a wet kiss. "I'm sorry babe. I should have known it wasn't your fault." she says. "You on the other hand." she says to Jasmine, who was standing nearby looking guilty. "I overheard you telling her." she says. "Of all the people, you had to make HER fall for my boyfriend?" Mazee asks. "I'm sorry! It was a fluke! I thought it would help if I fixed Fate, but the love had to go somewhere. I didn't think it would go to Destiny!"

You suddenly hear Lexi call from her office. "Tim! Get in here!" she says. Mazee carries you inside the office and sets you down. She gives you a kiss and leaves you with the sphinx. For some reason you feel uneasy as Lexi grins down at you. This is a pretty accurate feeling when you find out what she has planned.
1542321211221212.title: Destiny's Intentions

choices: She Takes You Around The Prison
First She Takes You Someplace Where You Can Be Alone
15423212112212121.content:
"I think it would be a good idea for you to head back to Under Gloom." Lexi tells you. You are visibly shaken by this and Lexi loves it. "Why? Is there another hearing?" you ask. "Oh no, I just think a day there will give us some good story material." she answers. You start to argue but the sphinx gives you a quick glare. "Are you refusing to work?" she asks. You sigh a hang your head. "No boss." you say, and she smiles in triumph. "So who's going with me?" you ask. Lexi grins again and chuckles. "Oh you're going it alone this time." she tells you. You run up to her in shock. "Alone?! But how will I get around? Besides, I'm a photographer, not a reporter." you say frantically. "When you get back you can relay your story to one of the girls, and the prison staff will help you." your boss says. "In fact, your ride is already here." The door then opens and Destiny walks in. She looks at you with a grin and leans down to your level. "Looks like we get to spend the day together Tim!" she says excitedly, then looks at Lexi. "Thanks for letting me know before I left." Lexi smiles at her. "Hey, I just came up with the idea." she says.

Destiny scoops you up and walks out of the office with you in her hand. When she passes Mazee she waves goodbye. "See you later, I'll take good care of him." she says boastfully. Mazee scowls and crushes the cups she's holding, causing the coffee inside to go everywhere. Kiki gives an angry pout from her desk and chitters as the gargoyle leaves. Outside Destiny is in the parking lot when you speak up. "So where's your car?' you ask. "Oh I didn't drive here, I flew." she tells you. "Which reminds me, I need to find somewhere for you to ride." The she begins moving the hand you're around her body. "I really enjoyed that kiss, so maybe here's a good place." she says as she opens her mouth. Her huge fangs are showing and her tongue moves around slowly, as if beckoning you. Then she brings you to her pants. "Or I could drop you in here." she suggests as she pulls her waistband open. "But then you might get lost in there." Finally she brings you to her breasts. "I know!" she says and drops you into her cleavage. "Now you're secure and close to my face." You tumble into the boobs and your first thought is that they're very soft. You didn't expect a gargoyle to have such soft skin. You tumble around as she takes off into the sky, but its pretty comfortable. Destiny glances down at her boobs in anticipation, excited to have you to herself.

When Destiny lands she pulls you out and holds you in one hand. As you sit on her palm you gaze up at the imposing prison and gulp. Suddenly you are pressed into the palm you're sitting in by a pair of lips. Destiny is kissing you again, and this time you feel her tongue lick you a little. "Hey!" you call out, but she doesn't let up for a whole minute. "We've already kissed before, so its okay." she tells you with a giggle. You never thought you'd hear the warden of Under Gloom giggle.
