"So you're a human dating a wererat?" Hecate says. "Um, yeah." you say, hoping she doesn't have a problem with it. For some reason some others do. "Thats cool." Hecate says. "Love is love." She seems pretty casual. "Yeah, you never know what'll happen in life." you say. "Right now I'm talking to a werewolf, but I'm not being eaten." You laugh at your little joke, then seriously ask. "Do you eat humans?" Hecate glances at you. "Of course I do I'm a werewolf." At this you become nervous and look to Mazee for protection, but Hecate tries to calm you."Relax, I won't eat you. Its been ages since the last time i ate a human. I just realized that there are better things to eat you know? And I won't eat my friends, so you're safe." Seems like you'll be okay around her. She seems pretty laid back and you believe her when she says she won't eat you. What next?
1551.title: Not much of a Taste for Humans

15512.content:
You and Hecate continue with the tour. You introduce her to some of the other staff and show her the ins and outs of the building. Eventually you complete the tour and are basically done for the day. The two of you continue to have small talk as you walk along.

"So from what some of the other girls tell me, you have issues with bad luck." Hecate notes as she walks. You look away slightly. "I wouldn't say that. Maybe something goes wrong once in a while, but I wouldn't call it an issue." As soon as you say this however, Hecate trips over her own feet and stumbles. She manages to catch herself, but it does toss you around a bit. Luckily you manage to brace yourself and keep yourself on her shoulder. The black wolfess then gives you a questioning look. "Well, maybe I'm a kind of a jinx." you admit as you look up at her blue eyes.

"I guess thats how you managed to survive in a place like this for so long, huh?" she says to you. "I guess." you respond. "That and I have Mazee looking out for me. She's the best wererat I could ever hope for. Even though some don't understand our relationship." Hecate waves your comment off. "Eh, I've known stranger. I have a cousin who's in love with a human." You look at her with interest. "Really?" She rolls her eyes and laughs a little. "Yeah, she says he's the cutest little thing ever." she performs air quotes on that last part. "She keeps saying he's her boyfriend, but I know she tends to jump the gun a little." Its pretty nice that Hecate has other nice werewolves in her family. Eventually she brings you to Mazee and you say your goodbyes for the day.

You think that the day went rather well. How is Hecate doing when you come in the next day?
15512.title: On Luck and Love

155122.content:
When you arrive at work the next day you head to Lexi's office to see what your assignment is. Before you get there however you find yourself being scooped up. You're brought up to the face of Hecate, who gives you a grin. "Hello partner." she says. "Partner?" you ask. She nods. "Lexi told me I'd be working with you today. She also said to try and find you before you came to her office. Something about things getting broken." You chuckle awkwardly. "So, what are we doing?" you ask.

"We're going to check out some suspicious activity." she answers. You look at her. "Wouldn't that be more of a job for the police? Hecate shakes her head. "This isn't a concern of the police." she says. "Its rumored that several people have disappeared in some woods. The police have looked into it, but couldn't turn up anything so they dropped it as a prank." You look up into her blue eyes nervously. "And we have to check it out?" She replies calmly. "Yup. We're going to see if we can find anything worth reporting."

Soon after the two of you are in Hecate's truck and heading for the forest. You don't know what to expect out of this. Part of wants to brush it off as a silly rumor, but part of you is actually nervous. It wouldn't be that far fetched for something supernatural to be going on. You work with giant monsters and you yourself are a horrible jinx. Anything's possible. When you arrive at the woods.....
155122.title: A Spooky Assignment

1551222.content:
When you drive up to the woods its about night, with the sky still sort of clear. Hecate turns off the truck and gets out, placing you on her shoulder. The two of you make your way to the entrance of the woods and head inside. You don't really see anything that stands out, and aside from it being really quiet, nothing's giving you the creeps. You head deeper in and wander around until Hecate decides to call it quits. "Come on." she says. "I guess this was a dead end. Let's get out of here, its practically nighttime now."

The two of you head back the way you came, but its apparent that its too dark. Luckily Hecate has a flashlight. She switches it on and then picks you up off of her shoulder. "It would be really bad if I lost you out here in the dark." she says and places you in her cleavage. "That good?" You're firmly in place and feel secure. "Yeah, I'm good." you reply.

Hecate starts walking. but stops after a while. "What's wrong?" you ask. "I think I'm a little turned around." she answers. Which means she's lost. The two of you wander around in the dark and you have to admit, you are starting to get a little scared. Hecate isn't scared however, just a little frustrated that she's lost. Soon enough though, she shines the flashlight ahead and finds something. What is it?
1551222.title: Getting Creepy

choices: Hecate finds another sheet of paper.
15512222.content:
As Hecate shines the flashlight she come across a sheet of paper. Upon picking it up she sees a note reading HELP ME. "What the hell is going on?" you ask nervously. Hecate pats your head with her finger. "Just relax, nothing's wrong." she reassures you, but you know she's just trying to keep you calm. Good thing she's keeping her cool. You try to shake off the tension in your mind.

As Hecate moves through the forest you look off in another direction and spot something that shakes you up. It appears to be a thin woman, tall even by monster standards, dressed in a black dress. What strikes you more however is that she doesn't have a face, it just looks like a blank white slate. She's far in the distance, and seeing her just gives you a jolt of fear. You look up at Hecate. "Hecate! Over there!" The wolfess looks where you point, but the woman is gone. "Uh, I don't see anything Tim."

She continues to walk and eventually finds another piece of paper.It has a picture that, even though it looks like it was hastily drawn, clearly is of the thing you just saw. "That's it! That's the woman I just saw!" Hecate looks at you. "Okay, I think something's going on here." Finally. "I know drawings, and this one creeps me out. It's like whoever drew it was scared."You start to panic a little, and then....
15512222.title: The Pages

155122221.content:
Hecate looks up from the page she's holding and gasps. You look in the same direction and tense up. Its the faceless woman. She's just standing there, not moving at all. She's also closer than she was last time. "That's it!" you say. "That's the thing I saw!" Hecate takes a breath and steps forward a little. "Maybe we can ask her for help." You know she's trying to keep it together, but you can hear the hesitation in her voice.

"Uh, Hecate?" you try to get her attention. "I think we should keep moving." She looks down at you. "We're just going to ask her some questions." However when she looks up the woman is gone. "On second thought.....yeah lets keep moving." she says, still keeping calm. She begins walking again, and you begin to panic inside. You don't know why, but for some reason that thing is making you crazy scared.

Hecate tries in vain to find her way, and then she sees it again. Standing in the distance slightly behind a tree is the woman. This time you feel Hecate tense up. She quickly turns and hurriedly walks in the opposite direction. "What the hell is that thing?" you ask in a scared tone. "I don't know!" she answers worriedly. "It doesn't look like any monster I've ever seen! Just looking at it freaks me out!" The two of you desperately search for the truck, but have no luck.
155122221.title: Now We're Scared

1551222211.content:
Walking through the dark woods, you and Hecate try to find your way out. You have no luck finding an exit, but you do find more pieces of paper. Hecate picks them up as she finds them and they continue to freak you out. Most of them have drawings related to the Creature following you, and others have hastily scrawled notes. One just has NONONO written over and over again. Also, the more you find, the more you see the blank faced woman.

Eventually the woman appears quite close and Hecate turns in the other direction. She breaks into a light run. Peeking over her shoulder, she sees the woman closer than before. You can't see this from your spot between her breasts, but you can definitely feel her heart beating faster. Hecate's running speeds up, and the woman keeps chasing her.

Soon the fear becomes too much and Hecate starts running on all fours. You find yourself being jumbled around in her top, but thankfully you manage to stay put. All you can hear is the sound of Hecate's paws hitting the ground and her panting. She's terrified now and she's desperate to get away from whatever the hell that thing is. Her prayers are miraculously answered as she finally spots the area where the two of you came in. All she has to do is reach the truck and get out of here, but can she?
1551222211.title: Panic

choices: She takes you to her place.
15512222111.content:
Hecate's panting fills your ears as she bounds toward the truck. The both of you are scared as hell and you don't know if you'll make it out of this. Suddenly you hear another sound. The cracking of wood and a loud crash. Hecate looks over her shoulder at the source of the noise. "What the...?" In the chaos of her breasts bouncing from the running you manage to speak. "What happened?" She answers in between breaths. "That thing was pretty close, but a tree fell right in front of it!"

You wonder what happened and then hear more trees fall. "Those trees are slowing it down!" Hecate says. "Every time it appears a tree falls and it has to move!" You'd say this is good luck for you, but suspect its the other way around. You're actually giving this creature bad luck! Thank god you're such a jinx! Hecate stops running and you feel her stand up. You look forward and see that she's unlocking the door of the truck.

Hecate opens the door and jumps into the drivers seat. She puts the key in the ignition but the engine won't start. As she tries again and again you look ahead and see the scary woman getting closer. Now that you're watching her you see that she moves by teleporting. She appears close to the truck but yet another tree falls and catches her off guard. At that moment the truck starts and Hecate backs out and takes off. As she drives away Hecate looks in the rear view mirror and notices that the creature isn't following. "I think we're good." she says with a sigh of relief. "I guess that thing just sticks to the woods." You lay back and relax on the softness of her chest. "Yeah, and it looks like we have something to write about." Now that you're no longer around that thing, you feel incredibly calm. Its pretty late now. Where does Hecate drive to?
15512222111.title: Out of the Woods

choices: She Asks You to Stay for Dinner
You Ask Hecate About Her Sister
155122221112.content:
Hecate arrives at a moderately sized house on the outskirts of Fearfield and walks out of the truck carrying you in her hand. Hecate unlocks the door and you enter her home. The interior is bright blue and there are drawings hung on the walls. You whistle and smile as you look at the drawings. There's one of a western and Chinese dragon kissing along with a drawing of five valkyries moving up a rainbow. As Hecate walked up to her computer, you saw more drawings, one of which depicted a Nemean lion standing on the hands of a weretiger and a werepanther and the tiger appeared to be crushing a man in a lab coat.

"Did you do all these drawings Hecate?" you ask as Hecate places you on the table. You run to a sketchbook and immediately flip through it as Hecate smiles. "A busy mind is a happy mind," she says. "Drawing is my life. But writing helps pay the bills. And boy, did we get a story. Mysterious Slender Creature In Fearfield Woods. Did you get any photographs?" You hold up your camera and smile as Hecate smiles. "Good. That thing looked like Slenderman. I had no idea that thing was real." "Well," you say. "Technically it was a Slenderwoman. Geez. If that thing caught us, we'd be dead."

Hecate barks and nods her head. "Yeah, but your bad luck can even undo a monster like that." You let out a laugh at that. That's when you notice a few photographs near Hecate's desk. One of which appeared to be a photograph of her and her relatives. Hecate wasn't kidding when she said she came from a large family. They appeared to be mainly women and most of them looked on the heavy side, which surprised you given how thin Hecate was. One of the girls was a brown furred werewolf girl with her hair down. She somewhat looked like Clawdeen Wolf, except for her heavy weight. From her outfit, this werewolf girl appeared to be a fashionista.

Another of the girls appeared to be a gray furred werewolf with a reddish tint in her fur. She was wearing a red sweater and appeared to be brooding, obviously not a social person. Another of the wolf girls was a yellow furred werewolf girl who appeared to be wearing a red hood. Next to her was a pear shaped werewolf resembling a dire wolf, with her hair worn in a ponytail. She seemed to be wearing a bikini and seashell necklace. Another wolf girl was completely naked except for the paint covering her fur and even then, she looked more like a giant collie than a werewolf.

Hecate herself was in the photo and was at the side of an obese silver furred and blue haired werewolf woman who appeared to be older than most of the other wolves in the photo. You take it the silver wolf was Hecate's mother. But when you look at the other side of the silver wolf, you see that the photograph appears to have been folded, though you could make out a white furred foot. You realize that must've been Persephone, Hecate's cannibalistic sister. Obviously, Hecate had some bad blood with her sister.

But next to that large family portrait, you notice another photograph that appears to depict Hecate and Persephone as wolf cubs playing with a beach ball. They seemed much happier then. You wonder what the heck went wrong?

That's when Hecate finally finishes typing and looks down at you.
155122221112.title: Home of Hecate

choices: She Tells You Its Time For Bed
1551222211122.content:
"So Hecate, can I ask about your sister?" you say hesitantly. For a second you see anger flash across her normally mellow face, then she sighs. "There's not really much to say. She's a cannibalistic criminal." she says with her arms folded. "Yeah, but she wasn't always like that right? In that picture it looks like she was a normal cub like you." you say. Hecate picks up the photo and looks at it. She has a nostalgic expression which she quickly gets rid of. "I guess she wasn't always like that. We actually used to be pretty close." she says. She then looks over and sees the interested look on your face and picks you up. "Fine, I'll tell you about her. Don't get any funny ideas though, I don't want my family's business in the paper." she tells you as she sits down on the sofa. "Don't worry, you can trust me." you say.

"Okay back when we were kids we were pretty inseparable. She was always a little aggressive though. When the boys teased us I would just ignore them, but Persephone couldn't. Our mom got quite a few calls about her beating up the neighborhood boys." She laughs a little when she says this. "Even so, she never really got punished too bad. Mom knew she was just sticking up for us. There was one time when she and my cousin Selene got into an all out brawl with some punks." You're fascinated by this. You never thought you'd hear the story behind the infamous Persephone. "She was really great at painting too, just like I draw. Our mom taught us how, she's a great artist. Me and Persephone were kind of a team. I could draw and she could paint. We did some awesome work together." Hecate's face takes a gloomy turn as she remembers more. "Then she became a criminal. One day she got into fight with some minotaur boy when we were teenagers. She bit him good and apparently liked the taste. She just kept eating and eating until I pulled her off of him. They arrested her and let her go under the grounds that she was acting in self defense. They made her undergo a psychological evaluation but they didn't find anything unusual. Things at home were normal, then that same minotaur came up missing. After a couple of weeks the police ended up at our house. When they asked her Persephone just admitted it, like she didn't even care. Then they took her away and locked her up. When we went to visit her we found out she escaped and was on the run, and its been like that ever since." You stare wide eyed at Hecate as she spins her tale.

It doesn't appear to be over, as she keeps going. "Mom took it real hard. She was a wreck, crying and forgetting things. Eventually she accepted it somewhat. She went back to her sweet self, but still has a problems with her memory. I kind of think she wants to forget so bad that she forgets everything. Ironically she works at the KDP. Maybe she just wants to help people like Persephone." Then her tone gets angry and she gets louder. "Its all her fault! She knew what she was doing when she confessed and she still does! Mom took it the hardest but the rest of the family was torn up too. We've always been a close family, so it hit us all. Then after hearing about her crimes on the news and in the paper I realized she just doesn't care! The worst part is that every time she gets away from the authorities she drops in on a family member like its no big deal! Everyone else may still accept her, but I don't. We had a couple of big fights until she learned to stop coming to me. She drove our mother over the edge and hurt us all! She basically abandoned us!" You see a single tear in her eye before she quickly wipes it away. Seems like her hatred of her sister comes from the fact that she left her and her mother without a thought. Their family seems pretty close knit, judging from the way she says they all reacted. Hell, even Persephone sounds like she still cares about them, since she still visits when she can. That doesn't change the fact that she's a murderer, but its kind of nice in a way. It also sounds like Hecate is the only one in the family who's ever turned her away. She must have taken it harder than the rest, after her mother.

After that little session Hecate pets your head. "And thats it. Promise you won't tell anyone." she says. "I won't." you tell her. She then brings her face in closer. "I mean it, you can't tell anyone. Not even your girlfriend." she says. She's serious. The fact that she told you must mean she trusts you a lot. "Don't worry, I promise." you repeat. After winding down....
1551222211122.title: Hecate's Tale

choices: You and Hecate Wake Up the Next Morning
Elsewhere, Persephone is Breaking Out of Jail
15512222111222.content:
Hecate lets out a yawn and then looks at you. "Well," she says. "It's time for bed. It's getting late." You let out a laugh as your new werewolf friend picks you up. "Yeah," you say. "I think we better turn in. Hecate walks towards her bed that you see was ironically twin sized." "Huh," you say. "That's an usually large bed for one wolf."

Hecate hangs her head down. "I like my space," she says. "I used to... bunk with.... you know..." You're starting to wish that you didn't bring up Persephone. As much as Hecate says she hates her sister, you could tell she was still sad to hear about what happened to her. "Hecate," you say. "I'm really sorry about..." "It doesn't matter now," says Hecate. "Persephone's days are numbered. One of these days, it'll be over." You gasped at the sound of that. Although you shouldn't be surprised. Monsters take cannibalism very seriously.

You then look around to change the subject as Hecate is putting on her pajamas. "Uh Hecate," you say. "Where am I supposed to sleep?" Hecate's tail sticks up and she thinks about that before she takes out a scarf and wraps it around you before putting you next to her alarm clock. "There," she says before she climbs into bed herself. "I just hope your girlfriend doesn't..." You let out a laugh. "She wouldn't mind. I already live with her best friend. Specifically, I live in her best friend." Hecate raises an eyebrow in confusion. "Uh, she's a bunyip," you say. "I live in Willa's pouch." "You live in another monster's pouch?" asks Hecate. "Hey, the rent's okay." "She charges you rent to live in her pouch?" asks Hecate more baffled. Then she lets out a yawn. "Well, good night Tim."

With that, she turns off the light and you both drift off to dream land.
15512222111222.title: Bunking with a Wolf

choices: "Attention Everybody, The Building is Shutting Down Early for Today"
"Tim, Hecate, Please Report to my Office, There's Something I Need to Tell You"
155122221112222.content:
As you and Hecate were sleeping, elsewhere, near Under Gloom, the most vile prison known to Mons-Terra, alarms are blaring. Somebody had managed to escape. From the ground arose two monsters who had apparently dug a tunnel. From their orange jumpsuits, they were obviously escaping convicts. One of them was a cockatrice, a monster with the upper body of a Rhode Island Red chicken and the lower body of a purple lizard and the other monster was an albino werewolf; Hecate's sister, Persephone.

Persephone sniffs the air and lets out a sigh through her muzzle. "It's good to be free." She says. The cockatrice prisoner lets out a squawk as the search lights shine near them. "Come on Persephone," she says. "We've got to get the heck out of here before old Demona finds out we're trying to escape." Persephone lets out a sigh. "First," she says as she points to the muzzle. "Get this damn muzzle off of me. I'd attract too much attention with it." The cockatrice woman clucks before plucking one of her own feathers and she uses it to pick the lock on Persephone's muzzle. Once the muzzle falls off, Persephone exhales and smiles to show her sharp teeth.

"Okay Pers," says the cockatrice. "Now we better get out of here as fast as possible." However, Persephone lets out a growl to her partner's confusion. "First thing's first," says the white wolf woman with a malicious grin. "I'm starving." Persephone growls and then tackles the cockatrice, piercing her neck with her teeth and pushing her to the ground before she begins eating. Once her accomplice is reduced to bones, Persephone lets out a thunderous belch and wipes the good off her mouth. "Tastes like chicken." She says. The searchlight then shines before Persephone growls and scurries away on all fours.

The next day, you are riding on Hecate's shoulder as everyone passes her. Harley walks out carrying newspapers and Hecate picks up one and smiles because her Slender Monster story made the front page. Another of the interns, Bea Zebub, a succubus, walks by and holds a thumb up at Hecate. "You go girl." Says Bea. Then Persephone starts to walk into the cubicle area. Yulong, the dragoness raises her head and smiles. "It would appear the new intern has already made an impact on the editor." Says the elderly oriental dragon.

It is at this moment that most of the monster girls get up to congratulate Hecate. "I had no idea such a strange creature was living in the woods," says Anna-Maria as she holds up her tentacles and waves several flags. "Who knew." "We may be looking at the first cryptic beast known to monsters," says Willa. "And since I'm a cryptic meself, that speaks volume Sheila." Emma walks forward and tries to shake hands with Hecate but grabs the wolf woman's tail by mistake due to her bad eyesight and makes Hecate growl slightly. "My mistake." Says Emma sheepishly.

Pan Li the pandaren speaks in Chinese to compliment Hecate as Blake purrs. "Girl," says Blake. "You're going to fit right in." The only reporters not congratulating Hecate were Tara and Ari. Tara lets out a hiss as she tries to put her makeup on. How she does that when she doesn't have reflection, you don't know. Ari bleats angrily. "It's disgusting," says the weresheep. "Faaaaauning over that maaaaaangy wolf." Tara hisses again. "You said it Ari. Werewolves are nothing more that flea infested, tree pissing, stink machines. Why can't they be more like the elegant vampire." What worse is that she's friends with that face melting little cockroach."

Mazee walks forward and smiles at Hecate before the two of them sit down to talk and Hecate hands you back to your girlfriend. Mazee smiles and strokes your head before she speaks with Hecate. "Well Hecate, you got famous real quick." Hecate lets out a laugh. "To be honest Mazee, Tim's bad luck is the only reason we made it out alive. We could've been killed by that.. whatever it was." Mazee smiles at you and shows her teeth. "Ooh, looks like my man's a hero."

You laugh nervously but then you see Fate walk in and she looked armed to the teeth and was even carrying a gun that she was polishing. Hecate looks at Fate in fear. "Who's the fat purple gargoyle gal with the chip on her shoulder?" "Oh," says Mazee. "It's only Fate, the night guard. She always shows up real early. Total workaholic that girl." "Fate?" asks Hecate. "Any relationship to Destiny Sirtis?" "Uh yeah," you say. "Destiny's her mom." Hecate lets out a gulp. "I can see the family resemblance."

As Fate is walking away, she drops something from her belt and Hecate runs over to help her. "Excuse me!" she yells. "Fate! You drop your.... Ah!" Hecate takes one look at the object Fate dropped and jumps back in fear. The object Fate dropped was none other than a silver bullet. "What's wrong Hecate?" asks Mazee. "S-Si-S-S..." You look at the ground and see the bullet. "A silver bullet," you say in surprise. "A werewolf's worst nightmare." Silver bullets were illegal in some places in the monster world, but Fearfield wasn't one of them. Most monsters would steer clear of these things, especially werewolves. One shot of a silver bullet and a wolf is dead as dust.

Fate walks back and then picks up the bullet from the ground. "I'd be careful if I were you," says the gargoyle woman. "As soon as you punch out, go straight home, lock your doors and windows. But if you feel the need to stop at the store, don't forget to pick up a jar of aconite." Fate then walks away as you look in confusion. "What's aconite?" you ask. "It's a purple flower," says Mazee. "Otherwise known as.... wolfsbane." Mazee's eyes pop. It sounded like Fate was telling her and you what to do in case of a werewolf attack. All you knew was that something bad was going on.

Suddenly Lexi calls over the loudspeaker...
155122221112222.title: Persephone's Breakout

1551222211122221.content:
"The building will be closing early today." Lexi says over the speaker. Everyone starts murmuring, wondering whats going on. "Um, Fate?" you ask. Mazee carries you over to the gargoyle, since Hecate is keeping her distance from the silver bullet. "What exactly is going on?" Fate looks at you, then past you at Hecate. With a sigh she comes clean. "A dangerous criminal escaped from Under Gloom, and the whole city is on alert." she says. "The whole city? How bad can this guy be?" Mazee asks. "She's a psychotic cannibal who's claimed hundreds of victims." Hecate's eyes go wide and you can guess who Fate is talking about. "You don't mean..." Fate nods. "Yup. Persephone." Hecate's face goes through a series of changes. First she looks shocked, then sad, and then angry. "That bitch escaped!? How did she get out of Under Gloom? Its supposed to be the best prison around!" she says. "Believe me, my mom is having a fit right now. She's working everyone up there like crazy." Fate tells her. "Well, I guess we should get home as fast as we can." Mazee says.

You all leave the building, Mazee cradling you in her paws. "Tim, I think I want you to stay with me tonight okay?" she says. "Sure." you tell her. "We'll call Willa when we get there and let her know." You pass Fate on the way out and call to her. "Will you be okay Fate?" you ask. She gives you a small smile. "Don't worry. That cannibal can't eat me. Gargoyles have tough skin." she tells you. As Mazee nears her car she goes to open the door. Just as she does a white paw grabs her hand. "Hey there." the owner says and shoves Mazee away. Standing there is a tall white werewolf with red eyes. Persephone! Mazee back up and begins to run but Persephone catches up easily and grabs her. With her physique the wolfess looks like she could definitely outrun your girlfriend. "Time for dinner" she says. Then she spots you clutched in Mazee's hands. "Oooh! And an after dinner snack!" Before she can go any further you hear a snarling sound. Persephone's nose twitches and she lets go of Mazee for a second. In that instant a black shape tackles her to the ground. Looking closer you see that its Hecate!

"Hey sis! I thought I smelled you, but I was too hungry to check around!" Persephone says as they roll around. "You should have turned tail the second you caught my scent!" Hecate yells. They start clawing at each other and trying to land punches but they seem pretty evenly matched. It actually looks like a fight between two quarreling sisters. Persephone doesn't even seem to be worried, she's just trying to chat with Hecate. Hecate on the other hand looks pissed beyond belief. The normally calm werewolf is snarling and growling as she grapples with her twin. Its all a blur of black and white. You and Mazee are too transfixed to even call for Fate. "You walked out on us to be a criminal! Don't act like its not a big deal!" Hecate shouts. "Aww come on. Nobody else in the family seems to hate me." Persephone counters. "Besides, I still love you guys." The two wolves continue their battle until...
1551222211122221.title: Black And White

choices: You Have To Go To Under Gloom For A Story On Persephone
15512222111222212.content:
The fighting continues as you and Mazee watch. The two of them struggle on the ground, trading blows on equal ground. You hear the sound of running and look to see Fate heading your way. When she gets there she sees the two wolves fighting. "Persephone!" she says. "I don't think we're getting those two apart." you tell her. "Well I can't get a good shot with them rolling around like that so I have to try something." she says. The gargoyle approaches the sisters and makes a grab at Persephone. She misses and is scratched by Hecate's claws. "Are you okay?" you ask. "Yeah, I'm fine." she says. It didn't leave a scratch thanks to her tough skin. Meanwhile the two wolves didn't even notice her. Fate is about to try again when Persephone looks up and spots her. "A gargoyle?! Come on!" she moans. The distraction allows Hecate to roll on top of her and land a good punch, knocking her out. She doesn't stop there though, and delivers another two or three blows before stopping.

"Jeez, want to hit her some more?" Fate says as she walks over. "Don't tempt me." Hecate responds. Fate handcuffs Persephone and picks her up off of the ground. As she does the white wolf's eyes open. Man, she recovered fast. "What the-?" she says at her situation. "You're heading back to Under Gloom." Fate tells her. Persephone moans and then looks at Hecate. "Well you got me sis. Lucky for you this chubby clawfoot showed up." she says. She's probably right. It looked like they would be fighting forever if something hadn't happened. Hecate glares at her sister, who smiles in return. Then she frowns as she looks back at Fate. "I am a little mad that I have to go back to old Demona's prison though." she says. "She's excited to see you too." Fate tells her sarcastically. She then takes Persephone away. "Love you sis! See you later!" she calls out as she goes.

The three of you stand there silently until Mazee speaks up. "Thank you so much. You saved our lives." she says to Hecate. Hecate looks at the two of you and finally cracks a smile. "I couldn't let my friends get eaten right? Besides, she deserved it." she says. "Thanks to you Fate didn't even have to use the silver bullet." you say. Her eyes look sad for a moment before going back to normal. "Uh right. Yeah." she says quickly. She's obviously trying to hide it but you can tell she's glad. As much as she hates her she doesn't want her sister dead. "I'm sure the warden will really let her have it." Mazee says. You all say goodnight and begin to head out. Hecate walks toward her truck as you and Mazee get in her car. The next day...
15512222111222212.title: Hecate Wins

choices: Show her where her office is
Introduce her to the other staff
Skip to the end of the tour
155122221112222122.content:
The next day, you were sitting at your desk, reflecting on yesterdays events, when Lexi calls you into her office. Worried that she would yell at you for what happened, you walked to her office, hoping she won't be too mad.

When you get there, you see that Lexi is not alone. Sitting in a chair on the side is someone you never met. She had long green hair tied in a ponytail, brown eyes, and silver scales all over her body. She had webbed hands and there was a dorsal fin on her back. She was wearing a blue suit. You could see that she had average breasts and a pot belly, but you could also see that she had a HUGE butt and thighs. Sitting down, it looked like she was 3 feet above the chair. She was holding what looked like a monster sized DS and she was really focused on it. Lexi cleared her throat and your attention was pulled to her.

"Tim, I want to introduce you to Mar. She is a Iara transfer from Brazil. She is going to be working here as a video game critic." Lexi told you.

"Video game critic? But we already have an entertainment section. Blake is the one working on it." You told her.

"This is true. But I'm trying to update the paper so we can sell to a broader demographic. Blake refuses to review video games, so we have hired Mar to do it. She's had expirence in the field." Lexi explained.

"Oh." You replied.

"I want you to show her around the office. Don't screw this up, or I'm sending you on an assignment in Under Gloom. Got it?"

You gulped. Under Gloom was a prison, and with all the inmates there, you were afraid that if you went, you'd never come back. "Yes, ma'am."

"Good." She said. She then turned to Mar. "Miss Mar?"

Mar didn't look up from her game.

"Miss Mar?" Lexi asked again. Still no reply. "MISS MAR?!" She yelled. That finally got Mar's attention.

"GAH, WHAT!?" Mar yelled, dropping her game.

"This is Tim. He will be showing you around."

"Oh. Alright." Mar said as she stood up, picking up both her game and you and putting you on her shoulder. She walks out the door. "So, Tim. Ready to give me the full tour?"

Where do you start?
155122221112222122.title: Video Game Reviewer?

1553.content: Who do you two run into?
1553.title: Someone Else

info.brief_description: What trouble can a human get into while working at a newspaper for giant monsters?
info.description:
(9/21/2016: Under new management. Originally created by RedHurricane)

         You are Tim, a human simpleton with a reputation as an incurable jinx. You caused so many problems in your hometown by complete accident that you were exiled to the monster city of Fearfield, a city said to have more human eating monsters than even Horrorville or Terrordale. By some luck you managed to trick a giant sphinx into employing you to do odd jobs at the town newspaper, the Daily Tombstone. This however is a problematic job due to both your ineptitude and the fact that every last one of your coworkers is a monster giantess. Surprisingly despite being one hundredth of the size of most of your coworkers you’ve managed to unintentionally cause some many accidents that the building can’t be insured anymore. Needless to say, your life in Fearfield is far from uneventful.

         Editor

Name: Lexi Luxor
Species: Sphinx
Height: 850ft (On all fours/Full height unknown)
Appearance: A titanic sphinx with violet fur, long gray hair and large feathered wings bigger than she is. Wears a lavender business dress with a pair of circular glasses. Unlike other monsters, Lexi walks on all fours rather than upright if only because of her species.
Description: Lexi is the editor of the Daily Tombstone and your employer. She hired you because she lost a bet when you answered the riddle she gave you. Lexi is the primary victim of the accidents you cause and has come to expect the worst because you somehow manage to get her seriously hurt through your bumbling. While she tries to hide it, the sphinx despises you for the misery you throw her way and mainly sends you on your missions in the hopes that she’ll get rid of you. She is a predator, but you’re just the one human she can’t eat.

         Field Reporters- Your main job involves acting as a photographer to get into places where the monsters are much too big to fit and helping the reporters in the field.

Name: Mazee Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A giant and very fat wererat girl with black fur and long bluish black hair that reaches to her long pink tail. For clothes she wears blue jeans with a gray shirt and red vest.
Description: Mazee is your girlfriend and the one monster on the crew least likely to harm you. She’s arguably the only sane monster on the Daily Tombstone and is somewhat snarky in regards to her coworkers. Mazee mainly keeps you out of trouble, specifically, protecting you against predatory monsters. While very friendly towards humans and a loyal girlfriend, the wererat giantess can be a real terror when angered or drunk and you know that all too well after being together for months.

Name: Willa Bong
Species: Bunyip
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A pudgy yellow green skinned monster resembling a scaly furless kangaroo with no tail and the face of a fanged frog with pointy ears. Has long golden brown hair with a pair of sunglasses on her head. For clothes she wears a green jacket and blue shirt with cargo shorts. There’s a pouch under her navel she uses to carry you around. She also has a long frog like tongue she uses to catch bugs.
Description: Willa is Mazee’s best friend, though she has trouble figuring out what Mazee sees in a tiny human like you. She’s also your apartment roommate, or more accurate, your dwelling since you mostly live in her pouch. Willa is also your landlady because of this but she’s an understanding one and prefers to leave you alone so she doesn’t have to interact with you. Speaks in an Australian accent due to her heritage as an Outback monster

Name: Pan Li
Species: Pandaren
Height: 850ft
Appearance: A titaness resembling a giant panda girl with her hair tied into a bun and ponytail. Typically wears a purple Chinese dress and sandals with black lipstick. Being a panda, she is really bulky and fat in body shape but mostly in her stomach.
Description: You don’t really know what Pan Li thinks about you since she doesn’t speak English, though she can understand it. She mainly covers the Eastern side of Fearfield and can be quite territorial towards the other reporters in that regard, although she isn’t openly hostile towards you. While some monsters have told you Pan Li was friendly, you heard rumors that Pan Li was a predator. Since you can’t understand the panda giantess, you don’t know what to believe. There’s a rumor she served time in Under Gloom but the charges weren’t specified.

Name: Anna-Maria Blum
Species: Kraken
Height: 475ft
Appearance: From the top she resembles an hourglass shaped tan skinned woman with large messy hot pink hair while from the waist down she has the tentacles of a giant squid. Eight of the tentacles are hot pink while the two longest ones are white
Description: Anna-Maria is an absent minded and somewhat ditzy monster who claims to have psychic powers. Nobody believes her, including you and you don’t like to work with her much because you think she’s crazy. Tends to spray ink when spazzed out and you’ve almost drowned in that black goop numerous times.

Name: Tara Gordon
Species: Vampire
Height: 550ft
Appearance: A pear shaped vampire girl with long blonde hair and purple eyes. Looks almost human except for her chalk white skin, fangs and pointed ears. Wears tight purple jeans with a black Batgirl shirt. Half of her face is horribly scarred due to sunlight exposure which almost proved fatal.
Description: Tara despises you fiercely for all the accidents you caused, because one time, you were cleaning the window behind her desk and accidentally broke it, letting in sunlight that scarred her face and nearly disintegrated her. You think she wants revenge on you for her facial damage and near death experience because every time she sees you, she’s rubbing her fangs. Extremely volatile temper to the point of mistaking compliments for insults.

Name: Ari Wooller
Species: Weresheep
Height: 660ft
Appearance: A heavy set sheep giantess with red wool all over her body, with an afro like mass of wool forming hair on her head and long curved horns. Mainly wears a black skirt with a white polka dotted shirt.
Description: Ari is one of your least favorite coworkers because she sees humans as little more than slaves. She is a shady and somewhat dishonest journalist prone to making up lies and exaggerating in her reports, in turn leading her articles to show false information. It’s a wonder Lexi hasn’t found her out and fired her. She’s that good a liar. You want to report Ari to Lexi but every time you act insubordinate towards the weresheep, she threatens to eat you and has more than once held you over her mouth.

         Misc. Reporters- As well as the field reporters, the Daily Tombstone has several other reporters that you assist.

Name: Cleotiti
Species: Mummy
Height: 300ft
Appearance: A pear shaped mummy girl wrapped up to her neck in bright yellow gauze. Almost identical to her older twin Nefernina except with long green hair and darker skin. Wears an Egyptian style skirt with scarab shaped earrings. Looks in her twenties but she’s much older than the rest of the monsters in the building.
Description: Unlike her sister, Cleotiti is very sweet, arguably the nicest girl in the news building. She was hired to write a fashion column to attract female readers. However Cleo is deathly afraid of humans because she was the monster Wade from Monster Gaol set on fire and because of the traumatic experience, she has a panic attack whenever she so much as sees a human to the point of violence. Being Nefernina’s sister, Cleotiti can use magic, but she usually prefers not to.

Name: Grace Bass
Species: Werecheetah
Height: 675ft
Appearance: A pear shaped werecheetah with yellow and black spotted fur and matching hair with a white furred face. She wears a pair of round glasses, a brown A-shirt and tight orange jeans that look as if they were painted on her large rear.
Description: Grace is a restaurant and food critic for the Daily Tombstone considered to have the most sensitive taste buds of any monster in the city. She has a big appetite befitting her profession but you’re afraid to work with her because you’ve seen her eat humans several times in different ways and fully enjoy them. While the werecheetah acts friendly towards you, you’re convinced one day when you let your guard down, she’s going to devour you on the job because she licks her lips whenever she sees you.

Name: Yulong Ming
Species: Chinese Dragon
Height: 850ft
Appearance: A long muscle bound Chinese dragon with bright green scales with silver hair that she has arranged in Chun-Li style buns and small silver antlers. She wears a white Chinese dress with a skirt.
Description: Yulong is perhaps the wisest monster in Fearfield and her job is to answer questions in the advice column of the Daily Tombstone. Unlike most of the other staff, Yulong isn’t bothered by the accidents you cause, even when she is the victim of them. Being a Chinese dragon, she is very peaceful towards humans but she can get annoyed if she is compared to the more barbaric western dragons. She’s also the only one who understands Pan Li.

Name: Emma Frostclaw
Species: Werebear
Height: 950ft
Appearance: An enormous werebear resembling a polar bear with blue eyes and lips and strawberry blonde hair. For clothing she wears a white jacket, shirt and spandex pants that blend into her fur.
Description: Emma is in charge of the sports section of the paper and when you’re assigned to work with her, you accompany her to the sporting events that take place in Fearfield. She has a tendency to take the sports too seriously and acts more masculine that feminine. While she’s friendly with you, she often forgets how tiny you are and has trouble seeing you due to mildly bad eyesight because she’s too vain to wear glasses. More often than not, she accidentally pushes you into the action.

Name: Blake Williams
Species: Weretiger
Height: 800ft
Appearance: An obese orange-red furred weretigress with long red hair reaching past her shoulders. Doesn’t wear clothes but it’s allowed because of the fur covering her body. However she wears a pair of tiger’s eye earrings and a necklace.
Description: Blake is the entertainment critic in charge of judging plays, spectacles and movies. She has the hots for you and doesn’t accept the fact you already have a girlfriend to the point where she questions what you could possibly see in a rodent of unusual size and flirts with you constantly. Blake is determined to steal you away from Mazee and make you her husband and will go to any length to do so. You’re the reason she doesn’t wear clothes. Needless to say, Blake and Mazee hate each other. She is the cousin of Kath of Monster Shores.

         Other Staff- Sometimes Lexi makes you do odd jobs such as helping out the rest of the staff. This is the part of the staff not involved in writing the newspaper. You don’t like working with them that much because most of them stress you out.

Name: Harley Bacon
Species: Wereboar
Height: 750ft
Appearance: A giant fat wereboar with yellow orange fur with black spots and white hair worn in a fauxhawk and ponytail. She also sports large tusks as long as her snout. Mainly wears tight black leather that’s obviously too small for her large body.
Description: You think she’s Brazilian, if pig girls the size of skyscrapers can be Brazilian. Harley was hired to deliver newspapers because she was the only one to apply for the job. You sometimes accompany her on her motorcycle. While Harley is the fastest delivery girl in Fearfield and overly friendly around humans, you’re scared to go with her because she drives like a psychopath and usually places you in some unsecure areas.

Name: Kiki Nook
Species: Tanuki
Height: 700ft
Appearance: A large obese grey furred tanuki with black stripes and black hair worn in a bun. Wears a rose colored business dress similar to Lexi’s except obviously bigger. Like all tanukis, she has black markings around her face resembling a mask.
Description: Kiki is Lexi’s secretary, though she is very apathetic about her job. Working with her is extremely dangerous because the tanuki woman is completely oblivious and indifferent to the fact a tiny human works in the building and has nearly eaten or squashed you countless times. It really doesn’t help that she acts as if you’re not even there even when you’re directly in her line of sight.

Name: Aurelia Macbeth-Nile
Species: Werejackal
Height: 600ft
Appearance: A tall and hourglass shaped Egyptian style werejackal with teal colored fur and long rose colored hair. She has one blue eye and one red eye, the latter of which is blind. For clothing she wears a navy unitard and ankh shaped earrings with a necklace of human skulls painted blue.
Description: Aurelia is a handy woman hired to act as maintenance and tech support for the building. Namely repairing the damages your clumsiness has caused to both the building itself and any machines. Aurelia is married to Cree from Monster Gaol and shares her much larger werehyena wife’s sadistic and predatory attitude in regards to humans, except she’s more calm-headed about it and not as hyperactive as Cree. You really don’t like working with her because every other time you’re assigned to her, she tries to eat you and at one point she actually did have you halfway down her throat. You only escaped because she sneezed.

Name: Fate Sirtis
Species: Gargoyle
Height: 1000ft
Appearance: A heavy set indigo skinned gargoyle with large leathery wings, a lizard’s tail and six small almost underdeveloped looking horns on her forehead. Has bright blue eyes and long waist length brownish blonde hair. Typically wears a black security guard’s uniform and cap and a bandolier over her shoulder.
Description: Fate is one of the building’s two security guards. Fate’s job is to keep thieves and spies out of the news building. While she’s non aggressive towards humans, you wouldn’t consider Fate good company because she rarely speaks, always has a stoic look on her face and acts more like a soldier than a security guard when it comes to her job. She’s also the daughter of Warden Destiny from Monster Gaol and shares her mother’s dedication. When Lexi pairs you up with Fate, your main purpose is to act as a second set of eyes and you usually have to stay after hours since Fate mainly comes in at night when everyone else has gone home.

Name: Beth Forte
Species: Behemoth
Height: 1000ft
Appearance: A titanic tan yellowish skinned behemoth. Resembles a hippopotamus with the scaly skin of a dragon and long light brown hair. Beth mainly wears a white security outfit to contrast with Fate’s, but she also wears a leather dominatrix’s outfit underneath. She sports a noticeable tattoo of a skull on her right butt cheek.
Description: Beth is another guard like Fate except she mainly comes in during the day. However, Beth likes humans to know who’s in charge and loves to dominate you, mainly by crushing you and playing with you in her mouth. However, like Blake, Beth is trying to steal you from Mazee, only she does it by acting like a dominatrix. You’ve even seen her bring a whip to work that she loved pulling out on you. There’s even a rumor you’re not the first human that caught her eye and the last one didn’t survive her treatment. Beth doesn’t take her job as seriously as Fate but the two of them get along to a degree.

         New Characters

Name: Beatrice "Bea" Zebub
Species: Succubus
Height: 700ft
Appearance: A gigantic purple skinned succubus with long black hair down to the small of her back. She has yellow slitted eyes like a cat, two horns on her forehead, red fingernails as sharp as knives and a devil's tail with a heart shaped tip. Wears a black business suit and skirt that shows off her smooth legs
Description: An addition by Anonymous One. Bea is one of five new interns working for the building and surprisingly seems non-malicious for a succubus and doesn't appear to eat souls like the rest of her species. But you're scared to death of her because of her being that type of monster to begin with. Also somewhat flirty which is unsurprising given her species.

Name: Korina Nitazaki
Species: European Dragon
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A black skinned European dragon with leathery wings, sharp claws and teeth, long pointed horns and a long tail with a dinosaur like fin reached from her neck to her tail. Mainly wears a chef's uniform
Description: An addition from UltraGTS. Korina works the building's lunchroom as a cook. She's very friendly towards humans but perhaps a little too friendly, especially when it comes to you, but you still get along well with her. Yulong prefers to avoid her because neither dragon likes their species being compared to each other's.

Name: Brandy
Species: Nandi Bear
Height: 900ft
Appearance: An odd monster resembling a giant bulky dark furred hyena with a bear-like face and a single eye
Description: An addition by Powerfiction. Brandy is a new intern, brutish and sinister looking in appearance. You're terrified of her because of her aggressive and vicious demeanor and don't know whether or not she eats humans.

Name: Konia
Species: Hydra
Height: 600ft
Appearance: A pink skinned hydra with three long dragon's heads. Clothes can be anything since the writer wasn't specific.
Description: Another addition by UltraGTS. Konia has three heads with three different personalities. The left head has heard of the accidents you caused and is very aggressive. She might possibly try to eat you. The right head is friendly and more understanding towards humans and the middle head is the calmest of the three heads.

Name: Jasmine
Species: Neko/Genie Hybrid
Height: Normally 550ft but changes depending on her mood
Appearance: An orange skinned monster, almost human in appearance except for the eyes, ears and tail of a cat. Jasmine has purple hair worn in a ponytail down to her knees. For clothes she wears a red belly dancer's outfit with her stomach exposed and a veil covering her face from the nose down.
Description: An addition by Anonymous One. Jasmine is an unusual kind of monster given that her mother was a neko but her father was a djinn. Despite having just started work at the Daily Tombstone, Jasmine has heard about your bad luck and has offered to help do something about it. Being half genie, Jasmine has the ability to grant wishes.

Name: Hecate Howler
Species: Werewolf
Height: 800ft
Appearance: A tall hourglass sharped werewolf with pitch black fur and Icy blue eyes. Mainly wears a cut shirt and a pair of jeans.
Description: An addition by InfiniteBull and another of the five interns. Hecate is a freelance artist who mainly does illustrations for book and magazines who joined the Daily Tombstone to try something else. Hecate comes from a big family but she's ashamed of the fact that she's the twin sister of Persephone, the cannibalistic serial killer, and doesn't like to talk about her imprisoned sister. Hecate will eat humans but only as a last resort if there's nothing else to eat and she would never eat a human that was her friend.

Name: Kimberley Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A wererat similar in body shape to Mazee but not as heavy. Has yellow brown fur and blonde hair. Mainly wears a purple jacket and black skirt.
Description: Kimberley is one of Mazee's six younger sisters and the closest to Mazee in age. You're not fond of her because like all of Mazee's sisters, she only sees you as food and Kimberley especially likes to taunt you. In fact, a few times she's even tried to get you in hot water with her older sister a few times. Last time you checked, she worked as a waitress in a restaurant between Fearfield and Terrordale.

Name: Brianna Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A black and white furred wererat with long white hair. Like her sisters, Brianna is on the chubby side. She mainly wears a yellow jacket and shirt.
Description: Brianna is the second oldest of Mazee's six sisters. Like the rest of Mazee's sisters, she wants to eat you, but she also likes to experiment. Brianna is known for eating humans as toppings in recipes that are revolting even by wererat standards. The stuff you've seen her eat humans with makes you sick just thinking about it.

Name: Cameron Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: Cameron looks almost identical to her twin sister Brianna except for the heart shaped birthmark around her eye and an orange outfit rather than yellow.
Description: Cameron is the third of Mazee's sisters and a hairstylist in downtown Fearfield. She's talked about giving you a makeover, believing that humans should look as good as they taste. However, the way she prepares her tools when she sees you makes you scared half to death.

Name: Asia Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A wererat with a white coat of fur with a hint of gray in some places. Like most of her sisters, Asia is on the heavy side.
Description: An addition by Infinitebull. Asia is one of Mazee's sisters you fear the most. She wants to eat you like the rest of them, but she thinks you need to be tenderized. Asia enjoys pulverizing humans with her body before she eats them and has tortured you several times in the past.

Name: Ricki Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 500ft
Appearance: A heavyset wererat with pure white fur and hair.
Description: An addition by Infinitebull. Like the rest of Mazee's sisters, Ricki loves eating humans. However, she uses them to pleasure herself and sees humans of having uses before being eaten. In fact, one time she even tried shoving you down her pants before Mazee caught her in the act

Name: Freda Robinson
Species: Wererat
Height: 375ft
Appearance: A wererat with dark brown fur. Freda is smaller than her sisters and not as fat as they are, but she can't be called thin either.
Description: An addition by Infinitebull. Freda is the youngest of Mazee's sisters. She likes to toss you around like a toy, mainly by using you as a hacky sack among other things. Even though she's smaller than all her other sisters, she's certainly no less vicious.

Name: Mar Vinda Crexio
Species: Land based Iara
Height: 975 Ft.
Apperance: Long, green hair in a ponytail, brown eyes, and silver fish scales covering her body. Webbed hands and feet, and a dorsal fin. She has average breasts and a pot belly, but due to her years of gaming, she has a giant butt and huge thighs. She usually wears a blue suit.
Personality: An OC of the 12th Doctor. Hailing from Brazil, Mar is hired into the paper as a video game critic. Mar adores all kinds of video games, and when she is not working, she can be found playing her games into the early morning. When she gets absorbed into a game, she forgets the world around her. Though she won't eat Tim, her obliviousness may result in her sitting on him, though her butt is soft enough that it won't crush him

Name: Satana Lauren DelCano
Species: Chupacabra
Height: 850 ft.
Appearance: An OC by the 12th Doctor. Satana has yellow eyes. If she has hair is unknown, since she never removes her red luchadora mask. She has a short tail and is covered in dull green scales. She had an athletic body from her years as a luchadora. She wears a red sports bra with black flames and black tights.
Description: Known as "The GoatSucker", Satana is one of the greatest luchadoras (female luchadors) in the world. As such, she is incredibly cocky and arrogant. She never removes her mask, feeling that she will lose who she is if it is removed. When she is not in the ring, she is training.

Name: Henrietta Coleen de Hellta
Species: Succubus
Height: 1025 ft.
Appearance: An OC by the 12th Doctor. Henrietta has blue skin, red hair the reaches her lower back, and orange eyes. She has medium bat wings and a devil tail. Due to her job, Jessica is extremely fat, to the point of being a giant blue mountain. Her clothing varies.
Description: Henrietta is the first succubus to be a BBW model and is considered one of the best. All this fame has gone to her head, and she is incredibly selfish and arrogant and known for being hard to work with. She is very self centered, only thinking about herself. She is obsessed with getting even fatter, and desires to be THE fattest BBW model in the world.

Name: Julia Henrik
Species: Weregator
Height: 875 ft
Appearance: Julia has blonde hair in a ponytail, green eyes, and green scales covering her body. Julia is very fat from her life of luxury and getting what she wants, but still manages to be pretty. She wears a lot of make up and jewelry.
Personality: Another OC of the 12th Doctor. Julia is a 33 year old woman with the personality of a spoiled teen. Born with a silver spoon in her mouth, Julia is a rich brat who demands to have everything handed to her on a silver platter. She never does anything herself: her servants do everything for her, while she lazes around. All her friends are paid for. She sees Henrietta as a friend, but the feeling is not returned: Julia had everything handed to her and was spoiled rotten; Henrietta EARNED the right to be a egotist.

Name: Marsha Red
Species: Living Scarecrow
Height: 900 ft.
Appearance: Marsha has a body made completely out of straw in an hourglass shaped burlap sack. Her head is also a burlap sack, with cut out eyes and a cut out mouth. She wears a short, red wig to act as hair. She wears a black suit.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Marsha has the one job no one expected of a scarecrow: politician. She is determined to help improve the lives of people in any way she can. Despite the stereotype, she is a very nice woman and would never resort to underhanded tactics. Currently running for state governor.

Name: Elisha Connors
Species: Living Ventriloquist Dummy
Height: 750 ft.
Appearance: Elisha is made completely of Mahogany wood. She has short brown sculpted hair and green glass eyes. Like all ventriloquist dummy's, Elisha's mouth does not fully move. Like Marsha, she has an hourglass figure. She wears a white suit.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Elisha is the campaign manager for governor candidate Marsha Red. Which is odd, seeing as Elisha is Marsha's near complete opposite. She is a cheater, and will do anything to get Marsha elected, from slander to false claims. Marsha, a kind politician, isn't aware of Elisha's underhanded tactics.

Name: Danielle Connor
Species: Siren
Height: 900 ft.
Appearance: Danielle's body is covered in blue fish scales. She has short, sea-green hair and blue eyes. She has webbed hands and feet and fins on her arms and legs. She is extremely muscular, but still has some good curves. She has a row of sharp teeth. Her clothing varies, but she always wears her headphones.
Description: An addition by the 12th Doctor. Danielle Connor is the host of the popular radio talk show named after her, "The Danielle Connor Show". On it, people call in to tell her their issues and thoughts. Danielle is known for being lively and energetic, and is not afraid to say what's on her mind. This has made her friends and enemies. Her station is right next door to the Daily Tombstone.

Name: Cali Denverson
Species: Satyr
Height: 745 ft
Appearance: Cali has red skin, long, black hair, and green eyes. Like all satyrs, she has the legs, horns, and ears of a goat. She is slim, but due to an accident, she has a form of LOS, giving her gargantuan breasts that never stop growing and are full of milk she can never lactate. She is bound to a wheelchair because of this.
Description: An O.C. by the 12th Doctor. Cali was a doctor studying LOS who got caught in chemical accident. Somehow, this caused her to becoming afflicted with the condition, making her the only woman in the world with LOS that isn't a gargoyle, succubus, or werewolf. She has taken her predicament in stride, becoming a spokeswoman for the condition and helping to develop ways to live with it. Being the only satyr in existance with LOS has made her a minor celebrity.

Name: Micki Cervidae
Species: Deer Woman
Height: 850 ft.
Appearance: Micki has the upper body is a beautiful Native American woman with short brown hair and a brown eye (she has an eyepatch on the left eye), and the legs of a deer. She also possesses deer ears on the top of her head and a deer tail. Due to a previous infection from Nebutori, she is incredibly obese.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Micki is a professional photographer looking to work at Monster Tower. She is a very career minded woman, always obsessed with getting the perfect shot. She sees photography as an art form, and often takes artistic pictures when not on the job. She is also obsessed with her fat. When she isn't working, she's caressing her massive body. Everything she does outside of photography is meant to show off her obese body.


Name: Violet von Westbell
Species: Vampire
Height: 845 ft.
Appearance: Violet has chalk white skin, blood red lips and eyes, pointed ears, and no hair due to an accident that left her permanently bald. She has a severely exaggerated hourglass figure due to being cursed, and is still growing. One of her fangs is broken. She wears a tight silver dress with a short skirt.
Description: An OC of the 12th Doctor and a guard hired to run the night shift when it's Fate's night off. Violet is considered the unluckiest monster in the country. Every day, she feels as though the universe hates her and wants her to be miserable. An accident with chemicals left her permanently bald and a witch with an ever growing hourglass figure for no reason other then the universe saying "screw you". As such, she's often in a sour mood. But she still tries to go on, even if fate just despises her.
